src: "Kad kauja par Franciju bija galā, Vācija sāka gatavoties iebrukumam Lielbritānijas salā. Vācija nosauca uzbrukumu kodētā vārdā ""Operācija Jūraslauva"" (Operation Sealion). Vairums britu armijas smagās artilērijas un aprīkojuma tika pazaudēts, evakuējoties no Denkerkas, līdz ar to viņu armija bija diezgan vāja. Taču Karaliskā jūras kara flote joprojām bija spēcīgāka nekā vāciešu jūras kara flote (“Kriegsmarine”), un tā varēja iznīcināt jebkuru pa Lamanša jūras šaurumu iesūtīto iebrucēju floti. Tomēr tikai daži Karaliskās flotes kuģi atradās pie iespējamajiem iebrukuma ceļiem, jo admirāļi baidījās, ka tos nogremdēs Vācijas lidmašīnu uzbrukuma laikā."
mt: "Once the battle for France was over, Germany began preparing for an invasion of Great Britain. Germany called the invasion Operation Sealion. Most of the British Army's heavy artillery and equipment was lost, evacuating from Dunkirk, leaving their army rather weak. However, the Royal Navy was still stronger than the German Navy, and it could destroy any invasion fleet that passed through the English Channel. However, only a few Royal Navy ships were near the invasion routes, as admirals feared that they would be bombed by German aircraft."
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: "Sāksim ar Itālijas plānu izskaidrošanu. Itālija galvenokārt bija Vācijas un Japānas ""mazais brālis"". Tai bija vājāka armija un flote, lai gan pirms kara sākuma bija uzbūvēti četri jauni kuģi. Itālijas galvenais mērķis bija Āfrikas valstis. Lai ieņemtu šīs valstis, viņiem būtu vajadzīgs karaspēka izvietošanas atbalsta punkts, lai karaspēks varētu šķērsot Vidusjūru un okupēt Āfriku. Tādēļ viņiem vajadzēja atbrīvoties no britu karabāzēm un kuģiem Ēģiptē. Izņemot šīs darbības, itāļu līnijkuģiem nekas cits nebija jādara. Tagad par Japānu. Japāna, tāpat kā Anglija, bija salu valsts."
mt: "We will start with the Italian plan. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan. It had a weak army and navy, although it had built four new ships before the war began. Italy's main goal was the African countries. In order to occupy these countries, they needed a deployment support point, so that the troops could cross the Mediterranean and occupy Africa. Therefore, they had to free themselves from British barracks and ships in Egypt. Except for these actions, Italian battleships had nothing else to do. Now about Japan. Japan, like England, was an island country."
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "D-dienas izcelšanās un turpmākās cīņas bija atbrīvojušas Francijas ziemeļus, bet dienvidi joprojām nebija atbrīvoti. To pārvaldīja ""Višī Francija"". Tie bija Francijas iedzīvotāji, kas 1940. gadā noslēdza mieru ar vāciešiem un sadarbojās ar iebrucējiem, nevis karoja ar tiem. 1940. gada 15. augustā sabiedrotie iebruka Dienvidfrancijā; šo iebrukumu sauca ""Operācija Dragūns"". Vien divās nedēļās amerikāņi un Brīvie franču spēki bija atbrīvojuši Francijas dienvidus un devās Vācijas virzienā."
mt: "Tuesday's breakout and subsequent fighting had freed the north of France, but the south was still not free. It was governed by "Vichy France." These were French citizens who in 1940 had made peace with the Germans and collaborated with the invaders, not fought against them. On August 15, 1940, the allies invaded southern France; this invasion was called "Operation Dragoon." In two weeks, the Americans and Free French forces had freed the south of France and were moving toward Germany."
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: "Zemūdenes ir kuģi, kas paredzēti ceļošanai zem ūdens, un uzturas tur ilgāku laiku. Zemūdenes tika izmantotas Pirmajā un Otrajā pasaules karā. Toreiz tās bija ļoti lēnas un ar ļoti ierobežotu šaušanas diapazonu. Kara sākumā tās galvenokārt pārvietojās pa jūras virsmu, bet, attīstoties un kļūstot precīzākiem radariem, zemūdenēm nācās nolaisties zem ūdens, lai izvairītos no pamanīšanas. Vācu zemūdenes tika sauktas par ""U-Boats"". Vācieši lieliski prata vadīt un izmantot savas zemūdenes. Tā kā vācieši guva panākumus, pateicoties zemūdenēm, pēc kara viņiem neuzticējās, domājot, ka viņiem to joprojām bija daudz."
mt: "Submarines are ships designed for underwater travel and to stay there for a longer time. Submarines were used in the First and Second World War. At first they were very slow and had a very limited firing range. At the beginning of the war they mainly moved over the surface of the sea, but, as radar improved and became more accurate, submarines had to submerge to avoid detection. German submarines were called "U-Boats". The Germans were very good at operating and using their submarines. As the Germans were successful, thanks to their submarines, after the war they were not trusted, thinking that they still had a lot."
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Līdz 1939. gada 17. septembrim poļu aizsargi jau bija sakauti, un vienīgā cerība bija atkāpties un pārorganizēties gar rumāņu placdarmu. Tomēr šie plāni morāli novecoja gandrīz vai dienas laikā, kad ieradās vairāk nekā 800 000 Padomju Savienības Sarkanās Armijas karavīru un izveidoja Baltkrievijas un Ukrainas frontes pēc tam, kad bija okupējuši Polijas austrumu reģionus, pārkāpjot Rīgas miera līgumu, Padomju-Polijas neagresijas paktu un citus starptautiskos divpusējos un daudzpusējos līgumus.
mt: By September 17, 1939, Polish defenders had already been defeated, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganize behind the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were demoralized almost overnight when more than 800,000 Red Army soldiers arrived and formed the fronts of Belarus and Ukraine after occupying the eastern regions of Poland, violating the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international bilateral and multilateral treaties.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Gandrīz no paša sākuma itāļiem Ziemeļāfrikā klājās neveiksmīgi. Nedēļas laikā pēc tam, kad 1940. gada 10. jūnijā Itālija bija pasludinājusi karu, britu 11. huzāri bija sagrābuši Kapuzo fortu Lībijā. Uzbrūkot no slēpņa austrumos no Bardijas, briti sagūstīja Itālijas Desmitās armijas galveno inženieri ģenerāli Lastuči. 28. jūnijā maršalu Italo Balbo, Lībijas ģenerālgubernatoru un neapšaubāmo Musolīni pēcgājēju, nogalināja paša karaspēks nolaišanās laikā Tobrukā.
mt: The Italians in North Africa were off to a bad start. Within a week of Italy declaring war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had captured the Capuzzo fort in Libya. Attacking from the east of Bardia, the British captured the main engineer of the Italian Tenth Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor-General of Libya and Mussolini's undisputed heir, was killed by his own troops in a crash landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibetas budisms balstās uz Budas mācībām, bet to paplašināja ar mahājāna mīlestības ceļu un daudzām Indijas jogas metodēm. Principā Tibetas budisms ir ļoti vienkāršs. Tas ietver kundalini jogu, meditāciju un ceļu uz visaptverošu mīlestību. Kundalini jogas praktizēšanas laikā Kundalini (apskaidrības) enerģija tiek atmodināta, izmantojot jogas pozas, elpošanas vingrinājumus, mantras un vizualizācijas. Tibetas meditācijas centrs ir Dievības joga. Caur dažādu dievību vizualizāciju tiek iztīrīti enerģijas kanāli, aktivizētas čakras un tiek radīta apgaismības apziņa.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but was expanded by the Mahayana path of love and many Indian yoga methods. Basically Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path to universal love. Kundalini yoga practice Kundalini (energy of clarity) is awakened using yoga poses, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Yoga of God. Through various deity visualizations energy channels are cleansed, chakras are activated and the light of consciousness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

Tas ietver kundalini jogu, meditāciju un ceļu uz visaptverošu mīlestību. Kundalini jogas praktizēšanas laikā Kundalini (apskaidrības) enerģija tiek atmodināta, izmantojot jogas pozas, elpošanas vingrinājumus, mantras un vizualizācijas. Tibetas meditācijas centrs ir Dievības joga. Caur dažādu dievību vizualizāciju tiek iztīrīti enerģijas kanāli, aktivizētas čakras un tiek radīta apgaismības apziņa.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but was expanded by the Mahayana path of love and many Indian yoga methods. Basically Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path to universal love. Kundalini yoga practice Kundalini (energy of clarity) is awakened using yoga poses, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Yoga of God. Through various deity visualizations energy channels are cleansed, chakras are activated and the light of consciousness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Programma sākās 20:30 pēc vietējā laika (15:00 UTC). Slaveni dziedātāji no visas valsts skandināja badžanas (bhajans), jeb slavinošās dziesmas pie Šri Šiamas kājām. Vakaru iesāka dziedātājs Sandžu Šarma, kuram sekoja Džajs Šankars Čoudharijs. Lakha Singhs nodziedāja arī ziedojuma „chhappan bhog” bhadžanu. Viņam pievienojās dziedātājs Radžu Khandelvals. Tad Lakha Sings uzņēmās vadību bhadžanu dziedāšanā. Par godu Baba Šiam tika pasniegti 108 šķīvji ar Čhapan Bog ēdieniem (hinduismā tas nozīmē 56 dažādus ēdienus, piemēram, saldumus, augļus, riekstus u.c. ēdienus, ko ziedo dievībai). Lakha Singhs nodziedāja arī ziedojuma „chhappan bhog” bhadžanu. Viņam pievienojās dziedātājs Radžu Khandelvals.
mt: 20:30 local time (15:00 UTC) the program began. Famous singers from all over Scandinavia sang bhajans (bhajans), or praise songs at the feet of Shri Shyama. The evening began with singer Sandju Sharma, followed by Džajs Šankars Čoudharijs. Lakha Singhs also sang the offering "chhappan bhog" bhajans. He was joined by singer Radžu Khandelvals. Then Lakha Sings took over the leadership of bhajans singing. In honor of Baba Shyama, 108 shivis were given with Chhapan Bog food (in Hinduism this means 56 different dishes, such as sweets, fruits, nuts, etc. dishes, which are offered to the gods). Lakha Singhs also sang the offering "chhappan bhog" bhajans. He was joined by singer Radžu Khandelvals.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Svinības sākās ar īpašu pasaulslavenās grupas ""Cirque du Soleil"" izrādi. Pēc tam uzstājās Stambulas Nacionālais simfoniskais orķestris, janičāru orķestris un dziedātāji Fatihs Erkočs un Mislims Girsess. Tad uz skatuves kāpa virpuļojošie derviši. Turku dīva Sezena Aksu uzstājās kopā ar itāļu tenoru Alesandro Safinu un grieķu dziedātāju Harisu Aleksiu. Noslēgumā Turcijas deju grupa ""Fire of Anatolia"" uzstājās ar šovu ""Troy""."
mt: The celebrations began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. Then the National Symphony Orchestra of Istanbul, the Janissary Orchestra and singers Fethi Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses performed. Then the whirling dervishes appeared on the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The show ended with the Turkish dance group "Fire of Anatolia" performing the show "Troy".
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Tā kā pasažieriem bija jāgaida 90 °F tveicē, viņiem tika pasniegts ūdens. Ugunsdzēsības brigādes kapteinis Skots Kouns sacīja: ""Todien Santa Klārā bija ļoti karsts un temperatūra sasniedza 90 grādus. Jebkurš laika sprīdis, iesprūstot amerikāņu kalniņos, būtu nepatīkams, lai neteiktu vairāk, turklāt pagāja vismaz stunda, pirms no trases izdevās nocelt pirmo personu."""
mt: "Because passengers were waiting in 90°F heat, they were given water. Fire Chief Scott Kouns said: "Today in Santa Clara it was very hot and the temperature reached 90 degrees. Any time of year, a spark in the American hills would be unpleasant, to say the least, and it was at least an hour before the first person was able to get off the track."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Saskaņā ar jaunākajām ziņām jūras līmeņa mērījumi liecināja par cunami veidošanos. Pagopago un Niues apkaimē tika reģistrēta noteikta cunami aktivitāte. Tongā netika ziņots par lieliem postījumiem vai smagi ievainotajiem, taču uz laiku pazuda elektrība, kas, kā ziņo, neļāva Tongas varasiestādēm saņemt PTWC izdoto brīdinājumu par cunami. Havaju salās četrpadsmit skolas, kas atrodas pie krastiem vai piekrastes tuvumā, trešdien vēl bija slēgtas, neskatoties uz to, ka brīdinājumi bija atcelti.
mt: According to the latest reports, sea level measurements indicated a tsunami was forming.  The area around Pago Pago and Niue was registering a definite tsunami activity.  There were no reports of major damage or seriously injured in Tonga, but power was out temporarily, which prevented the Tongan government from receiving the PTWC issued tsunami warning.  Fourteen schools on the Hawaiian islands that were near the coast or the shoreline were still closed on Wednesday, despite the cancellation of the warnings.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: "A1GP Jaunzēlandes komandas otrais pilots Džonijs Rīds šodien tika ierakstīts vēsturē par visātrāk likumīgi veikto braucienu pāri 48 gadus vecajam Oklendas ostas tiltam Jaunzēlandē. Rīda kungs, braucot ar Jaunzēlandes A1GP automašīnu „Melnā skaistule”, pārsniedza 160 km/h un šķērsoja tiltu septiņas reizes. Jaunzēlandes policijai bija grūtības izmantot savus ātruma radarus, lai redzētu, cik ātri Reida kungs brauc, jo automašīna ""Melnā skaistule"" bija ātra, un vienīgā reize, kad policijai izdevās fiksēt Reida kungu, bija tad, kad viņš palēnināja ātrumu līdz 160 km/h."
mt: "New Zealand's second A1GP driver Johnny Reid was today entered into the record books for the fastest legal crossing of Auckland Harbour Bridge, aged 48. Reid, driving the New Zealand A1GP car "Black Beauty", exceeded 160 km/h and crossed the bridge seven times. New Zealand police had difficulty using their speed radars to see how fast Reid was going, as the car "Black Beauty" was so fast, and the only time police were able to catch Reid was when he slowed down to 160 km/h."
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Pirmdien, plkst. 22:08 Montānas rietumdaļu satricināja mērena zemestrīce. Uzreiz pēc tam ne ASV Ģeoloģijas dienests (USGS), ne Nacionālais zemestrīču informācijas centrs netika saņēmis ziņojumus par jebkādiem postījumiem. Zemestrīce centrējās apmēram 20 km (15 jūdzes) uz ziemeļziemeļaustrumiem no Dilonas un aptuveni 65 km (40 jūdzes) uz dienvidiem no Būtes.
mt: 22:08 Monday, a moderate earthquake struck the western part of Montana. Immediately after the USGS, the National Earthquake Information Center was not received reports of any damage. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Dumpja laikā Irākas Abugraibas cietums tika aizdedzināts. Cietums kļuva bēdīgi slavens, kad tur tika atklāta nežēlīga izturēšanās pret cietumniekiem pēc tam, kad to bija pārņēmuši ASV spēki.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set on fire during a riot. The prison became infamous when it was revealed that U.S. forces had mistreated prisoners after they took control of it.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: "Grupa atcēla šovu ""Maui kara memoriālajā"" stadionā, kuru paredzēja apmeklēt 9000 cilvēku, un atvainojās faniem. Grupas menedžmenta uzņēmums ""HK Management, Inc."" 20. septembrī sākotnējo atcelšanas iemeslu nenorādīja, bet jau nākamajā dienā vainoja loģistikas apsvērumus."
mt: 20. septembrī sākotnējo atcelšanas iemeslu nenorādīja, bet jau nākamajā dienā vainoja loģistikas apsvērumus.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Tika ziņots par plaša mēroga marodierismu, kas turpinājās visu nakti, jo Biškekas ielās nebija tiesībaizsardzības amatpersonu. Viens aculiecinieks raksturoja Biškeku kā pilsētu, kas grimst ""anarhijā"", jo pa ielām klīda cilvēku bari un izlaupīja patēriņa preču veikalus. Vairāki Biškekas iedzīvotāji nelikumībās vainoja protestētājus, kas bija ieradušies no dienvidiem."
mt: "Anarchy" was the word used by one eyewitness to describe Bishkek, where police were nowhere to be seen. "People were looting shops and supermarkets," he said. "It was a total mess." Many Bishkek residents blamed the rioters, who came from the south, for the chaos.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Iepriekš uzņēmuma „Ring” izpilddirektors Džeimijs Siminofs atzīmēja, ka viņš nodibinājis uzņēmumu tad, kad viņa veikala durvju zvans nebija dzirdams garāžā. Pēc viņa teiktā viņš izgudroja bezvadu durvju zvanu. Siminofs teica, ka pārdošanas apjomi pieauga pēc tam, kad viņš 2013. gadā piedalījās vienā realitātes seriāla „Shark Tank” sērijā, kurā šova speciālistu komanda finansējumu jaunuzņēmumam nepiešķīra. 2017. gada beigās Smirnoff parādījās televīzijas iepirkšanās kanālā QVC. Uzņēmums „Ring” arī atrisināja strīdu ar konkurējošo drošības uzņēmumu „ADT Corporation”.
mt: Previously, Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff noted that he founded the company when the doorbell of his store was not heard in the garage. According to him, he invented a wireless doorbell. Siminoff said that sales increased after he appeared in a reality show "Shark Tank" in 2013, where the show's expert panel did not finance the company's new venture. In late 2017, Smirnoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. The Ring company also settled a dispute with the competing security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

Siminofs teica, ka pārdošanas apjomi pieauga pēc tam, kad viņš 2013. gadā piedalījās vienā realitātes seriāla „Shark Tank” sērijā, kurā šova speciālistu komanda finansējumu jaunuzņēmumam nepiešķīra. 2017. gada beigās Smirnoff parādījās televīzijas iepirkšanās kanālā QVC. Uzņēmums „Ring” arī atrisināja strīdu ar konkurējošo drošības uzņēmumu „ADT Corporation”.
mt: Previously, Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff noted that he founded the company when the doorbell of his store was not heard in the garage. According to him, he invented a wireless doorbell. Siminoff said that sales increased after he appeared in a reality show "Shark Tank" in 2013, where the show's expert panel did not finance the company's new venture. In late 2017, Smirnoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. The Ring company also settled a dispute with the competing security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "PBS raidījumam ir vairāk nekā divi desmiti Emmy balvu, un tā pastāvēšanas ilgums bija īsāks tikai par ""Sezama ielu"" un ""Rodžersa kunga apkārtni"". Katra raidījuma epizode aplūko kādas konkrētas grāmatas tēmu un pēc tam iepazīst to plašāk ar dažādu stāstu palīdzību. Katrā pārraidē tiek sniegti arī ieteikumi attiecībā par grāmatām, kuras bērniem būtu jāmeklē savā bibliotēkā. Džons Grants no raidsabiedrības „WNED Buffalo” (raidījuma „Reading Rainbow” mājvietas) teica: ""„Reading Rainbow” mācīja bērniem, kāpēc vajag lasīt... Mīlestību pret lasīšanu — [raidījums] aicināja bērnus paņemt grāmatu un to lasīt."" Daži, tostarp Džons Grānts, uzskata, ka finansējuma samazinājums un pieejas izglītojošām televīzijas programmām maiņa sekmēja seriāla uzņemšanas pārtraukšanu."
mt: "Reading Rainbow" has won more than 30 Emmys, and its run was shorter than only "Sesame Street" and "The Andy Griffith Show." Each episode explores a particular theme from a book and then introduces it to a wider audience with the help of various stories. Each episode also offers recommendations for books children should seek out in their libraries. John Grant of the PBS station WNED Buffalo (home of the "Reading Rainbow") said, "Reading Rainbow taught kids why they should read... The love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to take a book and read it." Some, including John Grant, believe that the funding cut and the shift away from educational television programming led to the show's cancellation.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amsterdamas pilsētas amatpersonas un Annas Frankas muzejs, diskutējot par nenovēršamajiem draudiem kokam nogāzties, konstatē, ka tas ir inficēts ar sēni un rada apdraudējumu sabiedrības veselībai. Tika plānots to nocirst otrdien, bet pēc ārkārtas tiesas lēmums tas tika izglābts.
mt: Amsterdam city officials and the Anne Frank House, discussing the unstoppable threat of the tree falling, found that it was infected with fungus and posed a threat to public health. It was planned to be cut down on Tuesday, but after an emergency court ruling it was saved.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Dzīvnieku atbrīvošanas organizācija un Karaliskā biedrība dzīvnieku aizsardzībai pret cietsirdību (RSPCA) atkal ierosina obligāti uzstādīt novērošanas kameras Austrālijas lopkautuvēs. RSPCA Jaundienvidvelsas galvenais inspektors Deivids Ošenesijs televīzijai ABC teica, ka lopkautuvju uzraudzībai un kontrolei Austrālijā ir jābūt ikdienas praksei. Videonovērošanas kameras noteikti būs spēcīgs signāls tiem cilvēkiem, kuri strādā ar dzīvniekiem - ka viņu labturība ir visaugstākā prioritāte.
mt: The animal liberation organisation and the Royal Society for the Protection of Animals (RSPCA) have again called for mandatory CCTV in Australian abattoirs. RSPCA South Australia chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC television that the oversight and control of abattoirs in Australia should be a daily practice. CCTV would be a strong signal to those people who work with animals - that their welfare is the highest priority.
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Šodien, kad tika apglabāts Džefs Veiss un trīs no deviņiem upuriem, Redleikas kopienā izplatījās ziņas par vēl viena studenta arestu saistībā ar 21. martā notikušo apšaudi skolā. Varasiestādes oficiāli neko vairāk nekomentēja, kā tikai apstiprināja šodien veikto arestu. Tomēr avots ar zināšanām par izmeklēšanu pastāstīja ¨Minneapolis Star-Tribune¨, ka tas bija Luiss Džordēns, 16 gadus vecais ¨Red Lake Tribal¨ priekšsēdētāja Floida Džordēna dēls. Pašlaik nav zināms, kāda apsūdzība tiks uzrādīta vai kā iestādes atrada zēnu, bet federālajā tiesā ir sākusies tiesvedība nepilngadīgā lietā.
mt: Today, when Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were buried, Red Lake community spread news about the arrest of another student in connection with the shooting at the school on March 21. The official of the school district did not comment anything more than just confirming the arrest today. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the "Minneapolis Star-Tribune" that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year-old son of the chairman of the "Red Lake Tribal" Floyd Jourdain. It is not known what charge will be filed or how the authorities found the boy, but a federal court has begun a trial in a juvenile case.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Protesta organizatori teica, ka Vācijas pilsētās, piemēram, Berlīnē, Ķelnē, Hamburgā un Hannoverē, ieradās ap 100 000 cilvēku. Berlīnē policija lēsa, ka bija 6500 protestētāju. Protesti notika arī Parīzē, Sofijā (Bulgārija), Viļņā (Lietuva), Valetā (Malta), Tallinā (Igaunija), kā arī Edinburgā un Glāzgovā (Skotija). Londonā aptuveni 200 cilvēki protestēja pie dažiem nozīmīgu autortiesību turētāju birojiem. Pagājušajā mēnesī, kad valsts parakstīja ACTA līgumu, Polijā norisinājās lieli protesti, tādēļ Polijas valdība nolēma šo līgumu pagaidām neratificēt. Gan Latvija, gan Slovākija vilcinājās pievienoties ACTA līgumam.
mt: 100,000 protesters marched in cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia (Bulgaria), Vilnius (Lithuania), Valletta (Malta), Tallinn (Estonia), Edinburgh and Glasgow (Scotland). In London, about 200 protesters demonstrated outside several major copyright holder offices. Last month, when the state signed the ACTA treaty, Poland saw large protests, so the Polish government decided to postpone ratification of the treaty. Both Latvia and Slovakia were reluctant to join the ACTA treaty.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Reģistrēti apmēram 60 gadījumi par iPod darbības traucējumiem sakarā ar ierīces pārkaršanu, kā rezultātā pavisam kopā ir izraisīti seši ugunsgrēki, kuros četri cilvēki guvuši nelielus apdegumus. Japānas Ekonomikas, tirdzniecības un rūpniecības ministrija (METI) vēsta, ka tai ir zināmi 27 ar šīm ierīcēm saistīti negadījumi. Pagājušonedēļ METI paziņoja, ka uzņēmums „Apple” to ir informējis par 34 papildu pārkaršanas gadījumiem, ko uzņēmums nosaucis par ""nebūtiskiem"". Ministrija atbildēja, nosaucot Apple ziņojuma atlikšanu par ""patiešām nožēlojamu."""
mt: 60 incidents of iPod malfunctions have been reported to the Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI), resulting in six fires, four of which caused minor burns. METI has been informed of 34 additional incidents by Apple, which it has called "insignificant." METI has called Apple's failure to report the incidents "very regrettable."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Apple izpilddirektors Stīvs Džobss atklāja jauno ierīci, staigājot pa skatuvi un izņemot iPhone aparātu no džinsu kabatas. Savā 2 stundu ilgajā runā viņš norādīja, ka ""šobrīd ""Apple"" no jauna izgudros tālruni. Mēs ierakstīsim šo brīdi vēsturē""."
mt: "Apple" CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the new device while walking across a stage and removing an iPhone from his jeans pocket. In a two-hour presentation, he said, ""Today Apple is introducing a new phone.""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Vakar vakarā Laplatas pilsētā, kas atrodas 50 km (31 jūdzi) no Buenosairesas, pašreizējā senatore un Argentīnas pirmā lēdija Kristina Fernandesa de Kiršnere paziņoja par savu kandidatūru prezidenta amatam. Kirhneres kundze par savu nodomu kandidēt uz prezidenta amatu paziņoja Argentīnas teātrī — turpat, kur viņa sāka savu 2005. gada kampaņu, kandidējot senāta vēlēšanās Buenosairesas provinces delegātu sastāvā.
mt: Last night in the city of La Plata, which is 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, the current senator and first lady of Argentina, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for president. Kirchner's niece announced her intention to run for president in the Argentine theater — the same place where she began her 2005 campaign, running for a senatorial seat in the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "ACMA arī konstatēja, ka, neskatoties uz videoklipa straumēšanu internetā, ""Lielais Brālis"" nav pārkāpis tiešsaistes satura cenzūras likumus, jo plašsaziņas līdzekļi nav saglabāti ""Lielā Brāļa"" tīmekļa vietnē. Apraides pakalpojumu likums paredz interneta satura regulēšanu, tomēr, lai to uzskatītu par interneta saturu, tam fiziski jāatrodas serverī."
mt: "ACMA also found that, despite the video being streamed online, "The Great Brother" has not breached online content censorship laws, as the media is not stored on "The Great Brother's" website. The Communications Services Act provides for the regulation of internet content, but in order to be considered internet content, it must be physically located on a server."
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Pīters Kostello, Austrālijas finanšu ministrs un cilvēks, kas kā Liberālās partijas līderis visdrīzāk stāsies premjerministra amatā pēc Džona Hovarda, ir izteicis savu atbalstu kodolenerģijas nozarei Austrālijā. Kostello kungs teica, ka tad, kad kodolenerģijas ražošana kļūs ekonomiski dzīvotspējīga, Austrālijai vajadzētu pievērsties tās izmantošanai. Ja tas kļūs komerciāls, mums arī tāds jāiegūst. Tas nozīmē, ka nav principiālu iebildumu pret atomenerģiju, norādīja Kostello kungs.
mt: Peter Costello, Australia's finance minister and the man most likely to succeed John Howard as Liberal Party leader, has expressed his support for nuclear power in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power becomes economically viable, Australia should consider using it. If it becomes commercial, we should have it too. It means there is no principled objection to nuclear power, Mr Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Pīters Kostello, Austrālijas finanšu ministrs un cilvēks, kas kā Liberālās partijas līderis visdrīzāk stāsies premjerministra amatā pēc Džona Hovarda, ir izteicis savu atbalstu kodolenerģijas nozarei Austrālijā. src: Ik dienas bija pieejamas tikai astoņpadsmit medaļas, taču daudzas valstis apbalvošanas pjedestālu nemaz nesasniedza. To vidū ir Nīderlande, jo tās pārstāve Anna Johemsena vakar sieviešu supergiganta tabulas klasē finišēja devītā, bet Somijas pārstāve Katja Sārinena tajā pašā kategorijā finišēja desmitā. Austrālietis Mičels Gorlijs finišēja vienpadsmitais vīriešu gigantiskajā slalomā, startējot stāvus. Čehu sāncensis Oldržihs Jelineks finišēja sešpadsmitais vīriešu gigantiskajā slalomā, startējot sēdus. Meksikas sportists Ārlijs Velaskess finišēja piecpadsmitais vīriešu gigantiskajā slalomā, startējot sēdus. Jaunzēlandes sportists Edams Hols finišēja devītais vīriešu gigantiskajā slalomā, startējot stāvus. Polijas vājredzīgais slēpotājs Macejs Krecels un pavadone Anna Ogarzinska supergigantā ieguva trīspadsmito vietu. Dienvidkorejietis Jongs Seorks Paks vīriešu supergigantā, ko veica sēdus, finišēja divdesmit ceturtais.
mt: 18 medals were available each day, but many countries failed to reach the podium. Among them are the Netherlands, whose representative Anna Hoogendijk finished ninth in the women's super giant slalom, but her compatriot Katja Saarinen finished tenth in the same category. Australian Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's giant slalom, starting in a wheelchair. Czech skier Oldrich Jelinek finished 16th in the men's giant slalom, starting in a wheelchair. Mexican skier Ariel Velasquez finished 15th in the men's giant slalom, starting in a wheelchair. New Zealand skier Ed Hols finished ninth in the men's giant slalom, starting in a wheelchair. Polish visually impaired skier Macej Krecel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska finished 13th in the super giant slalom. South Korean skier Yongs Seok Park finished 20th in the men's super giant slalom, starting in a wheelchair.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Tiesa notika Birmingemas Kroņa tiesā un noslēdzās 3. augustā. Televīzijas programmas vadītājs, kurš tika arestēts notikuma vietā, noliedza uzbrukumu un apgalvoja, ka izmantoja mietu, lai pasargātu sevi no pudelēm, ar kurām viņam meta līdz trīsdesmit cilvēkiem. Bleiks arī tika apsūdzēts par mēģinājumu izmainīt tiesvedības procesa gaitu. Tiesnesis teica Bleikam, ka tas ir ""gandrīz neizbēgami"", un viņš tiks nosūtīts uz cietumu."
mt: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and ended on August 3. The television program host, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed that he used a shield to protect himself from pots thrown at him by up to thirty people. Bleik was also charged with attempting to change the course of the trial. The judge told Bleik that it was "almost inevitable" and he will be sent to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Bali konferences dienas kārtībā ir ietverti arī tādi temati kā pasaules atlikušo mežu saglabāšana un tehnoloģiju kopīgošana, lai palīdzētu jaunattīstības valstīm stiprināties, mazāk piesārņojot vidi. ANO arī cer pabeigt fonda izveidi, lai palīdzētu tikt galā ar sekām tām valstīm, kuras skārusi globālā sasilšana. Nauda varētu tikt novirzīta māju izturībai pret plūdiem, labākai ūdens apsaimniekošanai un kultūraugu diversificēšanai.
mt: The conference also includes topics such as the preservation of the world's remaining forests and the sharing of technology to help developing countries strengthen themselves, less polluting the environment. The UN also hopes to complete the creation of a fund to help those countries affected by global warming. Money could be directed to improving homes against floods, better water management and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "Iepriekš Nigērija paziņoja, ka plāno pievienoties savienībai AfCFTA nedēļā pirms gaidāmā samita. Āfrikas Savienības tirdzniecības un rūpniecības komisārs Alberts Mučanga paziņoja par Beninas pievienošanos. Komisijas loceklis sacīja: ""Mēs vēl neesam vienojušies par izcelsmes noteikumiem un tarifu noteikumiem, taču mūsu rīcībā esošās pamatnostādnes ir pietiekamas, lai sāktu tirdzniecību 2020. gada 1. jūlijā""."
mt: "Previously, Nigeria announced that it plans to join the AfCFTA a week before the expected summit. The African Union's trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin's accession. The commission member said: ""We have not yet agreed on the rules of origin and tariff rules, but our current basic principles are sufficient to start trade on July 1, 2020."".
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Viņa tika augstu novērtēta, strādājot Atlantā, un saņēma atzinību par ieguldījumu inovatīvā urbānajā izglītībā. 2009. gadā viņai piešķīra Valsts gada superintendanta nosaukumu. Titula piešķiršanas brīdī Atlantas skolās bija ievērojami uzlabojušies eksāmenu rezultāti. Neilgi pēc tam laikraksts „The Atlanta Journal-Constitution” publicēja ziņojumu, kurā tika atklātas ar pārbaudes darbu rezultātiem saistītās problēmas. Ziņojums parādīja, ka testa rezultāti ir pieauguši neticami strauji, un apgalvoja, ka skola iekšēji atklāja problēmas, bet nerīkojās saistībā ar konstatējumu. Turpmākie pierādījumi norādīja, ka eksāmenu dokumenti bija viltoti. Holu kopā ar vēl 34 citiem izglītības darbiniekiem apsūdzēja 2013. gadā.
mt: She was highly praised for her work in Atlanta, and received recognition for her contributions to innovative urban education. In 2009, she was awarded the title of State Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the title award, test scores in Atlanta schools had significantly improved. Shortly thereafter, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that revealed problems with the test results. The report showed that test scores had increased dramatically, and alleged that the school had discovered problems internally, but did not act on the findings. Subsequent evidence revealed that the test documents had been forged. In 2013, Hall was among 34 other education officials charged with racketeering.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Viena bumba uzsprāga pie ģenerālgubernatora biroja ēkas. Divu stundu laikā netālu no valdības ēkām eksplodēja vēl trīs spridzekļi. Dažos ziņojumos vēstīts, ka oficiālais bojāgājušo skaits ir astoņi, bet oficiālajos ziņojums ir apstiprināts, ka ievainoto skaits nepārsniedz 30, taču galīgie skaitļi vēl nav zināmi.
mt: 1 bomb exploded near the governor's office building. Three more explosions occurred in the next two hours near the government buildings. Some reports say the official death toll is eight, but the official report is confirmed that the number of injured does not exceed 30, but the final numbers are not known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: "21 gadu vecais Hesus pievienojās ""Manchester City"" futbola klubam pagājušajā gadā, proti, 2017. gada janvārī, pārnākot no Brazīlijas kluba ""Palmeiras"" par publiski zināmo transfēra maksu £27 miljonu apmērā. Kopš tā laika brazīlietis kluba sastāvā ir aizvadījis 53 mačus visās sacensībās, kā arī iesitis 24 vārtus."
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City football club last year, January 2017, moving from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a publicly known transfer fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games in all competitions, scoring 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Apmēram plkst. 10:00 no rīta pēc vietājā laika islāma svētajā pilsētā Mekā sabruka kopmītņu ēka. Ēkā atradās vairāki svētceļnieki, kuri ieradās apmeklēt svēto pilsētu hādža svētceļojuma priekšvakarā. Hosteļa viesi galvenokārt bija Apvienoto Arābu Emirātu pilsoņi. Bojāgājušo skaits ir vismaz 15, un sagaidāms, ka šis skaitlis pieaugs.
mt: 10:00 am local time a hotel collapsed in the holy city of Mecca. The hotel was hosting pilgrims who had come to visit the holy city before the hajj pilgrimage. The guests were mainly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. At least 15 are reported dead and the death toll is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Satelīti, kuru abu svars pārsniedza 1000 mārciņas un kuri pārvietojās ar ātrumu aptuveni 17 500 jūdzes stundā, sadūrās 491 jūdzes virs Zemes. Zinātnieki uzskata, ka sadursmes radītā eksplozija bija grandioza. Viņi joprojām mēģina noteikt, cik liela bija katastrofa un kā tas ietekmēs Zemi. ASV Aizsardzības departamenta biroja Amerikas Savienoto Valstu stratēģiskā komanda novēro drupas. Kursa nolikšanas analīzes rezultāts tiks publicēts publiskā tīmekļa vietnē.
mt: 1000-pound satellites, which moved at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists believe the explosion was spectacular. They are still trying to determine how big the disaster was and how it will affect the Earth. The American Department of Defense's Strategic Command is monitoring the debris. The results of the impact analysis will be published on the Internet.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

The results of the impact analysis will be published on the Internet.

Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batens ierindojās 190. vietā 2008. gada 400 bagātāko amerikāņu sarakstā ar aplēsto bagātību $2,3 mljrd. apmērā. Viņš absolvēja Virdžīnijas Universitātes Mākslas un zinātņu fakultāti 1950. gadā un deva milzīgu ieguldījumu šai iestādei.
mt: He ranked 190th on the 2008 Forbes 400 list of richest Americans with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's School of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and made a major contribution to this institution.

src: "Kalifornijas štata gubernators Arnolds Švarcenegers parakstīja likumprojektu, kas aizliedz vardarbīgu videospēļu pārdošanu vai iznomāšanu nepilngadīgajiem. Likumprojekts pieprasa, lai vardarbīgas videospēles, kas tiek pārdotas Kalifornijas štatā, būtu apzīmētas ar uzlīmi ""18"", un to pārdošana nepilngadīgajam būtu sodāma ar naudas sodu 1000 USD apmērā par pārkāpumu."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled with an "18" rating, and the sale of such games to minors would be punishable by a $1000 fine."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvāls, kurš ir precējies un kuram ir divi pieauguši bērni, neatstāja lielu iespaidu uz Milleri, ar kuru bija saistīts stāsts. Kad viņam jautāja komentāru, Millers sacīja: ""Maiks noklausīšanās laikā daudz runā...es gatavojos, tāpēc īsti nedzirdēju, ko viņš saka."""
mt: "Mike, who is married and has two grown children, left a lasting impression on Miller, with whom he was involved in a story. When asked for a comment, Miller said, "Mike listens a lot... I'm ready, so I really didn't hear what he said.""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Otrdien pēc 25 minūšu ilgas tikšanās savā birojā ar Jaunās demokrātiskās partijas (NDP) vadītāju Džeku Leitonu premjerministrs Stīvens Hārpers piekrita valdības Likumu par tīru gaisu nosūtīt komitejai, kurā ietilpst visas partijas, lai tā to izskatītu pirms otrā lasījuma. Leitons tikšanās laikā ar premjerministru lūdza mainīt konservatīvo vides likumprojektu, pieprasot Konservatīvās partijas vides likumprojekta ""pilnīgu un galīgu pārrakstīšanu"". Kopš federālās valdības iesaistīšanās Mērsijas slimnīcas, kas atrodas Devonportā, Tasmānija, finansēšanas pārņemšanā valsts valdība un daži federālie parlamenta deputāti ir kritizējuši šo rīcību kā pirmsvēlēšanu triku saistībā ar novembrī sasaucamajām federālajām vēlēšanām. Taču premjerministrs Džons Hovards bija teicis, ka šāda rīcība tika veikta tikai ar mērķi aizsargāt slimnīcas telpas no Tasmānijas valdības plānotās samazināšanas, piešķirot papildu 45 miljonus Austrālijas dolāru."
mt: On Tuesday, after a 25-minute meeting with his office, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the Clean Air Act to a committee that includes all parties to review it before second reading. During the meeting with the prime minister, NDP leader Jack Layton asked to change the Conservative Party's environment bill, requesting a "complete and thorough rewrite" of the bill. Since the federal government's involvement in the funding of the Mersey Hospital, which is located in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal parliamentarians have criticized this action as a pre-election stunt in relation to the November federal elections. However, Prime Minister John Howard had said that this action was taken only to protect the hospital's facilities from the state government's planned cuts, giving an additional 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: No saindētās mājdzīvnieku barības mirušo dzīvnieku urīna analīzēs tika atrasta gan ciānurīnskābe, gan melamīns. Divi savienojumi reaģē viens ar otru, veidojot kristālus, kas var bloķēt nieru darbību, sacīja universitātes pētnieki. Pētnieki novēroja kristālus, kas veidojās kaķu urīnā, tam pievienojot melamīnu un cianūrskābi. Salīdzinot infrasarkano staru spektroskopijā (FTIR), šo kristālu sastāvs atbilst tiem, kas atrodami iesaistīto mājdzīvnieku urīnā.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Aģentūra „Xinhua” ziņoja, ka trešdien valdības izmeklētāji ir atguvuši divas „melnās kastes” — lidojuma datu ierakstītājus. Lunai cieņu izrādīja arī citi cīkstoņi, kas bija viņas līdzgaitnieki. Tomijs Drīmers sacīja: ""Luna bija pirmā Extreme karaliene. Mana pirmā menedžere. Luna nomira naktī, kad bija redzami divi Mēneši. Diezgan unikāli, tāpat kā viņa. Stipra sieviete."" Dastins Rannels, kas pazīstams kā ""Goldust"", komentēja, ka ""Luna bija tikpat dīvaina kā es...varbūt pat vēl dīvaināka...mīlu viņu un man viņas pietrūks...ceru, ka viņa tagad ir nonākusi labākā vietā."""
mt: "Xinhua news agency reported that on Wednesday, government investigators recovered two "black boxes" - flight data recorders. Luan was also appreciated by other wrestlers who were her contemporaries. Tommy Dreamer said: ""Luna was the first Extreme Queen. My first manager. Luna died at night when two Moons were visible. Quite unique, just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin Runnels, known as ""Goldust"", commented that ""Luna was as crazy as I... maybe even crazier... I love her and I will miss her... I hope she is now in a better place.""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Lai arī mājā atradās trīs cilvēki, kad tajā ietriecās automašīna, neviens no viņiem netika ievainots. Tomēr vadītājs guva smagas galvas traumas. Ceļš, kur notika avārija, uz laiku tika slēgts, kamēr avārijas dienesti no sarkanā Audi TT izvilka autovadītāju. No sākuma viņu hospitalizēja Džeimsa Pageta slimnīcā Greitjārmutā. Pēc tam viņu pārcēla uz Adebrukas slimnīcu Kembridžā.
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car crashed into it, but none of them were injured. However, the driver suffered serious head injuries. The road was closed temporarily while emergency services extracted the driver from his red Audi TT. He was initially taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth, before being transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: "Spēles sākās plkst. 10:00 lieliskos laikapstākļos, un, ja neskaita rīta vidusdaļas nelielo lietu, kas ātri beidzās, tā bija lieliska diena ""7"" regbijam. Dienvidāfrikas komanda, kuru uzskatīja par favorīti, turnīru sāka veiksmīgi ar rezultātu 26:00 viegli uzvarot turnīra 5. vietā izlikto Zambijas komandu. Kaut arī viņas neapšaubāmi izskatījās ierūsējušas, spēlējot pret savām dienvidu sāncensēm, Dienvidāfrika turnīra gaitā viņas neatlaidīgi uzlaboja savu sniegumu. Viņu disciplinētā aizsardzība, bumbas apstrādes prasmes un lieliskais komandas darbs lika viņiem izcelties, un bija skaidrs, ka šī ir grūti sakaujama komanda."
mt: "The game started at 10:00 in great weather, and, if you don't count the morning's light rain, which quickly stopped, it was a great day for the "7" rugby. The South African team, which was considered the favorite, started the tournament well with a result of 26:0 easily beating the 5th place Zambia team. Although they looked a bit worn out, playing against their southern rivals, South Africa improved their performance throughout the tournament. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and great team work made them stand out, and it was clear that this was a hard to beat team."
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Neskatoties uz to, ka Ķīna oficiāli joprojām ir komunistiska valsts, pēdējo trīsdesmit gadu laikā tajā ir attīstījusies tirgus ekonomika. Pirmās ekonomiskās reformas tika veiktas Dena Sjaopina vadībā. Kopš tā laika Ķīnas ekonomika ir pieaugusi par 90 reizēm. Pagājušajā gadā Ķīna pirmo reizi eksportēja vairāk automašīnu nekā Vācija un pārspēja Amerikas Savienotās Valstis kā lielāko tirgu šajā nozarē. Turpmākajos divdesmit gados Ķīnas IKP varētu pārsniegt ASV rādītājus.
mt: Despite China being officially a communist state, over the last thirty years a market economy has developed. The first economic reforms were made under Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown by 90 times. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market in this sector. In the next twenty years, China's GDP could surpass that of the United States.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: "Mēs centīsimies līdz 2020. gadam ar ievērojamu starpību attiecībā pret 2005. gada līmeni samazināt oglekļa dioksīda emisijas uz IKP vienību, sacīja Hu. Viņš nenoteica konkrētu samazinājuma rādītāju, sakot, ka tas būs atkarīgs no Ķīnas ekonomiskajiem rezultātiem. Hu aicināja attīstības valstis ""izvairīties no vecās pieejas, no sākuma piesārņojot un pēc tam satīrot."" Viņš piebilda, ka ""viņiem tomēr nevar izvirzīt prasību uzņemties pienākumus, kuri neatbilst viņu attīstības posma, atbildības līmenim un iespējām."""
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin compared to 2005," Hu said. He did not specify a target reduction, saying it would depend on China's economic performance. Hu urged developing countries to "avoid the old approach of polluting first and cleaning up later." He added that "they cannot be asked to take on responsibilities that are not commensurate with their development stage, level of responsibility and capabilities."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Medicīnas labdarības organizācija ""Mangola"", ""Medecines Sans Frontieres"" un Pasaules Veselības organizācija apgalvo, ka tas ir vissliktākais slimības uzliesmojums valstī. Medecines Sans Frontiere pārstāvis Ričards Vērmans sacīja: ""Angola tuvojas visu laiku lielākajam uzliesmojumam, un Angolā situācija joprojām ir ļoti slikta,"" viņš teica."
mt: "Medecines Sans Frontieres" and the World Health Organization say this is the worst outbreak in the country's history. Medecines Sans Frontieres spokesman Richard Valery said, "Angola is approaching the worst outbreak ever, and the situation in Angola is still very bad."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Valsts prokuratūras direktors Kīrs Starmers (QC - Karalienes advokāts) šorīt sniedza paziņojumu, informējot par lietas ierosināšanu pret Hūnesu un Praisu. Hūne ir atkāpies, un kabinetā viņu aizstās deputāts Eds Deivijs. Tiek gaidīts, ka deputāts Normens Lembs saņems uzņēmējdarbības ministra amatu, kurā iepriekš strādāja Deivijs. Hūnem un Praisam jāierodas Vestminsteras miertiesā 16. februārī.
mt: The Queen's Counsel, Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer, announced the case against Hoon and Paise. Hoon has fled, and in the cabinet he is replaced by Deputy Ed Davies. It is expected that Deputy Norman Lamb will take the post of Minister of Business, which was previously held by Davies. Hoon and Paise must appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "Kamila Sensāna franču operā izklāstītais stāsts ir par mākslinieku ""kura dzīvi nosaka mīlestība pret narkotikām un Japānu."" Tā rezultātā izpildītāji uz skatuves smēķē marihuānu un izrādes laikā skatītāji tiek aicināti iesaistīties."
mt: "Kamila Senussa's French opera is a story about an artist "whose life is defined by love for drugs and Japan." As a result, performers smoke marijuana on stage and the audience is invited to participate."
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "Ļeonovs, pazīstams arī kā ""kosmonauts Nr. 11"", bija Padomju Savienības kosmonautu sākotnējā sastāvā. 1965. gada 18. martā viņš veica pirmo ārpuskuģa aktivitāti (EVA) jeb ""iziešanu kosmosā"", paliekot viens ārpus kosmosa kuģa nedaudz vairāk kā divpadsmit minūtes. Viņš par savu darbu saņēma Padomju Savienības augstāko apbalvojumu ""Padomju Savienības varonis"". Desmit gadus vēlāk viņš vadīja ""Apollo–Sojuz"" misijas padomju daļu, kas simbolizēja, ka ""Kosmosa sacensības"" ir beigušās."
mt: "Leonov, also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11", was a member of the original crew of the Soviet Union's first manned spacecraft. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extravehicular activity (EVA) or "spacewalk", remaining outside the spacecraft for more than 12 minutes. He was awarded the highest Soviet honor, "Hero of the Soviet Union", for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the "Apollo-Soyuz" mission, which symbolized the end of the "Space Race"."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Pēc negadījuma Gibsons tika aizvests uz slimnīcu, taču neilgi pēc tam nomira. 64 gadus vecais kravas automašīnas vadītājs sadursmē netika ievainots. Pats transportlīdzeklis tajā pašā dienā aptuveni plkst. 12:00 pēc GMT laika tika aizvests no notikuma vietas. Autoservisa darbinieks, kas strādāja netālu no negadījuma vietas, sacīja: ""Ceļa malā stāvēja bērni, lai šķērsotu to, un viņi visi kliedza un raudāja."" Viņi visi skrēja atpakaļ no vietas, kur notika negadījums."
mt: 64-year-old truck driver was not injured in the accident. The truck was removed from the scene at around 12:00 GMT. A mechanic who worked nearby said, "There were kids crossing the road, and they were all crying and screaming." They all ran away from the scene of the accident.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Paveiktais darbs galvenokārt bija teorētisks, taču programma tika rakstīta, lai simulētu Strēlnieka galaktikas veiktos novērojumus. Komandas meklēto efektu varētu izraisīt paisuma spēki starp galaktikas tumšo matēriju un Piena ceļa tumšo matēriju. Tieši tāpat kā mēness iedarbojas uz Zemi, izraisot plūdmaiņas, Piena ceļš iedarbojas uz Strēlnieka galaktiku. Zinātnieki varēja secināt, ka tumšā matērija ietekmē citas tumšās matērijas tādā pašā veidā kā parastā matērija. Šī teorija saka, ka lielākā daļa tumšās matērijas ap galaktiku atrodas apkārt galaktikai sava veida halo, un ir veidota no daudzām mazām daļiņām.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate the observations made by the Strömgren galaxy. The team's sought-after effect could be caused by the pressure of dark matter between the dark matter of the Strömgren galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way. Just as the moon affects Earth, causing tides, the Milky Way affects the Strömgren galaxy. Scientists could conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter. This theory says that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in the form of a halo around the galaxy, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "Debates izraisīja diskusijas par izdevumiem palīdzības sniegšanai un atjaunošanai viesuļvētras ""Katrīna"" dēļ; daži fiskālie, konservatīvie cilvēki to ar humoru bija nodēvējuši par ""Buša Jaunorleānas darījumu."" Liberāļu kritikas par atjaunošanas pasākumiem centrā ir aizdomas, ka Vašingtons atjaunošanas līgumus piešķir „saviem cilvēkiem”."
mt: The debates sparked discussions about the costs of aid and reconstruction due to Hurricane "Katrina"; some fiscal, conservative people jokingly called it the "Bush New Orleans deal." The liberal criticism of reconstruction efforts in the center is that Washington gives reconstruction contracts to "their people."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "Kad kapsula nokļūs uz Zemes un nonāks atmosfērā, apmēram plkst. 5:00 (pēc austrumu laika) paredzēts, ka tā cilvēkiem Ziemeļkalifornijā, Oregonā, Nevadā un Jūtā sniegs nelielu gaismas šovu. Kapsula izskatīsies diezgan līdzīga krītošai zvaigznei, kas redzama debesīs. Kapsula pārvietosies ar ātrumu aptuveni 12,8 km vai 8 jūdzes sekundē, pietiekoši ātri, lai no Sanfrancisko uz Losandželosu nokļūtu vienā minūtē. Stardust uzstādīs jaunu visu laiku rekordu kā ātrākais kosmosa kuģis, kas atgriezīsies uz Zemes, pārspējot iepriekšējo, 1969. gada maijā uzstādīto rekordu ""Apollo X"" komandas moduļa atgriešanās laikā. „Tā dosies pāri Ziemeļkalifornijas rietumu krastam un izgaismos debesis no Kalifornijas līdz centrālajai Oregonai, Nevadai un Aidaho, kā arī Jūtā,” vēstīja „Stardust” projektu vadītājs Toms Daksberijs."
mt: "Once the capsule reaches the Earth and enters the atmosphere, around 5:00 a.m. (Pacific Time) it is expected to give people in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah a small light show. The capsule will look quite similar to a falling star that can be seen in the sky. The capsule will move at a speed of about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to get from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record as the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, surpassing the previous record set in May 1969 by the Apollo X crew module. “It will fly over the west coast of Northern California and light up the sky from California to central Oregon, Nevada and Idaho, as well as Utah,” said Tom Dacke, project manager for Stardust. "
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
