src: Ohaio varasiestādes ziņo, ka ārste, kura strādāja Pitsburgas Bērnu slimnīcā Pensilvānijas štatā, tiks apsūdzēta par slepkavību vainu pastiprinošos apstākļos pēc tam, kad trešdien viņas māte tika atrasta mirusi viņas automašīnas bagāžniekā. 29 gadus vecā Dr. Malara Balasubramanjana tika atrasta Ohaio štata Blue Ash piepilsētā 15 jūdzes uz ziemeļiem no Sinsinat guļam uz zemes ceļa malā, ģērbusies T-kreklā un apakšveļā un acīmredzami smagā sazāļotā stāvoklī. Viņa norādīja policistiem uz savu melno „Oldsmobile Intrigue” markas automašīnu, kas atradās 500 pēdu attālumā. Tur viņi atrada 53 gadus vecā Saroja Balasubramaniana ķermeni, kas bija pārklāts ar asinīm notraipītām segām. Saskaņā ar policijas teikto izrādījās, ka līķis tur atradies aptuveni vienu dienu.
mt: 29-year-old Dr. Malara Balasubramanyan was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, 15 miles north of Cincinnati, lying on the side of the road in a T-intersection and undercarriage and apparently in a heavy state of intoxication. She pointed police to her black "Oldsmobile Intrigue" car, which was 500 feet away. Inside they found the body of her 53-year-old mother, Saroja Balasubramaniana, covered with blood-soaked cloths. According to police, it appeared the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Tas ir lielākais iegādes darījums eBay vēsturē. Uzņēmums cer dažādot savus peļņas avotus un iegūt popularitāti teritorijās, kurās programmai Skype ir spēcīga pozīcija, piemēram, Ķīnā, Austrumeiropā un Brazīlijā.
mt: It is the largest purchase in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue streams and gain popularity in areas where Skype has a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Kad pēc ievainoto nogādāšanas slimnīcā kautiņi bija pārtraukti, aptuveni 40 pārējie ieslodzītie palika pagalmā un atteicās atgriezties savās kamerās. Sarunu vedēji mēģināja labot situāciju, taču cietumnieku prasības neizdevās noskaidrot. Laikā starp plkst. 10:00 un 11:00 (pēc MDT laika) ieslodzītie pagalmā izraisīja ugunsgrēku. Drīz pagalmā ieradās dumpja novēršanai atbilstoši tērpušies virsnieki, un ieslodzītos sagūstīja, izmantojot asaru gāzi. Līdz plkst. 23:35 ugunsdzēsēju brigādēm beidzot izdevās apslāpēt liesmas.
mt: 40 inmates refused to return to their cells after the fight was broken up. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the inmates' demands were not clarified. Between 10:00 and 11:00 (MDT time) inmates in the yard started a fire. Soon the yard was visited by officers wearing riot gear, and the inmates were subdued with tear gas. It took until 23:35 for the fire to be extinguished.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "Televīzijas tiešraidē sniegtie komentāri bija pirmā reize, kad augstākstāvošie Irānas avoti atzina, ka sankcijām ir kāda ietekme. Tie ietver finansiālus ierobežojumus un Eiropas Savienības aizliegumu eksportēt jēlnaftu, no kuras Irānas ekonomika saņem 80% no saviem ārvalstu ienākumiem. Savā jaunākajā mēneša ziņojumā OPEC norādīja, ka jēlnaftas eksports ir samazinājies līdz zemākajam līmenim pēdējo divdesmit gadu laikā, sasniedzot 2,8 miljonus barelu dienā. Valsts augstākais līderis Ajatolla Alī Hamenejs raksturojis atkarību no naftas kā ""slazdu"", kas radies pirms Irānas islāma revolūcijas 1979. gadā, un no kā valstij būtu jāatbrīvojas."
mt: "Television reports were the first time Iran's top leaders acknowledged that sanctions have had an effect. They include financial restrictions and the European Union's ban on exporting crude oil, from which Iran's economy receives 80 percent of its foreign income. In its latest monthly report, OPEC said crude oil exports have fallen to the lowest level in the past 20 years, reaching 2.8 million barrels a day. The country's top leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei described the dependence on oil as a "curse" that came before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979, and from which the country must be freed."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Francijā vēlēšanās nekad nav izmantots daudz tehnoloģiju: vēlētāji ieiet kabīnē, ievieto drukāto lapu ar vēlamo kandidātu aploksnē. Pēc tam, kad ierēdņi ir pārbaudījuši balsotāja identitāti, balsotājs iemet aploksni vēlēšanu kastē un parakstās balsošanas reģistrā. Francijas vēlēšanu likums nosaka diezgan stingru kārtību attiecībā uz velēšanu procesu. Kopš 1988. gada vēlēšanu urnām ir jābūt caurspīdīgām, lai vēlētāji un novērotāji var apliecināt, ka vēlēšanu sākumā tajās nav nevienas aploksnes un ka netiek pievienotas nekādas citas aploksnes, izņemot pienācīgi reģistrēto un pilnvaroto vēlētāju aploksnes. Kandidāti var sūtīt pārstāvjus novērot ikvienu procesa daļu. Vakarā brīvprātīgie skaita balsis stingā uzraudzībā, ievērojot noteiktas procedūras.
mt: In France, elections have never used so many technologies: voters enter a booth, insert a printed ballot with the desired candidate on it. Then, after the officials have verified the voter's identity, the voter inserts the ballot into the voting box and signs the voting register. The French electoral law prescribes a rather strict procedure for the voting process. Since 1988, the voting urns must be transparent, so that voters and observers can certify that at the beginning of the election there are no ballots in them and that no other ballots are added, except for the properly registered and authorized voter ballots. Candidates can send representatives to monitor any part of the process. Last night, volunteers counted the votes under strict supervision, following a specific procedure.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Ja tiks saņemts apstiprinājums, ar šo atradumu beigsies Allena astoņu gadu meklējumi, lai atrastu Musaši. Pēc jūras gultnes kartēšanas vraku izdevās atrast ar zemūdens tālvadības aparāta palīdzību. Tiek ziņots, ka viens no bagātākajiem cilvēkiem pasaulē, Allens, ir daudz savu personīgo līdzekļu ieguldījis jūras pētniecībā un, ilggadīgās intereses par karu mudināts, uzsācis „Musashi” meklējumus.
mt: If confirmed, this discovery will end Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. The wreck was found with the help of a deep-sea guidance system. It is reported that one of the richest people in the world, Allen, has invested a lot of his personal assets in ocean research and, inspired by a long war, has begun the search for the Musashi.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Televīzijas pārraidēs redzams, ka no rūpnīcas nāk balti dūmi. Vietējās varas iestādes brīdina apkaimes iedzīvotājus palikt mājās, izslēgt gaisa kondicionētājus un nedzert ūdensvada ūdeni. Saskaņā ar Japānas Kodolenerģijas aģentūras ziņām spēkstacijā ir atklāts radioaktīvais cēzijs un jods. Varasiestādes lēš, ka tas liecina par to, ka ir pārplīsušas notikuma vietā esošās urāna degvielu saturošās tvertnes un tajās radusies noplūde.
mt: In a televised broadcast, white smoke is seen coming from the plant. Local authorities advise residents to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink water from the tap. According to the Japan Atomic Energy Agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected at the reactor site. Authorities say this indicates that the uranium fuel storage tanks at the site have ruptured and leaked.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "Dr. Tonijs Molls atklāja īpaši rezistento tuberkulozi (XDR-TB) Dienvidāfrikā, Kvazulu-Natālas reģionā. Intervijā viņš teica, ka jaunā variācija rada ""ļoti lielas bažas un satraukumu, jo tai ir ļoti augsts mirstības rādītājs."" Dr. Molls domā, ka daži pacienti varēja inficēties slimnīcā, un vismaz divi bija slimnīcas veselības aprūpes darbinieki. Gada laikā viena inficēta persona var inficēt 10 līdz 15 tuvas kontaktpersonas. Tomēr XDR-TB procentuālā izplatība ar tuberkulozi slimo cilvēku grupā ir zema; 6000 no 330 000 cilvēku, kas noteiktā laika brīdī inficēti Dienvidāfrikā."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa, in the KwaZulu-Natal region. In an interview he said, "This is a very scary and worrisome development because it has a very high mortality rate." Dr. Moll believes that some patients may have been infected in the hospital, and at least two were hospital health care workers. One infected person per year can infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB among people with tuberculosis is low; 6000 of 330,000 people infected in South Africa."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: „NextGen” ir sistēma, kura, pēc FAA teiktā, ļautu lidmašīnai lidot īsākus maršrutus un katru gadu ietaupīt miljoniem galonu degvielas, kā arī samazināt oglekļa emisiju. Tas izmanto satelītu tehnoloģiju, nevis vecāku zemes radaru tehnoloģiju, lai ļautu gaisa satiksmes dispečeriem ar lielāku precizitāti noteikt pilotu atrašanās vietu un sniegt pilotiem precīzāku informāciju.
mt: “NextGen” is a system that, according to FAA, would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year, as well as reduce carbon emissions. It uses satellite technology, not older ground radar technology, to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint the location of pilots more precisely and provide pilots with more precise information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Vēsturnieki ir kritizējuši iepriekšējās FIB politikas, jo resursi ir tikuši koncentrēti uz lietām, kas ir viegli atrisināmas, jo īpaši automašīnu zādzību lietām, lai uzlabotu aģentūras atrisināto lietu rādītāju. Kongress uzsāka finansējuma piešķiršanu piedauzības mazināšanas iniciatīvai 2005. fiskālajā gadā un noteica, ka FBI jānozīmē 10 aģenti pieaugušo pornogrāfijas apkarošanai.
mt: Historians have criticized previous FBI policies, as resources were concentrated on issues that are easily solved, especially car theft issues, to improve the agency's solved case rate. Congress began funding the reduction of auto theft initiative in the 2005 fiscal year and mandated that the FBI designate 10 agents to combat adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: "Apmēram 9:30 pēc vietējā laika (2:30 UTC) ""JAS 39C Gripen"" ietriecās skrejceļā un uzsprāga, pēc kā lidosta tika slēgta komerciālajiem lidojumiem. Pilots tika identificēts kā aviācijas majors Dilokrits Patavejs. Vietējie plašsaziņas līdzekļi ziņo, ka, dodoties uz izsaukumu, apgāzies lidostas ugunsdzēsības automobilis."
mt: 9:30 local time (2:30 UTC) a "JAS 39C Gripen" crashed on the runway and burst into flames, after which the airport was closed to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Major Dilokrits Patavejs. Local media report that, on the way to the call, a fire truck exploded.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

mt: 9:30 local time (2:30 UTC) a "JAS 39C Gripen" crashed on the runway and burst into flames, after which the airport was closed to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Major Dilokrits Patavejs. Local media report that, on the way to the call, a fire truck exploded.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Pagājušā gadsimta sešdesmitajos gados Bžezinskis strādāja pie Džona Kenedija kā viņa padomnieks un pēc tam Lindona Džonsona administrācijā. 1976. gada vēlēšanās viņš konsultēja Kārteru par ārpolitiku; pēc tam no 1977. līdz 1981. gadam no viņš ieņēma nacionālās drošības padomnieka (NSA) amatu, pārņemot Henrija Kisingera pienākumus. Viņš kā nacionālās drošības padomnieks palīdzēja Kārteram diplomātiski risināt starptautiskus jautājumus, piemēram, noslēdzot Kempdeividas vienošanos 1978. gadā, normalizējot ASV un Ķīnas attiecības 1970.-to gadu beigās, risinot jautājumus saistībā ar Irānas revolūciju, kas noveda pie Irānas ķīlnieku krīzes 1979. gadā, kā arī saistībā ar Padomju Savienības iebrukumu 1979. gadā.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy; after the election, from 1977 to 1981, he served as National Security Advisor, taking over Henry Kissinger's duties. As National Security Advisor, he helped Carter diplomatically resolve international issues, such as the Camp David Accords in 1978, normalizing U.S. and Chinese relations in the late 1970s, resolving issues related to the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis in 1979, as well as issues related to the Soviet Union's invasion in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: "Bobeks piedzima Horvātijas galvaspilsētā Zagrebā un  kļuva slavens, spēlējot Belgradas futbola komandā ""Partizan"". Viņš tiem pievienojās 1945. gadā un spēlēja komandā līdz 1958. gadam. Spēlējot šajā komandā, viņš savos 468 iznācienos guva 403 vārtus. Neviens cits nav piedalījies tik daudzās spēlēs vai guvis vairāk vārtu kluba sastāvā kā Bobeks. 1995. gadā viņš tika izvēlēts par labāko spēlētāju „Partizan” vēsturē."
mt: "Bobek was born in the capital of Croatia, Zagreb, and became famous playing for the Belgrade football club "Partizan". He joined them in 1945 and played for the club until 1958. Playing for this club, he scored 403 goals in his 468 appearances. No one else has played in so many games or scored so many goals for the club as Bobek. In 1995 he was elected the best player in the history of "Partizan". "
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae ir Dromaeosauridae dzimtas suga, kas radniecīga arī ar Velociraptor sugu. Tika uzskatīts, ka šis pilnīgi spalvainais, siltasiņu plēsīgais putns ir staigājis taisni uz divām kājām ar nagiem līdzīgi kā velosireptors. Tā otrais nags bija lielāks, kā rezultātā šim dinozauram tika piešķirts nosaukums Hesperonychus, kas nozīmē ""rietumu nags."""
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a member of the Dromaeosauridae family, closely related to the Velociraptor. It was thought to be a fully feathered, warm-blooded predator that walked upright on two legs with claws like a velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, so this dinosaur was given the name Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw.""
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Pasākumā piedalījās vismaz 100 cilvēki, lai nosvinētu jaunā pāra viena gada kāzu jubileju. Oficiālais gadadienas atzīmēšanas pasākums bija plānots vēlāk, sacīja amatpersonas. Pirms gada pāris apprecējās Teksasā un ieradās Bufalo, lai nosvinētu kopā ar draugiem un radiem. 30 gadus vecais vīrs, kurš dzimis Bufalo, bija viens no četriem apšaudē nogalinātajiem, bet viņa sieva nebija cietusi.
mt: 100 people attended the celebration of the couple's first anniversary. The official anniversary celebration was planned later, officials said. A year ago, the couple married in Texas and moved to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old man, who was born in Buffalo, was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: "Kad ""Luno"" saplīsa, uz kuģa bija 120–160 kubikmetri degvielas, spēcīgais vējš un viļņi stūma to uz molu. Helikopteri izglāba divpadsmit apkalpes locekļus un vienīgā trauma bija lauzts deguns. 100 metru kuģis bija ceļā, lai paņemtu ierasto mēslojuma kravu, un sākotnēji amatpersonas baidījās, ka no kuģa krava varētu izlīt."
mt: "When the "Luna" sank, there were 120-160 cubic meters of fuel on board, a strong wind and waves pushed it onto the reef. Helicopters rescued twelve crew members and the only injury was a broken leg. The 100-meter ship was on its way to take on a regular cargo of sand, and initially officials were concerned that the ship's cargo could spill."
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Vautjē sasniegumi, neskaitot režisora darbu, ietver bada streiku 1973. gadā pret to, ko viņš uzskatīja par politisko cenzūru. Francijas likumi bija mainījušies. Viņa aktīvista darbība aizsākās 15 gadu vecumā, kad viņš 2. pasaules kara laikā iesaistījās Francijas pretošanās kustībā. Viņš dokumentēja sevi 1998. gada kinožurnālā. 20. gs. sešdesmitajos gados viņš devās uz neatkarību ieguvušo Alžīriju, lai mācītu, kā uzņemt filmas.
mt: His achievements, apart from his directorial work, include a 1973 strike against what he considered political censorship. French laws had changed. His activist career began at age 15 during World War II when he participated in the French Resistance. He documented himself in a 1998 film journal. In the 1960s he went to independent Algeria to learn how to make films.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Lai piedalītos bērēs, Romā ieradās vairāk nekā četri miljoni cilvēku. Klātesošo cilvēku skaits bija tik liels, ka visiem nebija iespējams piekļūt bērēm Svētā Pētera laukumā. Dažādās Romas vietās tika uzstādīti vairāki lieli televizora ekrāni, lai cilvēki varētu vērot ceremoniju. Daudzās citās Itālijas pilsētās un pārējās pasaules valstīs, jo īpaši Polijā, rīkojās līdzīgi,  un translāciju vēroja liels daudzums cilvēku.
mt: 4 million people attended the wedding in Rome. The crowd was so large that not everyone could get to the ceremony in St. Peter's Square. Large TV screens were set up in various parts of Rome, so people could watch the ceremony. Similar events were held in other Italian cities and around the world, especially in Poland, and a large number of people watched the live broadcast.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Spriežot pēc ziņojumiem, eksploziju Makbetstrītas dzīvoklī izraisīja gāzes noplūde. Pēc tam, kad kaimiņš pa tālruni paziņoja par gāzes noplūdi, uz notikuma vietu devās gāzes uzņēmuma pārstāvis. Kad ieradās ierēdnis, dzīvoklis uzsprāga. Netika ziņots par smagiem ievainojumiem, taču vismaz pieciem cilvēkiem, kas sprādziena brīdī atradās notikuma vietā, tika novēroti šoka simptomi. Dzīvoklī neviena nebija. Tobrīd no teritorijas tika evakuēti gandrīz 100 iedzīvotāji.
mt: According to reports, the explosion in the apartment on Makbet Street was caused by a gas leak. After a neighbor called to report a gas leak, a gas company representative came to the scene. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. There were no reports of serious injuries, but at least five people who were at the scene at the time of the explosion were observed to have shock symptoms. No one was in the apartment at the time. At the time, almost 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Bojāgājušie bija 25 gadus vecais Nikolass Aldens un 21 gadu vecais Zaharijs Kudebaks. Šoferis bija Kudebaks. Edgars Vegilla guva rokas un žokļa ievainojumus, savukārt Kristoferam Šneideram bija nepieciešama sejas rekonstruktīvā ķirurģija. Uka ierocis neprecīzi izšāva, kad viņš tēmēja uz piektā vīrieša galvu. Šnaideram ir nepārejošas sāpes, vienas acs aklums, trūkst galvaskausa daļas un seja atjaunota no titāna. Šneiders nodeva liecību, izmantojot video saiti no USAF bāzes savā dzimtenē.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zahari Kudebaks were killed. The driver was Kudebaks. Edgars Vegilla suffered hand and jaw injuries, while Kristofer Schnieder required facial reconstructive surgery. Uka's gun misfired when he was aiming at the fifth man's head. Schnieder has permanent pain, one eye blindness, a missing skull portion and his face was reconstructed with titanium. Schnieder gave a statement using a video link from his home country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Gan golfs, gan regbijs tiks atkal iekļauts Olimpisko spēļu sporta veidos. Starptautiskā Olimpiskā komiteja šodien Berlīnē notikušajā valdes sēdē balsoja par sporta veidu iekļaušanu. No pieciem citiem sporta veidiem tika izvēlēti regbijs, īpaši regbija savienība, un golfs, lai apsvērtu to iekļaušanu olimpiskajās spēlēs. Skvošs, karatē un rollersports mēģināja iekļūt olimpiskajā programmā, kā arī beisbols un softbols, kuri 2005. gadā tika izbalsoti no olimpiskajām spēlēm. Balsojums joprojām vēl pilnīgi jāratificē SOK oktobra sanāksmē Kopenhāgenā.
mt: Golf and rugby will be back in the Olympic sports program. The International Olympic Committee voted in Berlin today to include the sports in the Olympic program. Of the five other sports, rugby union and golf were selected to be included in the Olympic Games. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get into the Olympic program, as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote still needs to be ratified by the IOC in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

The vote still needs to be ratified by the IOC in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 1759. gada 24. septembrī Arturs Giness Dublinā, Īrijā, parakstīja 9000 gadu ilgu īres līgumu ar alus darītavu „St. James's Gate Brewery”. 250 gadus vēlāk Guinness ir kļuvis par starptautisku uzņēmumu, kura apgrozījums ik gadu sasniedz vairāk nekā 10 miljardus euro (14,7 mljrd. ASV dolāru).
mt: 1759. September 24, Arthur Guinness signed a 9000 year lease with the St. James's Gate Brewery. 250 years later Guinness became an international company, with annual revenue of more than 10 billion euros (14.7 billion US dollars).
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Ir apstiprināts, ka cilvēkiem nāvējošās putnu gripas celms H5N1 ir inficējis beigtu savvaļas pīli, kas pirmdien atrasta purvājā netālu no Lionas Francijas austrumos. Francija ir septītā Eiropas Savienības valsts, kura cieš no šī vīrusa, ierindojoties aiz Austrijas, Vācijas, Slovēnijas, Bulgārijas, Grieķijas un Itālijas. H5N1 gadījumi Horvātijā un Dānijā, par kuriem ir aizdomas, joprojām nav apstiprināti.
mt: It has been confirmed that the H5N1 avian flu virus that is fatal to humans has infected a wild pheasant found Monday in a marsh near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh European Union country to be hit by this virus, ranking after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Outbreaks in Croatia and Denmark, which are suspected, have not been confirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: ANO miera uzturētāji, kuri ieradās Haiti pēc 2010. gada zemestrīces, tiek vainoti slimības izplatīšanā, kas sākās karaspēka apmetnes tuvumā. Saskaņā ar tiesas prāvā pieejamo informāciju atkritumi ANO nometnē netika pienācīgi dezinficēti, tādējādi izraisot baktēriju iekļūšanu vienas no Haiti lielākās upes, proti, Artibonites pietekā. Pirms karaspēka ienākšanas Haiti nebija saskārusies ar šīs slimības izraisītajām problēmām kopš 1800. gadiem. Haiti Tiesiskuma un demokrātijas institūts atsaucās uz neatkarīgiem pētījumiem, kas rosina domāt, ka ANO Nepālas miera uzturēšanas bataljons neapzināti ieveda šo slimību Haiti. ANO eksperte šīs slimības apkarošanā Daniela Lantoņa norādīja, ka slimības izplatīšanos, visticamāk, izraisīja miera uzturētāji.
mt: United Nations peacekeepers who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake are being blamed for the spread of disease that began at the peacekeeping base. According to information available in the court, the waste at the UN camp was not properly decontaminated, allowing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Before the arrival of the peacekeeping force, Haiti had not experienced this problem since the 1800s. The Institute of Justice and Democracy in Haiti cites independent studies that suggest that the UN Nepalese peacekeeping battalion unwittingly brought this disease to Haiti. UN expert on disease control, Danielle Lantoni, said that the spread of the disease was most likely caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: Situācijas labošanai Īrijas valdība uzsver parlamentārās likumdošanas steidzamību. Pašlaik gan no sabiedrības veselības, gan krimināltiesību aspekta ir ļoti svarīgi pēc iespējas ātrāk pieņemt tiesību aktus, norādīja valdības pārstāvis. Veselības ministrs pauda bažas gan par to cilvēku labklājību, kuri izmanto iesaistīto vielu pagaidu likumību, gan par ar narkotikām saistītajām notiesāšanām, kas piespriestas kopš spēkā stājušās tagad nekonstitucionālās izmaiņas.
mt: The Irish government stresses the importance of parliamentary legislation. Currently, both from the perspective of public health and criminal law, it is very important to adopt laws as quickly as possible, said a government spokesman. The health minister expressed concerns about both the welfare of people who use the involved substance under the temporary constitutionality of the law, and about the sentences for drug-related crimes, which were set since the entry into force of the now unconstitutional changes.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "Losandželosas Policijas departamenta spīkers Kristofers Garsija sacīja, ka izmeklēšana par aizdomās turēto vīriešu dzimtes likumpārkāpēju drīzāk tiek veikta sakarā ar robežu pārkāpšanu nekā vandālismu. Zīme fiziski nebija bojāta; modifikācija tika veikta, izmantojot melnos brezentus, kas dekorēti ar miera un sirds zīmēm, lai pārveidotu ""O"" un varētu izlasīt mazo burtu ""e""."
mt: "Los Angeles Police Department spokesman Christopher Garrett said the investigation into the suspected family of men's criminal violation of the border is more likely to be related to vandalism than to the damage of the symbol; the sign was not physically damaged; the modification was made using black velvet, decorated with peace and heart symbols, to change the "O" and be able to read the small letter "e"."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: "Karno ir plaši pazīstams, taču pretrunīgi vērtēts angļu valodas pasniedzējs, kurš pasniedza skolās „Modern Education” un „King's Glory” un apgalvoja, ka viņam karjeras zenītā esot bijuši 9000 studentu. Savās piezīmēs viņš izmantoja vārdus, ko daži vecāki uzskata par rupjiem, kā arī esot lamājies klasē. „Modern Education” viņu apsūdzēja par neatļautu lielu reklāmu drukāšanu uz autobusiem, kā arī par melošanu, sakot, ka viņš ir galvenais angļu valodas pasniedzējs. Viņš arī iepriekš ir bijis apsūdzēts par autortiesību pārkāpumu, taču netika sodīts. Bijušais students sacīja, ka viņš ""klasē lietoja slengu, piezīmēs rakstīja, kā apgūt iepazīšanās prasmes, un vienkārši uzvedās kā studentu draugs""."
mt: "Karno is widely known, but controversial English teacher who taught at schools "Modern Education" and "King's Glory" and claimed to have taught 9000 students. In his notes he used words that some parents consider rude, and he was said to have misbehaved in class. "Modern Education" accused him of unauthorized large advertising on buses, as well as lying, saying that he is the main English teacher. He was also previously accused of copyright infringement, but was not convicted. A former student said that he ""used slang in class, wrote notes on how to learn greetings, and just acted as a student friend."""
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Bijušais filipīniešu policists sagrāba Honkongas tūristus par ķīlniekiem, nolaupot viņu autobusu Filipīnu galvaspilsētā Manilā. Rolando Mendoza ar savu M16 ieroci izšāva uz tūristiem. Līdz šim ir atbrīvoti vairāki ķīlnieki, bet vismaz sešiem ir apstiprināta nāves iestāšanās. Ātri vien tika atbrīvoti seši ķīlnieki, tostarp bērni un cilvēki gados, kā arī filipīniešu fotogrāfi. Fotogrāfi vēlāk ieņēma gados vecākas dāmas vietu, jo viņai bija nepieciešams iet uz tualeti. Mendoza tika sašauta.
mt: A former Philippine police officer seized Hong Kong tourists as hostages, stealing their bus in Manila, the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza shot at the tourists with his M16 rifle. So far, several hostages have been released, but at least six have been confirmed dead. Several hostages were quickly released, including children and elderly people, as well as Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an elderly woman, as she needed to go to the bathroom. Mendoza was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazīlija ir lielākā Romas katoļu valsts pasaulē, un Romas katoļu baznīca ir nepārtraukti pretojusies viendzimuma laulību legalizācijai šajā valstī. Brazīlijas Nacionālajā kongresā par legalizāciju ir diskutēts jau 10 gadus, un šādas civilās laulības pašlaik ir likumīgas tikai Riograndi du Sulā. Sākotnējo likumprojektu izstrādāja bijusī Sanpaulu mēre Marta Suplisī. Ierosinātais tiesību akts pēc grozījumu veikšanas tagad ir Roberto Džefersona rokās. Protestētāji cer par petīciju savākt 1,2 miljonus parakstu un novembrī iesniegt to Nacionālajam kongresam.
mt: Brazil is the largest Catholic country in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church has continuously opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in this country.  The issue has been discussed in the National Congress of Brazil for ten years, and such civil marriages are currently legal only in Rio Grande do Sul.  The initial bill was drafted by former São Paulo mayor Marta Suplicy.  The proposed rights act is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.  Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures and submit them to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Piecas minūtes pēc šova sākuma sacēlās vējš un minūti vēlāk tas sasniedza 70km/h... tad nāca lietus, taču tik spēcīgs un apjomīgs, ka tas sit pa ādu kā ar adatām; tad no debesīm sāka krist krusa un cilvēki krita panikā, kliedzot un gāžot viens otru nost no kājām. Es pazaudēju savu māsu un viņas draudzeni, un manā ceļā uz turieni bija divi invalīdi ratiņkrēslos, cilvēki vienkārši leca pāri un stumdīja viņus,"" norādīja Armands Versače."
mt: 5 minutes after the show started a wind picked up to 70km/h... then it started raining, but so hard and heavy that it stung like needles; then hail started falling from the sky and people were panicking, screaming and trampling each other. I lost my sister and her boyfriend, and on my way there were two invalids in wheelchairs, people were just falling over and trampling them," said Armand Versache.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Vētra, kas atrodas apmēram 645 jūdzes (1040 km) uz rietumiem no Kaboverdes salām, visticamāk, izkliedēs, pirms radīs draudus jebkādām sauszemes teritorijām, prognozē sinoptiķi. Fred šobrīd ir pieņēmusies stiprumā līdz 105 jūdzēm stundā (165 km/h) un virzās uz ziemeļrietumiem. Fred ir līdz šim spēcīgākais reģistrētais tropu ciklons Atlantijas okeāna dienvidu un austrumu daļā kopš satelītattēlu izgudrošanas, un tikai trešā lielākā viesuļvētra, kas reģistrēta uz austrumiem no 35° R. g.
mt: A storm, about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, is expected to weaken before posing any threat to land, forecasters say. Fred is currently at 105 mph (165 km/h) and moving west-northwest. Fred is the strongest recorded tropical cyclone in the southern and eastern Atlantic since satellite imagery was invented, and only the third largest hurricane to form east of 35° W.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Vētra, kas atrodas apmēram 645 jūdzes (1040 km) uz rietumiem no Kaboverdes salām, visticamāk, izkliedēs, pirms radīs draudus jebkādām sauszemes teritorijām, prognozē sinoptiķi. Fred šobrīd ir pieņēmusies stiprumā līdz 105 jūdzēm stundā (165 km/h) un virzās uz ziemeļrietumiem. Fred ir līdz šim spēcīgākais reģistrētais tropu ciklons Atlantijas okeāna dienvidu un austrumu daļā kopš satelītattēlu izgudrošanas, un tikai trešā lielākā viesuļvētra, kas reģistrēta uz austrumiem no 35° R. g.
mt: A storm, about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, is expected to weaken before posing any threat to land, forecasters say. Fred is currently at 105 mph (165 km/h) and moving west-northwest. Fred is the strongest recorded tropical cyclone in the southern and eastern Atlantic since satellite imagery was invented, and only the third largest hurricane to form east of 35° W.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n standarts darbojas gan 2,4 GHz, gan 5,0 GHz frekvencēs. Tas ļaus tam būt atpakaļsaderīgam ar 802.11a, 802.11b un 802.11g, ja vien bāzes stacijai ir divi radioaparāti. 802.11n ātrums ir ievērojami lielāks nekā tā priekšgājējiem ar maksimālo teorētisko caurlaidspēju 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n works in both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies. This allows it to be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has two radios. 802.11n's speed is significantly higher than its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Olimpiskajam zelta medaļniekam Sadraudzības spēlēs bija jāpeld 100 m un 200 m brīvajā stilā un trīs stafetēs, taču viņa sūdzību dēļ viņa sagatavotība tiek apšaubīta. Viņš nedrīkstēja lietot zāles, lai mazinātu sāpes, jo tie ir šajās spēlēs aizliegti pretsāpju līdzekļi.
mt: 2012 Olympic gold medalist was required to swim 100 and 200 meters freestyle and three relays, but his complaint is questioned. He was not allowed to use painkillers to reduce pain, as they are banned in these games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: "Amerikas Savienoto Valstu Ģeoloģijas dienesta starptautiskā zemestrīču karte neuzrādīja, ka iepriekšējā nedēļā Islandē būtu bijusi zemestrīce. Arī ""Islandes meteoroloģijas birojs"" pēdējās 48 stundās nav ziņojis par zemestrīcēm Heklas apkārtnē. Nozīmīgā zemestrīču aktivitāte, kuras rezultātā mainījās fāzes, notika 10. martā vulkāna virsotnes kalderas ziemeļaustrumu pusē. Tika ziņots par tumšiem mākoņiem kalna pakājē, kuri nav nekādā veidā saistīti ar vulkānisko aktivitāti. Mākoņi radīja neskaidrības par to, vai ir noticis reāls izvirdums."
mt: "The United States Geological Survey's International Seismological Centre did not report an earthquake in Iceland last week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office has not reported any earthquakes in the Hekla area in the last 48 hours. Significant earthquake activity, which changed the phases, occurred on March 10 in the northern part of the caldera's summit. Dark clouds were reported on the mountain's slopes, which are not related to volcanic activity. The clouds caused confusion as to whether there was a real eruption."
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: "Bezpilota Mēness satelīts ""Chandrayaan-1"" padzen Mēness trieciena zondi (MIP), kas pāri Mēness virsmai virzījās ar ātrumu 1,5 kilometri sekundē (3000 jūdzes stundā) un veiksmīgi avarēja, piezemējoties Mēness dienvidu pola tuvumā. Mēness zondē atradās ne tikai trīs svarīgi zinātniskās izpētes instrumenti, bet tai no visām pusēm bija uzkrāsots arī Indijas valsts karoga attēls."
mt: "The unmanned Moon Impact Probe (MIP) of India's Chandrayaan-1 lunar satellite was ejected from the Moon Impact Probe, which was flying over the Moon's surface at a speed of 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour) and successfully crashed, slowing down near the Moon's southern pole. The Moon probe contained not only three important scientific research instruments, but it was also covered with an image of the Indian state flag from all sides."
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Par pirmajiem šīs sezonas slimības gadījumiem tika ziņots jūlija beigās. Slimību pārnēsā cūkas, no kurām odi tad pārnes slimību uz cilvēkiem. Uzliesmojums ir licis Indijas valdībai veikt tādus pasākumus kā cūku ķērāju izvietošana nopietni skartajās teritorijās, tūkstošiem pretodu aizkaru izplatīšana un pesticīdu izsmidzināšana. Valdība arī apsolījusi vairākus miljonus flakonu ar encefalīta vakcīnu, kas palīdzēs sagatavot veselības aprūpes institūcijas nākamajam gadam. Vakcīnu piegādes plāni vēsturiski visapdraudētākajām teritorijām šogad ir aizkavējušies sakarā ar līdzekļu nepietiekamību un zemo prioritizācijas pakāpi salīdzinājumā ar citām slimībām.
mt: The first cases of the disease were reported at the end of July. The disease is spread by infected cattle, which then spread the disease to humans. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to take measures such as the distribution of cattle traps in heavily affected areas, the distribution of thousands of disinfectant sprayers and the spraying of pesticides. The government has also promised several million doses of an encephalitis vaccine, which will help prepare health care institutions for next year. The plans to deliver the vaccine to the historically most vulnerable areas this year have been delayed due to a lack of supplies and a low priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Ierosinātais grozījums abās palātās tika atbalstīts jau 2011. gadā. Šajā likumdošanas izskatīšanas sesijā tika veiktas izmaiņas, kad otro teikumu vispirms svītroja Pārstāvju palāta un pēc tam pirmdien to līdzīgā veidā apstiprināja Senāts. Otrā sprieduma neveiksme, kas ierosina aizliegt viendzimuma civilās savienības, varētu pavērt durvis civilajām savienībām nākotnē. Procesam beidzoties, HJR-3 atkārtoti izskatīs nākamā ievēlētā likumdevēja vara 2015. vai 2016. gadā, lai tā arī turpmāk tiktu iesaistīta procesā.
mt: 2011, the proposed amendment was supported by both houses. This legislative review session made changes when the first sentence was first shot by the House of Representatives and then on Monday in a similar way approved by the Senate. The second verdict, which prohibits same-sex civil unions, could open the door to civil unions in the future. The process finally, HJR-3 will again review the next elected legislative power in 2015 or 2016, so it will also be involved in the process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: "Ar terminu ""Panamas dokumenti"" tiek apzīmēti aptuveni desmit miljoni Panamas juridiskās firmas „Mossack Fonseca” dokumentu, kas 2016. gada pavasarī tika nopludināti presē. Dokumenti parādīja, ka četrpadsmit bankas palīdzēja turīgiem klientiem slēpt bagātību miljardu ASV dolāru apmērā, lai izvairītos no nodokļiem un citiem noteikumiem. Britu laikraksts ""The Guardian"" izteica pieņēmumu, ka ""Deutsche Bank"" kontrolēja apmēram vienu trešo daļu no visiem 1200 fiktīvajiem uzņēmumiem, kas tika iesaistīti šajā shēmā. Visā pasaulē notika protesti, vairākas kriminālvajāšanas, un Islandes un Pakistānas valdību vadītāji atkāpās."
mt: The term "Panama Papers" refers to about ten million documents of the Panamanian law firm "Mossack Fonseca" that were leaked to the press in the spring of 2016. The documents showed that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of dollars in assets to avoid taxes and other regulations. The British newspaper "The Guardian" estimated that "Deutsche Bank" controlled about one-third of the 1200 fictitious companies involved in this scheme. Protests, criminal investigations, and the resignation of the prime ministers of Iceland and Pakistan took place worldwide.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Gaisa satiksmes negadījumi Irānā ir bieži sastopami, jo tai ir novecojusi lidaparātu flote, kura tiek slikti uzturēta gan civiliedzīvotāju pārvadājumu, gan militāro operāciju vajadzībām. Starptautiskās sankcijas nozīmē, ka jaunas lidmašīnas nevar iegādāties. Šīs nedēļas sākumā policijas helikoptera avārijā bojā gāja trīs cilvēki un vēl trīs tika ievainoti. Pagājušajā mēnesī Irāna piedzīvoja briesmīgāko aviokatastrofu daudzu gadu laikā: ceļā uz Armēniju avarēja gaisa laineris, paņemot 168 dzīvības. Tajā pašā mēnesī Mašadā cita lidmašīna nobrauca no skrejceļa un ietriecās sienā, nogalinot septiņpadsmit cilvēkus.
mt: Aircraft accidents in Iran are common, as it has an aging fleet of aircraft that is poorly maintained for both civilian passenger and military operations. International sanctions mean that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Last week, three people were killed and three others injured when a police helicopter crashed. Last month, Iran suffered its worst air disaster in decades: a domestic flight crashed in Armenia, killing 168 people. In the same month, a plane crashed into a wall in Mashad, killing seven people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Irākas izpētes grupa prezentēja savu ziņojumu šodien plkst. 12:00 pēc GMT laika. Tas brīdina, ka neviens nevar garantēt, ka kāda konkrēta rīcība pašlaik varēs apturēt reliģisko karu, aizvien plašāko vardarbību un valsts ieslīgšanu haosā. Ziņojums sākas ar lūgumu par atklātām debatēm un vienprātības veidošanu Amerikas Savienotajās Valstīs attiecībā uz Tuvo Austrumu politiku. Ziņojumā ir ļoti kritiska attieksme pret gandrīz visiem pašreizējās izpildvaras politikas aspektiem attiecībā uz Irāku, un tas mudina nekavējoties mainīt virzienu. Pirmā no tā 78 rekomendācijām ir, ka līdz šā gada beigām būtu jāpieņem jauna diplomātiskā iniciatīva, lai nostiprinātu Irākas robežas pret naidīgiem uzbrukumiem un atjaunotu diplomātiskās attiecības ar kaimiņvalstīm.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today. It warns that no one can guarantee that any current action will stop the religious war, the ever-widening violence and the state's slide into chaos. The report begins with a request for open debate and consensus in the United States on Middle Eastern policy. The report has a very critical attitude towards almost all aspects of the current government's policy in Iraq, and it urges an immediate change of direction. The first of its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative be taken by the end of this year to strengthen Iraq's borders against hostile attacks and to restore diplomatic relations with neighboring countries.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Irākas izpētes grupa prezentēja savu ziņojumu šodien plkst. 12:00 pēc GMT laika. Tas brīdina, ka neviens nevar garantēt, ka kāda konkrēta rīcība pašlaik varēs apturēt reliģisko karu, aizvien plašāko vardarbību un valsts ieslīgšanu haosā. Ziņojums sākas ar lūgumu par atklātām debatēm un vienprātības veidošanu Amerikas Savienotajās Valstīs attiecībā uz Tuvo Austrumu politiku. Ziņojumā ir ļoti kritiska attieksme pret gandrīz visiem pašreizējās izpildvaras politikas aspektiem attiecībā uz Irāku, un tas mudina nekavējoties mainīt virzienu. Pirmā no tā 78 rekomendācijām ir, ka līdz šā gada beigām būtu jāpieņem jauna diplomātiskā iniciatīva, lai nostiprinātu Irākas robežas pret naidīgiem uzbrukumiem un atjaunotu diplomātiskās attiecības ar kaimiņvalstīm.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today. It warns that no one can guarantee that any current action will stop the religious war, the ever-widening violence and the state's slide into chaos. The report begins with a request for open debate and consensus in the United States on Middle Eastern policy. The report has a very critical attitude towards almost all aspects of the current government's policy in Iraq, and it urges an immediate change of direction. The first of its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative be taken by the end of this year to strengthen Iraq's borders against hostile attacks and to restore diplomatic relations with neighboring countries.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Saskaņā ar Ansa ziņām ""policija satraucās, ka dažu bīstamāko mafijas bosu slepkavības varētu izraisīt plaša mēroga pēctecības karu. Policija teica, ka Lo Pikolo bija virsvadonis, jo iepriekš bijis Provencano labā roka Palermo, bet viņa nepārspējamā pieredze nodrošināja vecākās mafijas bosu paaudzes cieņu, kad viņi turpināja Provencano taktiku nepiesaistīt lieku uzmanību, vienlaikus stiprinot savas varas tīklu. Šos bosus iegrožoja Provensāno, kad viņš pārtrauca Rīna vadīto karu pret valsti, kas 1992. gadā prasīja mafijas krustnešu Džovanni Falkones un Paolo Borselīno dzīvības."""
mt: "According to Ansa, police are concerned that the murders of some of the most dangerous mafia bosses could trigger a large-scale succession war. Police say that Lo Piccolo was the top boss, as he was the right hand of Provenzano in Palermo, but his unrivaled experience earned the respect of the older bosses of the mafia generations, as they continued Provenzano's tactic of avoiding attention, while strengthening their power network. These bosses were protected by Provenzano, when he ended the war against the state, which in 1992 demanded the lives of mafia crossbreeds Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Divu olimpisko zelta medaļu ieguvēja japāņu džudiste Hitoši Saito nomira 54 gadu vecumā. Kā nāves cēlonis tika nosaukts intrahepatisks žultsceļu vēzis. Viņš nomira otrdien, Osakā. Vēl bez bijuša olimpiskā un pasaules čempiona titula Saito savas nāves brīdī ieņēma arī Visjapānas džudo federācijas Treniņu komitejas priekšsēdētāja amatu.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoist Hitoshi Saito, who won two Olympic gold medals, died. He died on Tuesday in Osaka. He was also the chairman of the Japanese Judo Federation's Training Committee.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Sava ceļojuma laikā Ivasaki daudz reizes piedzīvoja nepatikšanas. Viņu aplaupīja pirāti, Tibetā viņam uzbruka traks suns, viņš izglābās no laulībām Nepālā un tika arestēts Indijā.
mt: Ivasaki had many strange experiences during his travels. He was attacked by pirates, a yak in Tibet, rescued from a marriage in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Džankarlo Fisičela zaudēja kontroli pār savu auto un beidza sacīkstes drīz vien pēc starta. Viņa komandas biedrs Fernando Alonso atradās vadībā gandrīz visu sacīkšu laiku, bet zaudēja šo pozīciju uzreiz pēc pitstopa, iespējams, slikti nostiprināta labā priekšējā riteņa dēļ. Mihaels Šumahers beidza savas ātrumsacīkstes neilgi pēc Alonso, jo daudzo cīņu dēļ bija bojāta piekare.
mt: 2006 Italian Grand Prix: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and retired early in the race. His teammate Fernando Alonso led almost the entire race, but lost the position immediately after the pit stop, possibly due to a poorly mounted front left tire. Michael Schumacher retired early in the race due to a crash.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Pēdējo 3 mēnešu laikā no centrālās aizturēto reģistrēšanas vietas tika atbrīvotas vairāk nekā 80 arestētās personas, kam neuzrādīja oficiālu apsūdzību. Šā gada aprīlī tiesnesis Glins pret iestādi pieņēma ierobežojošu rīkojumu, lai panāktu to personu atbrīvošanu, kas netiek atbrīvotas no centra vairāk nekā 24 stundas pēc aizturēšanas un kurām nav bijusi tiesas komisāra sēde. Pilnvarotais nosaka drošības naudu, ja tāda tiek piešķirta, un formalizē tā ierēdņa izvirzītās apsūdzības, kurš arestēja. Pēc tam apsūdzības tiek ievadītas valsts datorsistēmā, kurā lieta tiek izsekota. Lietas izskatīšanā arī tiek atzīmēts datums, kad aizdomās turētajam ir tiesības uz paātrinātu tiesas procesu.
mt: 80 people were released from the central detention facility in the last three months without being charged. In April this year, Judge Glins accepted a restraining order to release those who are not released from the center more than 24 hours after arrest and who do not have a court commissioner's hearing. The judge determines the bail amount, if any, and formalizes the charges brought by the arresting officer. Then the charges are entered into the state computer system, where the case is processed. The date of the hearing is also recorded when the person is detained on suspicion.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodins arī teica, ka amatpersonas nolēma atcelt vēlēšanu otro kārtu, lai afgāņiem ietaupītu izdevumus un novērstu drošības apdraudējuma iespējamību, ko radītu vēl vienas vēlēšanas. Diplomāti sacīja, ka viņi ir atraduši pietiekami daudz neskaidrību Afganistānas konstitūcijā, lai atzītu vēlēšanu kārtu par nevajadzīgu. Tas ir pretrunā ar iepriekšējiem ziņojumiem, kuros teikts, ka atkārtotu vēlēšanu atcelšana būtu bijusi pretrunā ar konstitūciju.
mt: The official also said that the decision to cancel the second round of the election was made to save costs and to avoid the possibility of security threats that could be caused by another election. Diplomats said they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to declare the second round of the election unnecessary. This is in contrast to previous reports that the cancellation of the second round of the election would be in violation of the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Kopš 1947. gada, kad Pakistāna ieguva neatkarību no Britu valdījuma, Pakistānas prezidents FATA pārvaldīšanai ir iecēlis ""politiskos aģentus"", kuri īsteno gandrīz pilnīgi autonomu kontroli pār šiem apgabaliem. Šie aģenti ir atbildīgi par valdības un tiesu pakalpojumu sniegšanu saskaņā ar Pakistānas Konstitūcijas 247. pantu."
mt: "Since 1947, when Pakistan gained independence from the British government, the Pakistani president has appointed "political agents" to administer the FATA, who exercise almost complete autonomy over these areas. These agents are responsible for the provision of government and judicial services in accordance with Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: "Filma, kurā piedalās Raiens Goslings un Emma Stouna, saņēma nominācijas visās galvenajās kategorijās. Goslings un Stouna saņēma attiecīgi ""Labākā aktiera"" un ""Labākās aktrises"" nominācijas. Pārējās nominācijās ietilpst labākā filma, režisors, kinematogrāfija, kostīmu dizains, filmu montāža, oriģinālmūzika, mākslinieka darbs, skaņas montāža, skaņa un oriģinālscenārijs. Divas filmas dziesmas — ""Audition (The Fools Who Dream)"" un ""City of Stars"" — saņēma nominācijas par labāko oriģināldziesmu. Studija ""Lionsgate"" saņēma 26 nominācijas — vairāk nekā jebkura cita studija."
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for "Best Actor" and "Best Actress" respectively. Other nominations include best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original score, makeup and hairstyling, sound editing, sound mixing, original screenplay. Two songs from the film, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars", received nominations for best original song. The studio "Lionsgate" received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Sabiedrisko mediju organizācija „NHK” arī ziņoja par to, ka Kašivadzaki-Karivas atomelektrostacija Niigatas prefektūrā darbojās normāli. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ziņoja, ka zemestrīce nav radījusi nekādas sekas, un ka Šikas atomelektrostacijas 1. un 2. reaktori ir tikuši izslēgti. Tiek ziņots, ka 9400 māju reģionā nav ūdensapgādes un aptuveni 100 mājām nav elektrības. Ietekmētajos apgabalos ir bojāti daži ceļi, pārtraukti dzelzceļa pakalpojumi, un Išikavas prefektūrā joprojām ir slēgta Noto lidosta.
mt: The NHK news organization also reported that the Kashivazaki-Kariva nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported that the earthquake had not caused any damage, and that the Shika nuclear power plant's 1st and 2nd reactors had been shut down. It was reported that 9400 homes in the region were without water and about 100 homes were without electricity. Roads were damaged and rail service was disrupted in affected areas, and Ishikawa Prefecture's Noto airport was still closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Saskaņā ar noplūdi dokuments atsauksies uz strīdu par robežām, kuras vēlas Palestīna, balstoties uz robežsituāciju pirms 1967. gada Tuvo Austrumu kara. Kā ziņots, tika pārrunāti arī tādi temati kā Jeruzalemes, kas ir svēta abām tautām, turpmākais stāvoklis un Jordānas ielejas jautājums. Izraēla pieprasa pastāvīgu militāro klātbūtni ielejā uz desmit gadiem pēc līguma parakstīšanas, bet PI piekrīt šādai klātbūtnei tikai uz pieciem gadiem.
mt: According to the leaked document, the dispute is over borders, which the Palestinians want based on the pre-1967 borders of the Six-Day War. It was reported that the talks also covered issues such as Jerusalem, the future status and the Jordan Valley. Israel demands a permanent military presence in the valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, but the PA agrees to such a presence only for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Saskaņā ar noplūdi dokuments atsauksies uz strīdu par robežām, kuras vēlas Palestīna, balstoties uz robežsituāciju pirms 1967. gada Tuvo Austrumu kara. Kā ziņots, tika pārrunāti arī tādi temati kā Jeruzalemes, kas ir svēta abām tautām, turpmākais stāvoklis un Jordānas ielejas jautājums. Izraēla pieprasa pastāvīgu militāro klātbūtni ielejā uz desmit gadiem pēc līguma parakstīšanas, bet PI piekrīt šādai klātbūtnei tikai uz pieciem gadiem.
mt: According to the leaked document, the dispute is over borders, which the Palestinians want based on the pre-1967 borders of the Six-Day War. It was reported that the talks also covered issues such as Jerusalem, the future status and the Jordan Valley. Israel demands a permanent military presence in the valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, but the PA agrees to such a presence only for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "Mā ir dzimis Honkongā, un viņš studēja Ņujorkas Universitātē un Hārvarda Universitātes Tieslietu fakultātē. Viņam ir bijusi  Amerikas pastāvīgā iedzīvotāja ""zaļā karte"". Vēlēšanu laikā Hsjē arī netieši norādīja, ka krīzes laikā Ma varētu aizbēgt no valsts. Hsjē arī apgalvoja, ka fotogēniskajam Ma bija vairāk stila nekā satura. Neskatoties uz šiem apvainojumiem, Ma prasmīgi uzvarēja, pateicoties tam, ka solīja veidot ciešākas attiecības ar kontinentālo Ķīnu."
mt: "He was born in Hong Kong, and studied at New York University and Harvard Law School. He had a green card as a permanent American resident. During the election, Ma also hinted that he could flee the country during a crisis. Ma also claimed that Ma had more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily, thanks in part to his promise to forge closer ties with mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."
