src: "Pēc tam, kad kļuva skaidrs, ka daudzas ģimenes meklē juridisko palīdzību, lai cīnītos pret izlikšanu no mājokļiem, 20. martā Austrumlīča sabiedrības tiesību aizsardzības centrs organizēja sanāksmi mājokļu krāpniecības shēmas upuriem. Kad īrnieki sāka stāstīt, kas viņiem bija noticis, lielākā daļa iesaistīto ģimeņu pēkšņi saprata, ka Kerolīna Vilsone no ""OHA"" ir nozagusi viņu drošības depozītus un devusies prom no pilsētas. Īrnieki ""Lokvudas dārzos"" uzskata, ka varētu būt vēl 40 vai vairāk ģimenes, kurām jāsaskaras ar izlikšanu, jo viņi uzzināja, ka OHA policija izmeklē arī citus Oklendas publisko mājokļu īpašumus, kas varētu būt iesaistīti mājokļu krāpniecības lietā."
mt: 20 March, the Center for Social Rights Protection in Eastern Europe organized a meeting for victims of real estate fraud. When the tenants began to tell what had happened, most of the families suddenly realized that Carol Wilson from "OHA" had stolen their security deposits and gone away from the city. Tenants in "Lakewood Gardens" believe that there could be up to 40 or more families that need to deal with the fraud, as they learned that OHA police are investigating other public real estate properties that could be involved in the real estate fraud.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: "Pēc sacīkstēm Keselovskis saglabāja līderpozīcijas Autobraucēju čempionātā ar 2250 punktiem. Atpaliekot par 7 punktiem, Džonsons ar 2243 punktiem ieņem otro vietu. Trešajā Hamlins atpalika par divdesmit punktiem, lai gan viņam bija par pieciem punktiem vairāk nekā Boijeram. Kāne un Truē jaunākais ir piektajā un sestajā vietā attiecīgi ar 2220 un 2207 punktiem. Stjuarts, Gordons, Kensets un Harviks noslēdz ""Drivers' Championship"" desmitnieka pozīcijas, kad sezonā ir atlikuši vēl četri braucieni."
mt: 1. Keselovskis 2250 pts 2. Džonsons 2243 pts 3. Hamlins 2220 pts 4. Kāne 2207 pts 5. Truē 2207 pts 6. Stjuarts 2190 pts 7. Gordons 2185 pts 8. Kensets 2180 pts 9. Harviks 2175 pts 10. Boijers 2170 pts
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Tiek uzskatīts, ka šī ir piektā reize vēsturē, kad cilvēki ir novērojuši to, kas izrādījās ķīmiski apstiprināts Marsa materiāls, kas nokritis uz Zemes. No aptuveni 24 000 zināmo meteorītu, kas ir nokrituši uz Zemes, tikai aptuveni 34 meteorītiem ir apstiprināta izcelsme no Marsa. Piecpadsmit no šiem iežiem ir uzskatāmi par daļu no pagājušā gadā jūlijā novērotā meteorītu lietus. Daži no iežiem, kas ir ļoti reti sastopami uz Zemes, tiek pārdoti, sākot no 11 000 līdz 22 500 ASV dolāriem uncē, kas ir aptuveni desmit reizes dārgāk nekā maksā zelts.
mt: 24,000 known meteorites have fallen on Earth, and only about 34 of them are known to be from Mars. Fifteen of these meteorites are believed to be part of the meteorite shower observed in July last year. Some of the rarest meteorites on Earth are sold for between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more expensive than gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: "Šumaheram, kas beidza karjeru 2006. gadā pēc septiņas reizes uzvarētām 1. formulas meistarsacīkstēm, bija jāstājas savainotā Felipes Masas vietā. Avārijā 2009. gada Ungārijas ""Grand Prix"" posmā brazīlietis guva nopietnu galvas traumu. Masa nevarēs piedalīties sacīkstēs vismaz visu atlikušo 2009. gada sezonu."
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, who retired after seven world titles in 2006, was forced to replace Felipe Massa, who suffered a serious head injury in a crash at the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009. Massa will not be able to compete in the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: "Līdz šim AOL ir spējis virzīt un attīstīt IM tirgu savā tempā, pateicoties tā plašajai izmantošanai Amerikas Savienotajās Valstīs. Ņemot vērā minēto vienošanos, šī brīvība var beigties. Apvienotais Yahoo! un ""Microsoft"" pakalpojumu lietotāju skaits konkurēs ar ""AOL"" klientu skaitu."
mt: "Until now, AOL has been able to grow and develop the IM market at its own pace, thanks to its wide use in the United States. Taking this agreement into account, this freedom may end. The combined Yahoo! and Microsoft service user base will compete with AOL's client base."
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Automašīnā ievietots spridzeklis, kas vakar no rīta uzsprāga pie Gaziantepas policijas administrācijas Turcijā, nogalināja divus policistus un ievainoja vairāk nekā divdesmit citus cilvēkus. Gubernatora birojs paziņoja, ka deviņpadsmit no ievainotajiem bija policisti. Policija paziņoja, ka par uzbrukuma izdarīšanu aizdomās tiek turēts cilvēks, kas tiek uzskatīts par organizācijas „Daesh” (ISIL) kaujinieku.
mt: A bomb placed in a police vehicle exploded outside the Gaziantep police headquarters in Turkey last night, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty others. The governor's office said nine of the injured were police officers. Police said a man suspected of being a member of the organization "Daesh" (ISIL) is being held for questioning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Bijušais Masačūsetsas gubernators Mits Romnijs otrdien uzvarēja Floridas Republikāņu partijas prezidenta priekšvēlēšanās ar 46% balsu pārsvaru. Bijušais ASV parlamenta apakšpalātas spīkers Ņūts Gingričs palika otrajā vietā ar 32%. Florida kā štats ar balsu vairākumu piešķīra visus savus 50 mandātus Romnijam, izvirzot viņu Republikāņu partijas kandidātu priekšgalā.
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary on Tuesday with a 46% margin of victory. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich remained in second place with 32%. Florida as a state awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, putting him in the lead for the Republican Party nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Bijušais parlamenta apakšpalātas spīkers Ņūts Gingričs, Teksasas gubernators Riks Perijs un kongresmene Mišela Bahmane ieņēma attiecīgi ceturto, piekto un sesto vietu. Pēc rezultātu paziņošanas Gingričs uzslavēja Santorumu, taču nelabvēlīgi izteicās par Romniju, kura vārdā Aiovas štatā pret Gingriču gaisā plīvoja nomelnojoši kampaņas plakāti. Perijs paziņoja: ""Es atgriezīšos Teksasā, lai novērtētu šīvakara slēgtās pirmsvēlēšanu sapulces rezultātus, un saprastu, vai es varu turpināt piedalīties šajā sacīkstē."" Taču vēlāk viņš teica, ka nepametīs sacīksti un piedalīsies 21. janvāra Dienvidkarolīnas pirmsvēlēšanu sanāksmē (kandidātu izvirzīšanai). Bahmane, kura pēc augusta sabiedriskās domas aptaujas Eimsas pilsētā bija līderpozīcijā, pieņēma lēmumu izbeigt savu kampaņu."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann took fourth, fifth and sixth place respectively. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but was less than enthusiastic about Romney, whose name was flying in the air in Iowa as negative campaign signs were being torn down. Perry announced, "I will return to Texas to assess the results of the closed caucus meetings and to understand whether I can continue in this race." However, he later said he would not drop out and would attend the January 21 South Carolina primary (candidate selection). Bachmann, who was leading in a public opinion poll in Ames in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "Stacijas tīmekļa vietnē raidījums tiek raksturots kā ""vecs skolas radio teātris ar jaunu un necilvēcīgu, nūģisku apgriezienu!"" Sākumā šovs tika raidīts tikai interneta radio vietnē TogiNet Radio, kas darbojas jau ilgstoši un kur pārsvarā notiek sarunas. 2015. gada beigās TogiNet izveidoja radio apakšstaciju AstroNet. Raidījumā sākotnēji piedalījās vietējie amatieru aktieri no Austrumteksasas."
mt: The station's website describes the show as "old school radio play with a new and inhumane, nasty twist!" The show was originally broadcast only on the internet radio station TogiNet Radio, which has been operating for some time and is mostly a talk show. In late 2015, TogiNet created the radio substation AstroNet. The show originally featured local amateur actors from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: "Mumbajas uzbrucēji ar laivu ieradās 2008. gada 26. novembrī, līdzi ņemot granātas, automātiskos ieročus un trāpot vairākos mērķos, tostarp pārpildītajā Čatrapati Šivadži Terminus dzelzceļa stacijā un slavenajā viesnīcā ""Tadžmahāls"". Deivida Hedlija veiktā izlūkošana un informācijas vākšana bija palīdzējusi uzsākt operāciju, kurā bija iesaistīti 10 teroristi no Pakistānas karojošā grupējuma ""Laskhar-e-Taiba"". Uzbrukums radīja milzīgu sasprindzinājumu Indijas un Pakistānas attiecībām."
mt: 26 November 2008, Mumbai attackers arrived by boat, bringing grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets, including the Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's intelligence gathering and information gathering had helped launch the operation, in which 10 terrorists from Pakistan's militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba were involved. The attack created a huge strain in India and Pakistan relations.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "Nadala rekords duelī pret kanādieti ir 7–2. Nesen viņš zaudēja Raoničam Brisbeinas atklātajā čempionātā. Nadals mačā savāca 88% punktu par pretinieka neatsistajām bumbām pie tīkla, pirmajā servē gūstot 76 punktus. Pēc mača ""mālu karalis"" sacīja: """"Es tikai priecājos, ka atkal varu piedalīties vissvarīgāko sacensību finālspēlēs. Centīšos šoreiz uzvarēt."""
mt: 7–2 is the score in the Nadal vs. Canadian record. Recently he lost to Raonic in the Brisbane International. Nadal scored 88% of the points on his opponent's unreturned serves, scoring 76 points in the first set. After the match, "the king of clay" said: "I was just happy to be able to participate in the most important finals. I will try to win this time."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Pagājušonedēļ raidsabiedrība „Naked News” paziņoja, ka plāno ievērojami palielināt savu ziņu izlaidumu klāstu starptautiskās valodās ar trim jaunām programmām. Šī vispasaules organizācija, kas jau pārraida ziņas angļu un japāņu valodās, tagad sāk veidot programmas spāņu, itāļu un korejiešu valodās to pārraidīšanai televīzijā, internetā un mobilajās ierīcēs.
mt: Last week, the news organization "Naked News" announced plans to significantly increase its international news offerings with three new programs in languages other than English. The global organization, which already broadcasts news in English and Japanese, is now creating programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, the Internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Vēl bez trešdienas notikuma Karpanedo sacentās divos individuālajos čempionātu nobraucienos. Savās pirmajās slaloma sacensībās viņa nefinišēja pirmajā nobraucienā. Tādu pašu rezultātu šajās sacīkstēs ieguva 36 no 116 sāncenšiem. Citās sacīkstēs, proti, milzu slalomā, viņa finišēja desmitajā vietā sieviešu nobraucienos sēdus ar kopējo nobraucienu laiku 4:41.30, kas ir par 2:11.60 minūtēm lēnāk nekā pirmās vietas ieguvēja austriete Klaudija Loeša un par 1:09.02 minūtēm lēnāk nekā devītās vietas ieguvēja Giongi Dani no Ungārijas. Četras slēpotājas sieviešu nobraucienos sēdus nepabeidza savus nobraucienus, un 45 no visām 117 slēpotājām neierindojās reitinga tabulā.
mt: 3 days before the accident, Karpanedo competed in two individual championship runs. In her first slalom race, she did not finish the first run. The same result was achieved by 36 of 116 competitors. In the other races, namely the giant slalom, she finished tenth in the women's run, sitting with a total run time of 4:41.30, which is 2:11.60 minutes slower than the first place winner, Austrian Claudia Loesch, and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place winner, Giongi Dani from Hungary. Four female skiers in the women's run did not finish their runs, and 45 of all 117 skiers did not make the ranking table.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: "Trešdien ASV Nacionālā basketbola asociācija (NBA) pārtrauca savu profesionālā basketbola sezonu sakarā ar bažām par Covid-19 izplatību. NBA lēmums tika pieņemts pēc tam, kad Jūtas ""Jazz"" spēlētājam bija pozitīvs COVID-19 vīrusa tests."
mt: " On Wednesday, the United States National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns over the spread of COVID-19. The NBA decision was made after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus."
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: "Dienas spēlētājs šodien ir Aleksandrs Ovečkins no kluba Vašingtonas ""Capitals"". Viņš guva 2 vārtus un 2 sekmīgas piespēles ""Washington"" gūtajā uzvarā 5:3 pār ""Atlanta Thrashers"". Ovečkina pirmā šīvakara rezultatīvā piespēle tika veikta spēles izšķirošajam vārtu guvumam, kuru realizēja debitants Niklass Bekstroms. viņa otrie vārti tajā vakarā bija viņa 60. vārti šajā sezonā, ļaujot viņam kļūt par pirmo spēlētāju, kurš guvis vismaz 60 vārtus vienā sezonā kopš 1995.-1996. gada, kad Jaromirs Jāgrs un Mario Lemjē katrs sasniedza šo atzīmi."
mt: "Today's player is Alexander Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and two assists in the Capitals' 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal, scored by rookie Nicklas Backstrom. His second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score at least 60 goals in a season since 1995-1996, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that mark."
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "Northern Rock banka tika nacionalizēta 2008. gadā pēc atklājuma, ka uzņēmums ir saņēmis ārkārtas atbalstu no Lielbritānijas valdības. Banka „Northern Rock” lūdza atbalstu sakarā ar augsta riska hipotekāro kredītu krīzes radīto ietekmi 2007. gadā. Sera Ričarda Brensona uzņēmums „Virgin Group” bankai izteica cenas piedāvājumu, kas tika noraidīts vēl pirms bankas nacionalizācijas. 2010. gadā nacionalizācijas laikā pašreizējā banka Northern Rock plc tika atdalīta no „sliktās bankas” Northern Rock (aktīvu pārvaldība). Virgin ir iegādājusies tikai Northern Rock ""labo banku"", nevis aktīvu pārvaldīšanas uzņēmumu."
mt: 2008, the bank was nationalized after it was revealed that the company had received extraordinary support from the British government. The bank "Northern Rock" asked for support due to the impact of the high-risk mortgage credit crisis in 2007. Richard Branson's company "Virgin Group" offered a bid for the bank, which was rejected before the bank's nationalization. In 2010, during the nationalization, the current bank Northern Rock plc was separated from the "bad bank" Northern Rock (asset management). Virgin has only bought the "good bank" Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Rada kunga lēmums parakstīt Kioto protokolu par klimata pārmaiņām padara ASV par vienīgo attīstīto valsti, kas nav ratificējusi šo līgumu. Austrālijas iepriekšējā konservatīvā valdība atteicās ratificēt Kioto protokolu, sakot, ka tas kaitēs ekonomikai, jo tas lielā paļaujas uz ogļu eksportu, savukārt emisiju mērķi neattiecas uz tādām valstīm kā Indija un Ķīna.
mt: The decision by Australia's conservative government to sign the Kyoto Protocol makes the United States the only developed country not to have ratified the climate change treaty. Australia's previous government refused to ratify the Kyoto Protocol, saying it would hurt the economy by relying so heavily on coal exports, while the emissions targets did not apply to countries such as India and China.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Mežziņiem bija rūpīgi jāvada šāvēji, kas piedalījās kaitēkļu apkarošanas papildu izmēģinājumā, jo šis izmēģinājums tika uzraudzīts un tika vērtēta tā efektivitāte. NPWS un Austrālijas sporta šāvēju asociācijas (NSW) partnerības un Sporta šāvēju asociācijas medību programmas ietvaros tika piesaistīti kvalificēti brīvprātīgie. Saskaņā ar Nacionālo parku un savvaļas dzīvnieku aizsardzības dienesta (NPWS) Parku saglabāšanas un kultūras mantojuma direktora vietas izpildītāja Mika O'Flinna sniegto informāciju pirmajai šaušanas operācijai izvēlētajiem četriem šāvējiem tika veikta vispusīga drošības instruktāža un apmācība.
mt: The shooters were carefully selected for the pest control supplementary trial, as this trial was supervised and its effectiveness was assessed. The trial was conducted under the auspices of the NPWS and the NSW Shooting Association (NSW) partnership and the Hunting Program of the Sporting Shooters Association. Qualified volunteers were engaged under the National Parks and Wildlife Service (NPWS) Park Conservation and Cultural Heritage Manager's Office site manager Mike O'Flaherty's information provided for the first shooting operation selected shooters four shooters were conducted a comprehensive safety briefing and training.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "Spriežot pēc šīs fosilijas, tas nozīmē, ka sadalīšanās ir notikusi daudz agrāk nekā gaidāms pēc molekulārajām liecībām. Tas nozīmē, ka viss ir jāpārceļ uz agrāku laiku,"" sacīja ""Rifta ielejas pētījumu dienesta"" Etiopijā pētnieks un pētījuma līdzautors Berhāns Asfavs."
mt: "This means that the separation happened much earlier than expected based on molecular evidence. It means that everything has to be pushed back in time," said Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Institute researcher and study co-author Berhanu Asfaw.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: "Spriežot pēc šīs fosilijas, tas nozīmē, ka sadalīšanās ir notikusi daudz agrāk nekā gaidāms pēc molekulārajām liecībām. Tas nozīmē, ka viss ir jāpārceļ uz agrāku laiku,"" sacīja ""Rifta ielejas pētījumu dienesta"" Etiopijā pētnieks un pētījuma līdzautors Berhāns Asfavs."
mt: "This means that the separation happened much earlier than expected based on molecular evidence. It means that everything has to be pushed back in time," said Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Institute researcher and study co-author Berhanu Asfaw.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: "Ceturtdien notikušajā Tokijas Spēļu izstādes galvenajā prezentācijā ""Nintendo"" prezidents Satoru Ivata atklāja uzņēmuma jaunās ""Nintendo Revolution"" konsoles pults dizainu. Vadāmierīce līdzinās televizora tālvadības pultij, un tā izmanto divus lietotāja televizora tuvumā novietotus sensorus, lai triangulētu savu pozīciju trīsdimensiju telpā. Tas ļaus spēlētājiem kontrolēt darbības un kustības videospēlēs, pārvietojot ierīci pa gaisu."
mt: 4th day of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of the new Nintendo Revolution console. The controller resembles a TV remote, and uses two user-facing sensors to triangulate its position in a three-dimensional space. This allows players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: "Pirms tam ķīniešu ziņu aģentūra ""Xinhua"" ziņoja par lidmašīnas nolaupīšanu. Vēlākos ziņojumos teikts, ka lidmašīna saņēma spridzināšanas draudus un tika novirzīta atpakaļ uz Afganistānu, kur nolaidās Kandahārā. Pirmajos ziņojumos teikts, ka lidmašīna tika novirzīta atpakaļ uz Afganistānu pēc tam, kad tai atteikta ārkārtas nosēšanās Urumči."
mt: "Earlier, the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported the plane was hijacked. Later reports said the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, where it landed in Kandahar. Initial reports said the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after it was denied an emergency landing in Urumchi."
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "Zviedrijas Akadēmijas Nobela komitejas, kas piešķirt prēmijas literatūrā, ilggadējā sekretāre Sara Daniusa pirmdien Zviedrijas radio „Sveriges Radio” raidījumā publiski paziņoja, ka komiteja nav varējusi tieši sasniegt Bobu Dilanu saistībā ar 2016. gada Nobela prēmijas literatūrā iegūšanu un savus mēģinājumus viņu sasniegt vairs neturpinās. Daniusa sacīja: ""Šobrīd mēs nedarām neko. Es esmu zvanījusi un nosūtījusi viņa tuvākajam līdzstrādniekam e-pasta vēstules, un saņēmusi ļoti draudzīgas atbildes. Patriez ar to noteikti pietiek."""
mt: "The Nobel Academy Committee, which awards the prize in literature, has long been trying to reach Bob Dylan in connection with his winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, and will no longer try to reach him.  Sara Danius, the committee's secretary, said in a Swedish radio interview, "We are not doing anything right now. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator, and received very friendly replies.  I think that's enough."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "ASV prezidents Džordžs Bušs atzinīgi novērtēja paziņojumu. Buša spīkers Gordons Džondrojs nosauca Ziemeļkorejas solījumu par ""būtisku soli ceļā uz ticamu atteikšanos no kodolieročiem Korejas pussalā."""
mt: "U.S. President George W. Bush praised the announcement. Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a significant step toward a credible commitment to abandon nuclear weapons in Korea."""
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "1956. gadā Slania pārcēlās uz Zviedriju, kur pēc trīs gadiem viņš sāka strādāt Zviedrijas pastā un kļuva par tā galveno gravētāju. Viņš izgatavoja vairāk nekā 1000 pastmarku Zviedrijai un 28 citām valstīm. Viņa darba kvalitāte un smalkās detaļas ir tik plaši atzītas, ka viņa vārds ir kļuvis par vienu no retajiem ""vārdiem"", ko atpazīst visi filatēlisti. Daži specializējas tikai viņa darbu kolekcionēšanā. Viņa 1000. marka 2000. gadā atainoja lielisko gleznu ""Zviedru karaļu lielie darbi"", kuras autors ir Dāvids Klokers Ērenštrāls, un tā ir iekļauta Ginesa rekordu grāmatā. Viņš arī piedalījās banknošu gravēšanā daudzām valstīm; neseni viņa darba piemēri ietver premjerministru portretus uz jaunajām Kanādas 5 dolāru un 100 dolāru banknotēm."
mt: 1956 Slania moved to Sweden, where after three years he began working for the Swedish Post Office and became its chief engraver. He designed more than 1000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work quality and fine details are so well known that his name is one of the few "names" recognized by all philatelists. Some specialize only in collecting his work. His 1000th stamp in 2000 reproduced the large painting "Swedish Kings' Great Works" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, and is included in the Guinness Book of Records. He also participated in the engraving of banknotes for many countries; recently his work includes portraits of the prime minister on new Canadian 5 dollar and 100 dollar banknotes.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Pēc tūkstošiem barelu jēlnaftas noplūdes Aļaskā, Fērbenksas dienvidos, Aļaskas naftas vads tika slēgts 800 jūdžu garumā. Energoapgādes traucējumi pēc plānveida ugunsdzēsības sistēmas pārbaudes izraisīja vārstu atvēršanos, kā rezultātā netālu no Fortgrīlijas sūkņu stacijas Nr. 9 izplūda jēlnafta. Vārstu atvēršana ļāva izlaist sistēmas spiedienu, un eļļa pa paliktni aizplūda uz tvertni, kas spēj ietilpināt 55 000 barelu (2,3 miljonus galonu). Trešdienas pēcpusdienā nafta joprojām pilēja pa cisternu ventiļiem, visticamāk dēļ termiskās izplešanās cisternas iekšpusē. Otrs sekundārais noplūdes lokalizācijas rezervuārs zem cisternām, kurā var ietilpt 104 500 bareli naftas, vēl nebija pilnībā piepildīts.
mt: After thousands of barrels of crude oil spilled in Alaska, the Alaska pipeline was closed for 800 miles. Energy disruptions after the planned fire suppression system inspection opened the valves, allowing oil to leak out of the nearby Fort Greely No. 9 power plant. The valve opening allowed the system pressure to drop, and the oil flowed into a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). On Wednesday afternoon, the oil was still flowing through the tank's vents, presumably due to thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment reservoir under the tanks, which can hold 104,500 barrels of oil, was not yet fully filled.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: "ASV Inženieru korpuss lēsa, ka 6 collu nokrišņu daudzums varētu pārplūst pār iepriekš sabojātajiem dambjiem. Devītajā administratīvajā rajonā, kurā viesuļvētras ""Katrīna"" laikā plūdi bija pat 20 pēdu augstumā, ūdens pašlaik ir vidukļa augstumā, jo netālu esošais dambis pārplūda. Ūdens plūst 100 pēdu platā daļā virs dambja."
mt: 6 inches of rain could overflow the damaged levees, the US Army Corps of Engineers said. In the 10th ward, where Hurricane Katrina's floodwaters were 20 feet high, the water is now at mid-calf level, as the nearby levee has overflowed. The water is flowing through a 100-foot-wide breach in the levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamiltone apstiprināja, ka Hovarda Universitātes slimnīcā ieveda pacientu stabilā stāvoklī. Pacients bija bijis Nigērijā, kur ir bijuši daži Ebolas vīrusa gadījumi. Slimnīca ir ievērojusi infekcijas kontroles protokolu, ieskaitot pacienta nodalīšanu no citiem, lai novērstu citu iespējamo inficēšanu.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that a patient was admitted to the Howard University Hospital in stable condition. The patient had been in Nigeria, where there have been some Ebola virus cases. The hospital has implemented infection control protocols, including isolating the patient from others to prevent possible infection.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Iespējams, ka tieši komētas ir nogādājušas uz Zemi ūdeni kopā ar organiskajām vielām, kas var veidot proteīnus un uzturēt dzīvību. Zinātnieki cer saprast, kā veidojas planētas, jo īpaši, — kā ir izveidojusies Zeme, jo komētu sadursmes ar Zemi notika pirms ilga laika.
mt: It is possible that comets brought water to Earth along with organic compounds that could form proteins and sustain life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how Earth formed, as comet impacts with Earth occurred long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: "Kamēr varas iestādes nav pārliecinātas par draudu ticamību, ""Merilendas Transporta pārvalde"" pēc FBI pamudinājuma pieņēma lēmumu par slēgšanu. Metro ieeju bloķēšanai tika izmantoti pašizgāzēji, kā arī palīgā devās 80 policisti, lai novirzītu autobraucējus pa apkārtceļiem. Netika ziņots par pamatīgu satiksmes kavēšanos uz lielceļa - alternatīvā pilsētas maršruta."
mt: While authorities are not convinced of the threat's credibility, the Maryland Transportation Authority, after an FBI warning, decided to close the station. The entrance was blocked by self-destructing devices, and 80 police officers were sent to divert drivers to alternative routes. There was no major traffic disruption on the highway - the city's alternative route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "Fotogrāfs tika nogādāts Ronalda Reigana UCLA medicīnas centrā, kur viņš vēlāk nomira. Tika minēts, ka viņš ir vecāks par 20 gadiem. Savā paziņojumā Bībers norādīja ""[l]ai gan es neatrados šā traģiskā nelaimes gadījuma vietā un nebiju tajā tieši iesaistīts, manas domas un lūgšanas ir ar upura ģimeni."" Pēc izklaidējošo ziņu tīmekļa vietnes ""TMZ"" rīcībā esošās informācijas fotogrāfs apturēja savu transportlīdzekli Sepulveda Boulevard otrajā pusē un mēģināja nofotografēt policijas aizturēšanu, pirms šķērsoja ceļu un turpināja, tādējādi liekot Kalifornijas Lielceļu patruļas policistam divas reizes apturēt satiksmi, lai viņš varētu tikt atpakaļ ceļa otrā pusē. Saskaņā ar policijas teikto transportlīdzekļa vadītājam, kurš notrieca fotogrāfu, visticamāk netiks ierosināta krimināllieta."
mt: The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was said to be over 20 years old. In his statement, Bieber said, "[w]hile I was not present and did not witness the accident, I would like to express my deepest condolences to the family and friends of the victim and my hope that he will receive a speedy recovery." After the partying TMZ website's information photographer stopped his vehicle on the second side of Sepulveda Boulevard and tried to photograph the arrest, before crossing the road and continuing, thus forcing California Highway Patrol officer to stop traffic twice to allow him to return to the other side of the road. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer will not be charged with a criminal offense.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Ariasam uzrādīja saslimšanu ar vīrusu viegla formā, sacīja prezidenta lietu ministrs Rodrigo Ariass. Prezidenta stāvoklis ir stabils, lai gan viņš vairākas dienas būs izolēts mājās. Izņemot drudzi un iekaisušu kaklu, es jūtos labi un esmu labā formā, lai turpinātu strādāt attālināti. Plānoju atgriezties pie savu pienākumu izpildes pirmdien,"" Arias norādīja paziņojumā."
mt: "I have been diagnosed with the mild form of the virus, said the Minister of the Presidency Rodrigo Arias. The president's condition is stable, although he will be isolated at home for several days. Except for a fever and a sore throat, I feel well and am in good shape to continue working remotely. I plan to return to my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Tropiskais ciklons Gonu, kura nosaukums maldīviešu valodā nozīmē ar palmu lapām piepildītu maisu, kulminācijas brīdī sasniedza ilgstošu vēju līdz 240 km/stundā (149 jūdzes/stundā). Līdz pat šim rītam vēja stiprums turējās 83 km/h, un bija gaidāms, ka tas mazināsies.
mt: Tropical cyclone Gonu, whose name means "a pot with palm leaves" in Arabic, reached its peak wind speed of up to 240 km/h (149 mph) on Monday. Winds were gusting up to 83 km/h (52 mph) and were expected to decrease.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Aļģu „ziedēšanu” izraisa Karenia brevis, dabā sastopama vienšūnas jūras organisma, paaugstināta koncentrācija. Var notikt arī dabisku faktoru sakritība, kuras rezultātā rodas ideāli apstākļi, lai šo aļģu apmērs dramatiski pieaugtu. Aļģes ražo neirotoksīnu, kas var padarīt nespējīgus nervus gan cilvēkiem, gan zivīm. Zivis bieži vien mirst dēļ augstās toksīnu koncentrācijas ūdeņos. Cilvēkus var ietekmēt tāda ūdens ieelpošana, kas nonācis gaisā vēja un viļņu dēl.
mt: The blooms are caused by Karenia brevis, a single-celled marine organism that proliferates in high concentrations. It can also be the result of a combination of natural factors that create ideal conditions for a dramatic increase in the algae. The algae produce neurotoxins that can make humans and fish unable to move. Fish often die from the high toxin concentration in the water. Humans can be affected by water that has entered the air due to wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Felicia, kas iepriekš tika klasificēta kā 4. kategorijas vētra pēc Safira-Simpsona viesuļvētru skalas, tā samazinājās līdz tropiskas vētras līmenim, pirms otrdien tā izzuda pavisam. Tās atlikusī daļa izraisīja lietusgāzes lielākajā daļā salu, tomēr vēl nav ziņots par postījumiem vai plūdiem. Oahu mērierīces uzrādītie nokrišņi, 6,34 collas, tika raksturoti kā ""labvēlīgi"". Dažas lietusgāzes pavadīja pērkona negaiss un bieža zibensizlāde."
mt: "Felicia, which had previously been classified as a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale, was downgraded to tropical storm status before dissipating completely on Tuesday. Its remaining portion spawned heavy rains across most of the islands, but no reports of damage or flooding have been reported. Oahu's rain gauge recorded 6.34 inches of rain, which was described as "favorable." Some of the rain was accompanied by a thundershower and frequent lightning."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Pikē juniors avarēja 2008. gada Singapūras Grand Prix sacensībās uzreiz pēc tam, kad Fernando Alonso agri iebrauca boksos, un viņa dēļ trasē devās drošības mašīna. Tā kā Alonso priekšā braucošās sacīkšu mašīnas devās uzpildīt degvielu, braucot aiz drošības mašīnas, viņš apdzina pārējos, lai plūktu uzvaras laurus. Pikē juniors tika atlaists pēc 2009. gada Ungārijas Grand Prix sacensībām.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix crash occurred immediately after Fernando Alonso early pit stop, and his car was hit by a safety car. As Alonso's car was in front of the safety car, he was overtaken by the safety car, which was going to refuel. He then crashed into the other cars, which were behind the safety car. He was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: "Ceturtdien publicētais pētījums žurnālā ""Science"" (Zinātne) ziņoja par jaunas putnu sugas veidošanos Ekvadoras Galapagu salās. Prinstonas Universitātes (ASV) un Upsalas universitātes (Zviedrija) pētnieki ziņoja, ka jaunā suga ir radusies tikai divu paaudžu laikā, lai gan tika uzskatīts, ka šāds process norit krietni ilgāk, ņemot vērā vairošanos endēmiskās Darvina žubītes (Geospiza fortes) un ieceļotājas kaktusa žubītes (Geospiza conirostris) starpā."
mt: On Thursday, a study published in the journal Science (Science) reported the formation of a new bird species on the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University (USA) and Uppsala University (Sweden) reported that the new species had formed in just two generations, although it was believed that the process took much longer, taking into account the breeding of endemic Darwin's finches (Geospiza fortes) and the introduced cactus finch (Geospiza conirostris) between them.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: "Mākslas pasākums ir arī daļa no Bukarestes rātsnama kampaņas, kuras mērķis ir atjaunot Rumānijas galvaspilsētas kā radošas un krāsainas metropoles tēlu. Pilsēta būs pirmā Eiropas dienvidaustrumos, kas no šī gada jūnija līdz augustam rīkos pasaules lielāko publiskās mākslas pasākumu ""CowParade""."
mt: "The event is also part of the Bucharest City Hall's campaign to restore the capital's image as a creative and colorful metropolis. The city will be the first in Eastern Europe to host the world's largest public art event, "CowParade," from June to August this year."
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Lidmašīna bija devusies uz Irkutsku, un to vadīja iekšējie kavalērijas vadi. Tika uzsākta izmeklēšana. Il-76 kopš 20. gadsimta 70. gadiem ir bijusi gan Krievijas, gan Padomju Savienības armijas galvenā sastāvdaļa, un jau pagājušajā mēnesī Krievijā tā piedzīvoja nopietnu avāriju. 7. oktobrī pacelšanās laikā atdalījās dzinējs; neviens netika ievainots. Pēc nelaimes gadījuma Krievija īslaicīgi pārtrauca lidojumus ar II-76 lidmašīnām.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk, and was being flown by the interior cavalry. An investigation was launched. The Il-76 has been a mainstay of both the Russian and Soviet armies since the 1970s, and just last month Russia suffered a major accident with one of the planes. On October 7, a jet engine fell off during takeoff; no one was injured. After the accident, Russia temporarily halted flights with Il-76s.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: "Pirms seriāla ""Simpsoni"" Saimons bija strādājis vairāku citu pārraižu veidošanā dažādos amatos. 1980.-tajos gados viņš piedalījās tādu TV šovu veidošanā kā ""Taxi"", ""Cheers"" un ""The Tracy Ullman Show"". 1989. gadā kopā ar Bruksu un Greiningu viņš palīdzēja izveidot „Simpsonus” un bija atbildīgs par seriāla pirmās scenāristu komandas nolīgšanu. Neskatoties uz aiziešanu no šova 1993. gadā, viņš saglabāja izpildproducenta titulu un turpināja ik sezonu saņemt desmitiem miljonu dolāru kā autoratlīdzību."
mt: "Before the Simpsons, Simon had worked on the development of several other sitcoms in various capacities. In the 1980s, he was involved in the creation of Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons and was responsible for hiring the first writing staff. Despite leaving the show in 1993, he retained the title of executive producer and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars per season as a co-author."
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Flūka rakstīja, ka dažu personu centieni apklusināt sievietes, neļaujot tām runāt par sieviešu veselību, bija nesekmīgi. Viņa nonāca pie šāda slēdziena pēc tam, kad bija saņēmusi ļoti daudz pozitīvu komentāru un iedrošinājumu gan no sievietēm, gan vīriešiem, mudinot kontracepcijas līdzekļus noteikt kā medicīniskās nepieciešamības preces.
mt: Fluke wrote that efforts to silence women who wanted to talk about women's health had failed. She reached this conclusion after receiving a lot of positive comments and encouragement from both women and men, encouraging contraceptives to be seen as medical necessity products.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: "Tas uzvedīsies kā ūdens. Tas ir caurspīdīgs tieši tāpat kā ūdens. Ja jūs stāvētu pie krasta līnijas, jūs varētu redzēt oļus vai dubļus, kas atrodas apakšā. Ciktāl mums zināms, par Titānu dinamiskāks ir tikai viens astronomiskais ķermenis, un to sauc par Zemi,"" piebilda Štofans."
mt: "It will behave like water. It will be transparent just like water. If you stood at the shoreline, you would be able to see the pebbles or sand that are below. As far as we know, only one astronomical object is more dynamic than the Earth, and that is called the Moon," said Shu.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Tas ne tikai apstiprina, ka vismaz dažiem dinozauriem bija spalvas, šī teorija jau bija plaši izplatīta, bet arī sniedz informāciju, ko fosilijas vispārīgi nevar, piemēram, krāsu un trīsdimensiju izvietojumu. . Zinātnieki saka, ka šī dzīvnieka apspalvojums augšpusē bija kastaņbrūnā krāsā, bet apakšpusē — karotinoīdu krāsās. Šis atradums arī sniedz ieskatu putnu spalvu attīstībā. Tā kā dinozauru spalvām nebija labi attīstīts kāts, ko sauc par stobru, taču ir pārējās spalvām piemītošās īpašībās, proti, stari un stariņi, tad pētnieki izdarīja secinājumus, ka stobrs, visticamāk, radās vēlākā evolūcijas attīstības fāzē nekā šīs īpašības. Spalvu struktūra liecina, ka tās netika izmantotas lidojumā, bet drīzāk temperatūras regulēšanai vai izrādīšanai. Pētnieki norādīja, ka, lai arī šī ir jauna dinozaura aste, paraugā redzams pieaugušo putnu apspalvojums, nevis mazulīša pūkas. Pētnieki ierosināja, ka, lai arī šī ir jauna dinozaura aste, paraugā redzams pieaugušo apspalvojums, nevis mazulīša pūkas.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that was already widely accepted, but also provides information that fossils in general cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists say that this animal's upper back was a chestnut brown, while its lower back was in colors ranging from black to gray. This find also provides insight into the development of bird feathers. Since the dinosaur feathers did not have a well-developed quill, which is called a rachis, but the other feathers had the rachis, the researchers made the conclusion that the rachis probably developed later in the evolutionary process than the other features. The structure of the feathers indicates that they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers noted that, although this is a new dinosaur tail, the specimen shows adult bird plumage, not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, although this is a new dinosaur tail, the specimen shows adult bird plumage, not a chick's down.

The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. src: Tas ne tikai apstiprina, ka vismaz dažiem dinozauriem bija spalvas, šī teorija jau bija plaši izplatīta, bet arī sniedz informāciju, ko fosilijas vispārīgi nevar, piemēram, krāsu un trīsdimensiju izvietojumu. . Zinātnieki saka, ka šī dzīvnieka apspalvojums augšpusē bija kastaņbrūnā krāsā, bet apakšpusē — karotinoīdu krāsās. Šis atradums arī sniedz ieskatu putnu spalvu attīstībā. Tā kā dinozauru spalvām nebija labi attīstīts kāts, ko sauc par stobru, taču ir pārējās spalvām piemītošās īpašībās, proti, stari un stariņi, tad pētnieki izdarīja secinājumus, ka stobrs, visticamāk, radās vēlākā evolūcijas attīstības fāzē nekā šīs īpašības. Spalvu struktūra liecina, ka tās netika izmantotas lidojumā, bet drīzāk temperatūras regulēšanai vai izrādīšanai. Pētnieki norādīja, ka, lai arī šī ir jauna dinozaura aste, paraugā redzams pieaugušo putnu apspalvojums, nevis mazulīša pūkas. Pētnieki ierosināja, ka, lai arī šī ir jauna dinozaura aste, paraugā redzams pieaugušo apspalvojums, nevis mazulīša pūkas.

src: Kaut gan viena eksperimentālā vakcīna izrādās spējīga samazināt mirstību no Ebolas vīrusa, līdz šim nevienas zāles nav skaidri pierādījušas, ka var izārstēt esošo infekciju. Viens antivielu kokteilis „ZMapp” sākotnēji šķita daudzsološs problēmas risinājums, taču oficiālie pētījumi parādīja, ka tam ir zemāka iedarbība uz mirstības novēršanu nekā domāts. PALM pētījumā ZMapp bija kontroles līdzeklis, proti, zinātnieki to izmantoja kā sākotnējo rādītāju un salīdzināja trīs cita veida terapijas ar šo līdzekli.
mt: While one experimental vaccine has shown promise in reducing mortality from Ebola virus, no drug has yet been clearly shown to cure an existing infection. One antiviral cocktail, ZMapp, initially seemed to be a promising solution to the problem, but official studies showed it had a lower effect on reducing mortality than expected. In the PALM study, ZMapp was a control agent, meaning scientists used it as a starting point and compared it to three other types of therapy.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Stenforda Universitātes Medicīnas skolas zinātnieki pirmdien paziņoja, ka izgudrojuši jaunu diagnostikas rīku, ar kuru var šūnas kārtot pēc to veidiem: tas ir sīks drukājams čips, kuru var izgatavot, izmantojot standarta strūklprinteri, un kura iespējamās izmaksas ir aptuveni viens ASV cents gabalā. Vadošie pētnieki teica, ka ar tā palīdzību, iespējams, varēs agrīni atklāt vēzi, tuberkulozi, HIV un malāriju pacientiem valstīs ar zemiem ienākumiem, kur izdzīvošanas rādītājs no tādām slimībām kā krūts vēzis var būt pat uz pusi zemāks nekā bagātākajās valstīs.
mt: Stanford University's School of Medicine scientists announced Monday that they had invented a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: it is a tiny printed chip that can be made using a standard inkjet printer, and whose estimated cost is about one U.S. cent per square inch. Leading researchers said that with its help, it may be possible to detect early breast cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria patients in countries with low incomes, where the survival rate from such diseases as breast cancer can be half that of the richest countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Zinātnieki ir atklājuši reljefa formas, kas klāj visu mēness virsmu (angliski dēvētas par „lobate scarps”) un kas, acīmredzot, izveidojušās ļoti lēnas mēness saraušanās rezultātā. Šīs atliekas tika atrastas viscaur uz Mēness un izskatās minimāli izdēdējušas, kas norāda, ka ģeoloģiskie notikumi, kas tos radīja, bija diezgan nesen. Šī teorija ir pretrunā ar apgalvojumu, ka Mēness ir pilnīgi bez ģeoloģiskām aktivitātēm.
mt: Scientists have discovered the relief forms that cover the entire surface of the moon (called "lobate scarps") and which, apparently, were formed as a result of very slow moon's crustal collapse. These remnants were found throughout the moon and look minimally eroded, indicating that the geological events that created them were relatively recent. This theory is in conflict with the belief that the moon is completely devoid of geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Kopš tā laika Adekoja atrodas Edinburgas šerifa tiesas ieslodzījumā sakarā ar apsūdzību par sava dēla noslepkavošanu. Viņa ir apcietinājumā, gaidot apsūdzības raksta iesniegšanu un tiesu, taču aculiecinieku sniegtās liecības, iespējams, būs nederīgas, jo viņas attēls ir plaši publicēts. Tā ir izplatīta prakse citur Lielbritānijā, taču Skotijas tieslietu sistēma darbojas atšķirīgi, un tiesas ir uzskatījušas fotoattēlu publicēšanu kā potenciāli aizspriedumainu. Dandī universitātes profesore Pamela Fergusone atzīmē: ""Šķiet, ka žurnālisti iet pa plānu ledu, publicējot aizdomās turamo fotogrāfijas un citu informāciju."" Kroņa prokuratūra, kas kopumā ir atbildīga par apsūdzībām, ir norādījusi žurnālistiem, ka netiks sniegti nekādi tālākie komentāri vismaz līdz apsūdzības brīdim."
mt: Since then Adekoja has been in custody at Edinburgh Sheriff Court on suspicion of murdering her son. She is in custody awaiting the indictment and trial, but witness statements may be useless, as her picture has been widely published. This is a common practice elsewhere in Great Britain, but the Scottish justice system works differently, and courts have considered the publication of a photo as potentially prejudicial. Pamela Ferguson, a professor at Dundee University, says: "It seems that journalists are going by the book, publishing photos and other information under suspicion." The Crown Prosecution Service, which is generally responsible for prosecutions, has advised journalists that there will be no further comment until the indictment.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Papildus drūpošajam ledum ekstremāli laikapstākļi arī ir kavējuši glābšanas centienus. Pitmens domā, ka apstākļi uzlabosies tikai nākamajā nedēļā. Pēc Pitmana teiktā, roņu zvejaskuģiem pakledus daudzums un biezums ir vissliktākais, kāds tas bijis pēdējo 15 gadu laikā.
mt: In addition to the melting ice, extreme weather conditions have also hindered rescue efforts. Pitman believes conditions will improve only next week. According to Pitman, the amount and thickness of ice is the worst it has been in the last 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Roberts kategoriski atteicās atbildēt, kad, viņaprāt, sākas dzīvība; tas ir svarīgs jautājums, apspriežot abortu veikšanas ētiku. Viņš teica, ka būtu neētiski komentēt varbūtēju lietu specifiku. Taču viņš vairākkārt atkārtoja savu iepriekš izteikto apgalvojumu, ka lēmums Roijas un Veida (Roe v. Wade) lietā bija ""neapgāžams"", uzsverot, cik svarīgi ir pieņemt konsekventus lēmumus Augstākajā tiesā. Viņš arī apstiprināja to, ka, viņaprāt, lieta ietvēra tiesības uz privātumu, no kā bija atkarīgs Roijas lēmums."
mt: "Roberts categorically refused to comment when, as he saw it, life began; it is a crucial question in discussing the ethics of performing an abortion. He reiterated his previous statement that the decision in Roe v. Wade was "not overruled," emphasizing how important it is to take consistent decisions in the Supreme Court. He also confirmed that the case involved the right to privacy, on which the Roe decision was based."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Tieši plkst. 08:46 no rīta pilsētā iestājās klusums, atceroties brīdi, kad pirmā lidmašīna ietriecās mērķī. Ir uzstādīti divi staru kūļi, kas naktī rāda uz debesīm. Tajā vietā tiek celti pieci jauni debesskrāpji, kuriem pa vidu būs sabiedriskā transporta centrs un memoriālais parks.
mt: 08:46 precisely, the city fell silent, remembering the moment when the first plane hit its target. Two star-shaped searchlights were erected to point to the sky at night. In their place, five new searchlights will be erected, with a public transport center and memorial park in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Visām alām, kas tika nosauktas par ""Septiņām māsām"", ieejas diametrs ir vismaz no 100 līdz 250 metri (328 līdz 820 pēdas). Infrasarkano staru attēli parāda temperatūras izmaiņas dienā un naktī un liecina par iespējamām alām. Dienā tie ir vēsāki nekā apkārtējā virsma un naktīs siltāki. Viņu termiskās ekspluatācijas īpašības nav tik noturīgas kā lielajām alām uz Zemes, kas bieži uztur diezgan nemainīgu temperatūru, bet tas ir atbilstoši tam, ka tie ir dziļi caurumi zemē,"" sacīja Glens Kušings no Amerikas Savienoto Valstu Ģeoloģijas dienesta (USGS) astroloģijas darba grupas un Ziemeļu Arizonas universitātes, kas atrodas Flagstafā, Arizonā."
mt: "All of the so-called "Seven Sisters" have diameters of at least 100 to 250 kilometers (328 to 820 feet). Infrared images of the stars show temperature changes during the day and night and suggest possible stars. During the day they are cooler than the surrounding sky and warmer at night. Their thermal exploitation properties are not as durable as large stars on Earth, which often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is appropriate for them to be deep holes in the ground," said Glenn Kusings of the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) astrological work group and the University of Northern Arizona, located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Vīrietis it kā esot pūlī iebraucis ar spridzekļiem bruņotu trīsriteņu transportlīdzekli. Vīrietis, kuru turēja aizdomās par bumbas uzspridzināšanu, tika aizturēts pēc tam, kad sprādzienā guva traumas. Iestādēm viņa vārds joprojām nav zināms, lai gan tās zina, ka viņš ir no uiguru etniskās grupas.
mt: A man who appeared to be carrying a bomb in a three-wheeled vehicle entered the building. A man suspected of planting a bomb was detained after being injured in the explosion. Authorities say he is from the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Vīrietis it kā esot pūlī iebraucis ar spridzekļiem bruņotu trīsriteņu transportlīdzekli. Vīrietis, kuru turēja aizdomās par bumbas uzspridzināšanu, tika aizturēts pēc tam, kad sprādzienā guva traumas. Iestādēm viņa vārds joprojām nav zināms, lai gan tās zina, ka viņš ir no uiguru etniskās grupas.
mt: A man who appeared to be carrying a bomb in a three-wheeled vehicle entered the building. A man suspected of planting a bomb was detained after being injured in the explosion. Authorities say he is from the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: "Dienvidāfrika regbija savienības ""Tri Nations"" mačā ""Karaliskajā Bafokenga"" stadionā Rustenburgā, Dienvidāfrikā, uzveica Jaunzēlandes izlasi ""All Blacks"". Beigu rezultāts bija uzvara ar viena punkta pārsvaru - 21 pret 20, pārtraucot ""All Blacks"" 15 uzvaru sēriju. Ar to ""Springboks"" komanda pārtrauca piecu zaudējumu sēriju. Šis bija  komandas „All Blacks”, kura ieguva trofeju jau pirms divām nedēļām, pēdējais mačs. Sērijas noslēguma spēle notiks nākamnedēļ Elisas parkā Johannesburgā, kad izlase ""Springboks"" spēlēs ar Austrālijas izlasi."
mt: In the South Africa Rugby Union's "Tri Nations" match at the "Royal Bafokeng" stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa, the Springboks defeated the New Zealand All Blacks. The final score was 21-20, ending the All Blacks' 15-game winning streak. The Springboks ended a five-game losing streak. This was the All Blacks' last match before the series finale. The series finale will be next week in Ellis Park, Johannesburg, where the Springboks will play the Australian Wallabies.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stacija saglabāja savu attieksmi līdz iziešanas kosmosā beigām, neskatoties uz žiroskopa pazaudēšanu agrāk kosmosa stacijas misijā. Čiao un Šaripovs ziņoja, ka atrodas drošā attālumā no telpiskā stāvokļa regulēšanas dzinējiem. Krievijas vadība no Zemes aktivizēja reaktīvos dzinējus un stacija atguva normālu stāvokli.
mt: The station maintained its attitude until the end of the mission, despite the loss of the gyroscope earlier in the space station's mission. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were in a safe distance from the attitude control thrusters. Russian ground control activated the reactive thrusters and the station regained normal attitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: "Lieta tika ierosināta Virdžīnijā, jo tur atrodas vadošais interneta pakalpojumu sniedzējs ""AOL"" - uzņēmums, kurš izvirzīja apsūdzības. Šī ir pirmā reize, kad tiek panākta notiesāšana, izmantojot 2003. gadā pieņemtos tiesību aktus, lai iegrožotu lielapjoma e-pastu jeb surogātpastu no nevēlamas izplatīšanas lietotāju pastkastītēs."
mt: "The case was brought in Virginia, where the leading Internet service provider AOL is headquartered, and which filed the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been obtained using laws enacted in 2003 to protect against the unwanted dissemination of bulk e-mail, or spam, from the senders' mailboxes."
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: "28 gadus vecais Vidals pievienojās ""Barça"" futbola klubam pirms trim sezonām, pārnākot no Seviļas kluba. Kopš pārcelšanās uz Katalonijas galvaspilsētu Vidals kluba sastāvā ir aizvadījis 49 spēles."
mt: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barcelona football club three seasons ago, moving from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 games for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Agrāk tajā pašā dienā Harke aizvadīja pirmssezonas treniņus Koverčiano, Itālijā. Viņš bija apmeties komandas viesnīcā pirms svētdien gaidāmā mača pret Boloņu. Pirms plānotās svētdienas spēles pret ¨Bologna¨ viņš palika komandas viesnīcā.
mt: Earlier in the day, Harke had trained in Coverciano, Italy. He had been staying at the team's hotel before Sunday's match against Bologna. Before the planned Sunday match against Bologna, he stayed at the team's hotel.
ref: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: Brīdinājums par cunami netika izdots un, saskaņā ar Džakartas ģeofizikas aģentūras teikto, brīdinājums par cunami izdots netiks, jo zemestrīce nesasniedza 6,5 magnitūdu prasību. Neskatoties uz to, ka nepastāvēja cunami draudi, iedzīvotāji sāka krist panikā un pameta savus uzņēmumus un mājas.
mt: The tsunami warning was not issued and, according to the Jakarta Geophysics Agency, a tsunami warning will not be issued as the earthquake did not reach the 6.5 magnitude threshold. Despite the lack of a tsunami threat, residents began to panic and evacuated their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Viņi atklāja, ka Saule darbojas pēc tiem pašiem pamatprincipiem kā citas zvaigznes: tika atklāts, ka visu sistēmas zvaigžņu darbību nosaka to spožums, rotācija un nekas cits. Starjaudu un rotāciju kopā izmanto, lai noteiktu zvaigznes Rosbija skaitli, kas saistīts ar plazmas plūsmu. Jo mazāks Rosbija skaitlis, jo mazāk aktīva zvaigzne ir attiecībā uz magnētiskajām apvērsēm.
mt: They discovered that the Sun works on the same basic principles as other stars: they found that the entire system's star's brightness, rotation, and nothing else determines the star's Rosby number, which is related to the plasma flow. The smaller the Rosby number, the less active the star is in relation to magnetic reversals.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: No 1400 iedzīvotājiem, kas tika aptaujāti pirms 2010. gada federālajām vēlēšanām, to cilvēku skaits, kas iebilda pret Austrālijas kā republikas pārveidi, bija pieaudzis par 8 procentiem salīdzinājumā ar 2008. gadu. Premjerministra vietas izpildītāja Džūlija Gilarde 2010. gada federālo vēlēšanu kampaņas laikā apgalvoja, ka, viņasprāt, pēc Karalienes Elizabetes II valdīšanas beigām Austrālijai būtu jākļūst par republiku. Šāds viedoklis ir 34% no aptaujas respondentiem, kuri vēlas, lai Karaliene Elizabete II būtu Austrālijas pēdējais monarhs. Aptaujas pretrunīgie rezultāti liecina, ka 29% no aptaujātajiem uzskata, ka Austrālijai jākļūst par republiku pēc iespējas ātri, savukārt 31% uzskata, ka Austrālijai nekad nevajadzētu kļūt par republiku.
mt: 1400 people surveyed before the 2010 federal election, the number of people who objected to Australia as a republic increased by 8% compared to 2008. Prime Minister's position holder Julie Gillard during the 2010 federal election campaign said that, in her opinion, after the reign of Queen Elizabeth II, Australia should become a republic. Such an opinion is 34% of the survey respondents who want Queen Elizabeth II to be the last monarch of Australia. The contradictory results of the survey indicate that 29% of the respondents believe that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31% believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
