src: Personīgā VPN (virtuāls privāts tīkls) nodrošinātāji ir izcils veids, kā apiet gan politisko cenzūru, gan IP filtrēšanu pēc ģeogrāfiskās atrašanās vietas komerciālos nolūkos. Tie ir pirmšķirīgāki par tīmekļa starpniekserveriem vairāku iemeslu dēļ: tie maina visu interneta trafiku, ne tikai http. Parasti tie piedāvā lielāku joslas platumu un labāku pakalpojumu kvalitāti. Tie ir šifrēti un tādējādi grūtāk izspiegojami.
mt: Personal VPN (Virtual Private Network) providers are a great way to circumvent both political censorship and IP filtering for commercial purposes. They are more secure than proxy servers for several reasons: they encrypt all internet traffic, not just http. They usually offer a larger bandwidth and better service quality. They are encrypted and therefore harder to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Tā kā zvani tiek maršrutēti pa internetu, jums nav jāizmanto tālruņa operators, kas darbojas vietā, kurā jūs dzīvojat vai ceļojat. No kopienas, kurā dzīvojat, nav arī prasības iegūt vietējo numuru; jūs varat iegūt satelīta interneta pieslēgumu Čikenas savvaļā Aļaskā, un izvēlēties numuru, kas norāda, ka atrodaties saulainajā Arizonā. Nereti globālais numurs, kas ļauj saņemt PSTN tālruņa zvanus, ir jāiegādājas atsevišķi. Numura reģistrācijas vieta ir būtisks faktors cilvēkiem, kas zvana jums.
mt: Because the calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a local phone company that operates in the area where you live or travel. You can get a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Alaska and choose a number that indicates you are in sunny Arizona. Sometimes a global number that allows you to receive PSTN phone calls is purchased separately. The location of the number is an important factor for people who call you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: "Itāļu valodas izruna ir relatīvi vienkārša, jo vairākumu vārdu izrunā tieši tāpat, kā raksta. Galvenie burti, no kuriem jāuzmanās, ir c un g, jo to izruna mainās atkarībā no nākamā patskaņa. Turklāt pievērsiet uzmanību burta r un rr atšķirīgajai izrunai: ""caro"" nozīmē dārgs, savukārt ""carro"" – kaujas rati."
mt: "Italian pronunciation is relatively simple, as most words are pronounced as they are written. The main letters to watch out for are c and g, as their pronunciation changes depending on the following vowel. Also note the difference in the pronunciation of r and rr: "caro" means "dear", while "carro" means "cart"."
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmira ir trešā lielākā Turcijas pilsēta, kurā mīt aptuveni 3,7 miljoni iedzīvotāju, otrā lielākā ostas pilsēta aiz Stambulas un ļoti labs transporta mezgls. Kādreizējā senā pilsēta Smirna tagad ir mūsdienīgs, attīstīts un rosīgs komerciālais centrs, kas, kalnu ieskauts, aptver milzīgo līci. Plaši bulvāri, stikla ēkas un mūsdienīgie tirdzniecības centri ir izraibināti ar tradicionāliem sarkano dakstiņu jumtiem, 18. gadsimta tirgu, kā arī vecām mošejām un baznīcām, lai gan pilsētas atmosfēra vairāk raksturīga Eiropas Vidusjūras reģionam, nevis tradicionālajai Turcijai.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey, with a population of 3.7 million, the second largest port city after Istanbul and a very important transportation hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed and thriving commercial center, surrounded by mountains and a large bay. Wide boulevards, glass buildings and modern shopping centers are interspersed with traditional red-tiled roofs, an 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city's atmosphere is more characteristic of the Mediterranean region of Europe than traditional Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Ķirškoku ziedēšanas apskate, ko sauc par 'hanami', ir bijusi japāņu kultūras sastāvdaļa jau kopš 8. gadsimta. Koncepcija radās Ķīnā, kur Japānas aprikoze bija izvēlētais zieds. Japānā pirmās ķiršu ziedu ballītes organizēja imperators tikai sev un citiem aristokrātijas pārstāvjiem imperatora galmā.
mt: The viewing of cherry blossoms, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept originated in China, where the Japanese aristocracy had chosen the cherry blossom as their favorite flower. In Japan, the first cherry blossom viewing parties were organized by the emperor only for himself and other representatives of the aristocracy in the imperial palace.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Jeruzaleme ir Izraēlas galvaspilsēta, kā arī tās lielākā pilsēta, tomēr vairākums citu valstu un Apvienoto Nāciju Organizācija to neatzīst par Izraēlas galvaspilsētu. Senajai pilsētai Jūdejas kalnos ir aizraujoša vēsture, tā aptver vairākus tūkstošus gadu. Pilsēta ir svēta trim monoteiskajām reliģijām - jūdaismam, kristietībai un islāmam, un tā kalpo kā garīgais, reliģiskais un kultūras centrs. Pateicoties pilsētas reliģiskajai nozīmei un jo īpaši daudzām vietām Vecpilsētas teritorijā, Jeruzaleme ir viena no galvenajām tūristu apskates vietām Izraēlā. Jeruzalemē ir daudz vēstures, arheoloģijas un kultūras apskates vietu, kā arī rosīgi un pārpildīti tirdzniecības centri, kafejnīcas un restorāni.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital of Israel, as well as its largest city. However, most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city of Jerusalem in the Judean Hills has an engrossing history, dating back thousands of years. The city is holy to three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Due to the city's religious significance and especially many sites in the Old City, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist attractions in Israel. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites, as well as bustling and crowded shopping centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Jeruzaleme ir Izraēlas galvaspilsēta, kā arī tās lielākā pilsēta, tomēr vairākums citu valstu un Apvienoto Nāciju Organizācija to neatzīst par Izraēlas galvaspilsētu. Senajai pilsētai Jūdejas kalnos ir aizraujoša vēsture, tā aptver vairākus tūkstošus gadu. Pilsēta ir svēta trim monoteiskajām reliģijām - jūdaismam, kristietībai un islāmam, un tā kalpo kā garīgais, reliģiskais un kultūras centrs. Pateicoties pilsētas reliģiskajai nozīmei un jo īpaši daudzām vietām Vecpilsētas teritorijā, Jeruzaleme ir viena no galvenajām tūristu apskates vietām Izraēlā. Jeruzalemē ir daudz vēstures, arheoloģijas un kultūras apskates vietu, kā arī rosīgi un pārpildīti tirdzniecības centri, kafejnīcas un restorāni.

src: Krugera nacionālais parks (KNP) atrodas Dienvidāfrikas ziemeļaustrumos un stiepjas gar Mozambikas robežu austrumos, Zimbabvi ziemeļos, un dienvidu robeža ir Krokodilu upe. Parka platība ir 19 500 km², un tas ir sadalīts 14 dažādās ekozonās, no kurām katra uztur dažādus savvaļas dzīvniekus. Tas ir viens no galvenajiem Dienvidāfrikas apskates objektiem un tiek uzskatīts par nozīmīgāko no Dienvidāfrikas nacionālajiem parkiem (SANParks). Līdzīgi kā visos Dienvidāfrikas nacionālajos parkos, arī šajā parkā ir ikdienas uzturēšanas un ieejas maksas. Varētu būt izdevīgi iegādāties arī “Wild Card”, kas nodrošina ieeju noteiktos Dienvidāfrikas parkos vai visos Dienvidāfrikas nacionālajos parkos.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa and stretches along the Mozambique border in the east, Zimbabwe in the north and the Crocodile River in the west. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different ecozones, each of which supports different wild animals. It is one of the main tourist attractions in South Africa and is considered one of the most important of the South African national parks (SANParks). As in all South African national parks, there are daily accommodation and entrance fees. It may be worthwhile to buy a "Wild Card", which provides access to certain South African parks or all South African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Šis stāvais kalns, kas atrodas aiz Maču Pikču ziemeļu daļas, bieži vien ir fons daudzām drupu fotogrāfijām. No apakšas izskatās diezgan biedējoši, un nogāze ir stāva un grūti pārvarama, bet pat vidējas fiziskās sagatavotības cilvēkam tajā būtu jāspēj uzkāpt aptuveni 45 minūtēs. Akmens pakāpieni ir izvietoti lielāko ceļa daļu, un stāvākos posmos tērauda troses nodrošina atbalsta margu. Tas nozīmē - sagaidiet, ka būsiet bez elpas, un uzmanieties stāvākās daļās, it īpaši slapjās vietās, jo tas var ātri kļūt bīstams. Netālu no virsotnes ir maza ala, kurai jāiet cauri, tā ir diezgan zema un diezgan cieši saspiesta.
mt: This steep mountain, located behind the northern part of Machu Picchu, often serves as a background for many ruin photos. It looks quite intimidating from below, and the slope is steep and difficult to climb, but even an average person could make it up in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are placed for most of the way, and steel cables provide support in the steeper sections. This means - expect to be without breath, and be careful in the steeper sections, especially in slippery areas, as it can quickly become dangerous. Nearby the summit is a small cave, which must be passed through, it is quite low and quite tightly squeezed.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Maļorkiešu virtuves (tāpat kā līdzīgu Vidusjūras reģionu virtuves) pamatā ir maize, dārzeņi un gaļa, jo īpaši cūkgaļa, un visur tiek izmantota olīveļļa. Vienkārši pagatavojams un plaši iecienīts vakariņu ēdiens, jo īpaši vasarā, ir pamboli. To gatavo no maizes, olīveļļas, tomātiem un citām piedevām, kas ir pa rokai, piemēram, siera, tunča u.c.
mt: The main ingredients of Maltese cuisine (as well as similar cuisines of the Mediterranean region) are wheat, vegetables and meat, especially pork, and olive oil. A simple dish that is widely enjoyed as a snack, especially in the summer, is the pamboli. It is made from bread, olive oil, tomatoes and other toppings, such as cheese, tuna and so on.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Hangi ēdienu gatavo zemē izraktā, karstā bedrē. Bedre tiek vai nu apsildīta ar karstiem ugunskura akmeņiem, vai arī dažās vietās ģeotermālais karstums padara zemes teritorijas dabiski karstas. Hangi bieži tiek izmantots, lai pagatavotu tradicionālās cepeša stila vakariņas. Dažās Rotorua vietās tiek piedāvāts ģeotermiski gatavots „hangi” ēdiens, savukārt citu veidu „hangi” var nogaršot Kraistčērčā, Velingtonā un citur.
mt: Food is cooked in a pit dug in the ground and heated by hot stones. The pit is heated either by hot fire stones or in some places geothermal heat makes the ground naturally hot. Hāngi is often used to prepare traditional flatbread style meals. In some Rotorua areas geothermally cooked hāngi is offered, while other types of hāngi can be enjoyed in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Klosteru apmeklējumu laikā sievietēm ir jāģērbj svārki, kas nosedz ceļgalus, kā arī jāapsedz pleci. Vairākumā klosteru sievietēm, kas ieradušās nesagatavojušās, tiek piedāvāti apmetņi, bet, ja paņemsiet līdzi savu, turklāt spilgtās krāsās, pie ieejas no mūka vai mūķenes saņemsiet smaidu. Līdzīgi arī vīriešiem ir jānēsā bikses, kas nosedz ceļgalus. Arī to var aizņemties no krājumiem pie ieejas, bet tas apģērbs netiek mazgāts pēc katra lietotāja, tāpēc jūs varētu nejusties ērti, valkājot šos svārkus. Viens izmērs der visiem vīriešiem!
mt: 1. Women must wear skirts that cover the knees, and must wear their hair down. Women who arrive without appropriate clothing will be given robes, but if you bring your own, you will be given a scolding. Men must wear shorts that cover the knees. You can buy these at the entrance, but they are not washed after each use, so you may not be comfortable wearing these shorts. One size fits all men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Ja apmeklēsiet Arktiku vai Antarktīdu ziemā, jūs piedzīvosiet polāro nakti, kas nozīmē, ka saule virs horizonta neaust. Tas sniedz labu iespēju redzēt ziemeļblāzmu, jo debesis būs tumšas vairāk vai mazāk visu diennakti. Tā kā šīs teritorijas nav blīvi apdzīvotas un līdz ar to gaismas piesārņojums bieži vien nerada problēmu, jūs varēsiet arī lūkoties zvaigznēs.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic in winter, you will experience polar night, which means the sun will not rise above the horizon. This gives a good opportunity to see the northern lights, as the skies will be dark for most of the day. As these territories are not densely populated and light pollution is often not a problem, you can also look up at the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Attālās vietās, kur nav mobilo tīklu pārklājuma, satelīttālrunis var būt vienīgā iespējamā izvēle. Satelīttālrunis nav gluži tas pats, kas mobilais tālrunis, jo zvana veikšanai nepieciešams atrasties ārā un tiešā līnijā pret satelītu. Pakalpojumu bieži izmanto kuģniecībā, tostarp izpriecu kuģi, kā arī ekspedīcijas, kurām nepieciešamas attālinātas datu un balss vajadzības. Jūsu vietējais tālruņu pakalpojumu sniedzējs varēs jums sniegt plašāku informāciju par to, kā izveidot savienojumu ar šo pakalpojumu.
mt: In remote areas where there is no mobile network coverage, a satellite phone may be the only option. A satellite phone is not the same as a mobile phone, as it requires you to be outside and in direct line of sight with the satellite. The service is often used by the shipping industry, including cruise ships, as well as expeditions that require remote data and voice needs. Your local mobile phone service provider will be able to provide you with more information on how to set up a connection with this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Moldovas galvaspilsēta ir Kišiņeva. Vietējā valoda ir rumāņu, bet krievu valoda tiek plaši izmantota. Moldova ir etniski daudzveidīga republika, kas ir cietusi no etniskajiem konfliktiem. 1994. gadā šā konflikta rezultātā Moldovas austrumos tika izveidotā pašpasludinātā Piedņestras Republika, kurai ir sava valdība un valūta, bet to nav atzinusi neviena ANO dalībvalsts. Par spīti nesekmīgajām politiskajām sarunām starp šīm abām Moldovas daļām ir atjaunotas ekonomiskās saites. Galvenā Moldovas reliģija ir pareizticība.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chișinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is an ethnically diverse republic that has suffered from ethnic conflicts. In 1994, as a result of this conflict, the autonomous region of Transnistria was created in the east of Moldova, which has its own government and currency, but is not recognized by any UN member state. Despite unsuccessful political negotiations between these two parts of Moldova, economic ties have been restored. The main religion of Moldova is Orthodoxy.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "Tā kā Montevideo atrodas dienvidos no ekvatora, tur vasara ir tad, kad ziemeļu puslodē ir ziema, un otrādi. Montevideo atrodas subtropu joslā; vasaras mēnešos temperatūra parasti pārsniedz +30 °C atzīmi. Ziema var būt mānīgi drēgna: temperatūra reti nokrītas zem sasalšanas robežas, taču, ja vienlaicīgi ir vējš un mitrums, tā šķiet aukstāka nekā rāda termometrs. Nav īpašu ""lietaino"" un ""sauso"" sezonu: lietus daudzums visu gadu ir aptuveni vienāds."
mt: "Because Montevideo is south of the equator, summer is when it is winter in the northern hemisphere, and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in summer months the temperature usually exceeds +30 °C. Winter can be quite chilly: the temperature rarely drops below the freezing point, but if there is wind and humidity, it feels colder than the thermometer indicates. There is no distinct "rainy" and "dry" season: the amount of precipitation is roughly the same throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Tā kā Montevideo atrodas dienvidos no ekvatora, tur vasara ir tad, kad ziemeļu puslodē ir ziema, un otrādi. Montevideo atrodas subtropu joslā; vasaras mēnešos temperatūra parasti pārsniedz +30 °C atzīmi. Ziema var būt mānīgi drēgna: temperatūra reti nokrītas zem sasalšanas robežas, taču, ja vienlaicīgi ir vējš un mitrums, tā šķiet aukstāka nekā rāda termometrs. Nav īpašu ""lietaino"" un ""sauso"" sezonu: lietus daudzums visu gadu ir aptuveni vienāds."
mt: "Because Montevideo is south of the equator, summer is when it is winter in the northern hemisphere, and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in summer months the temperature usually exceeds +30 °C. Winter can be quite chilly: the temperature rarely drops below the freezing point, but if there is wind and humidity, it feels colder than the thermometer indicates. There is no distinct "rainy" and "dry" season: the amount of precipitation is roughly the same throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Nevēlami sienas gleznojumi vai kricelējumi ir pazīstami kā grafiti. Lai gan tas pamatīgi atšķiras no mūsdienu fenomena, lielākā daļa cilvēku, iespējams, to saista ar jauniešu publiskā un privātā īpašuma vandālismu, izmantojot aerosola krāsu. Tomēr mūsdienās ir atpazīstami grafiti mākslinieki, grafiti pasākumi un pat ""legālas"" sienas. Šajā kontekstā grafiti gleznojumi bieži atgādina mākslas darbus, nevis nelegālus zīmējumus."
mt: "Uncontrollable wall paintings or scribblings are known as graffiti. Although it differs significantly from the modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with juvenile public and private property vandalism using aerosol paint. However, modern graffiti artists, graffiti events, and even "legal" walls are now recognized. In this context, graffiti paintings often resemble works of art, not illegal scribblings."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Dažos mūzikas festivālos lielāka daļa apmeklētāju izvēlas dzīvot teltīs, un vairums no viņiem to uzskata par būtisku daļu no festivāla pieredzes. Ja vēlaties atrasties tuvu notikumu epicentram, jums jāierodas agri, lai atrastu telts vietu, kas ir tuvu mūzikai. Neaizmirstiet: pat ja mūzika uz galvenajām skatuvēm jau ir beigusi skanēt, festivālā var būt vietas, kurās mūziku turpinās spēlēt līdz vēlai naktij. Dažos festivālos ir īpašas kempinga teritorijas, kas paredzētas ģimenēm ar maziem bērniem.
mt: At some music festivals, the majority of attendees choose to camp, and most consider it an integral part of the festival experience. If you want to be close to the action, you need to get there early to find a campsite close to the music. Remember: even if the main stages have stopped playing, there may be places where music is still being played until the wee hours. Some festivals have designated camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Ņemot vērā šo ciematu attālumu, tajos tikpat kā nebūs iespējams atrast nakts uzdzīvi, nebraucot uz Albukērku vai Santafe. Tomēr gandrīz visos iepriekš norādītajos kazino tiek pasniegti dzērieni, un dažos no tiem tiek piedāvāta arī īpaša izklaide (galvenokārt lielajos netālu no Albukērkas un Santafē). Uzmanību! Nomaļie bāri šeit ne vienmēr ir labākās vietas, kur pulcēties iebraucējiem. Vienu var teikt droši, ka Ņūmeksikas ziemeļdaļā ir būtiskas problēmas ar braukšanu alkohola reibumā, un mazpilsētas bāru apkārtnē ir ļoti daudz dzērušu autobraucēju.
mt: Given the distance from this town, there is no way to find a place to stay for the night without going to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, almost all of the casinos mentioned above serve alcohol, and some of them also offer entertainment (mostly in large ones near Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Note! The remote bars here are not always the best places to meet visitors. One can say confidently that there are serious problems with driving under the influence of alcohol in northern New Mexico, and there are a lot of drunk drivers in the vicinity of the town's bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "Galvenais vietējais alus ir 'Numur viens', tas nav izteiktas garšas alus, bet patīkams un atsvaidzinošs. Otru vietējo alu sauc ""Manta"". Ir daudz Francijas vīnu, taču Jaunzēlandes un Austrālijas vīni ir populārāki. Vietējo krāna ūdeni ir pilnīgi droši dzert, bet, ja esat baiļpilns, ūdeni pudelēs ir viegli atrast. Austrāliešiem jēdziens 'kafija ar pienu' ir svešs. Melna kafija tiek saukta par 'espresso', kapučīno gatavo ar milzīgu kaudzi putukrējuma (nevis piena putām) un tēju pasniedz bez piena. Karstā šokolāde atbilst Beļģijas standartiem. Augļu sulas ir dārgas, bet izcilas."
mt: "The main local beer is 'Numur viens', it is not a strong beer, but it is pleasant and refreshing. Another local beer is called "Manta". There is a lot of French wine, but New Zealand and Australian wines are more popular. Local bottled water is completely safe to drink, but if you are a germophobe, bottled water is easy to find. The Australian term 'coffee with milk' is strange. Black coffee is called 'espresso', cappuccino is made with a large cup of frothed milk (not cream) and served without milk. Hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive, but good."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Gvarani bija nozīmīgākā pamatiedzīvotāju grupa, kas apdzīvoja tagadējo Paragvajas austrumu daļu, dzīvojot kā pusklejotāji mednieki, kuri nodarbojās arī ar naturālo lauksaimniecību. Čako reģionā dzīvoja citas iezemiešu cilšu grupas, piemēram, guaikuru un pajaga, kas pārtika no medīšanas, barības meklēšanas un makšķerēšanas. Paragvaja, ko kādreiz sauca par ""Milzīgo Indijas provinci"", radās 16. gs. spāņu iekarotāju un vietējo iezemiešu grupu mijiedarbības rezultātā. Spāņi sāka kolonizācijas periodu, kas ilga trīs gadsimtus. Kopš Asunsjonas dibināšanas 1537. gadā Paragvaja ir spējusi saglabāt lielu daļu no sava vietējā rakstura un identitātes."
mt: The Guaraní were the most important indigenous group that inhabited the eastern part of present-day Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers who also practiced subsistence agriculture. Other indigenous groups in the Chaco region included the Guayakí and Payaguá, who subsisted on hunting, food gathering, and fishing. Paraguay, which was once called the "Great Province of the Indies," was formed by the interaction of Spanish colonizers and local indigenous groups. Spanish colonization began in 1537 with the founding of Asunción, and the country was able to maintain a large part of its local character and identity.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Parīziešiem ir egocentrisku, nepieklājīgu un uzpūtīgu cilvēku reputācija. Lai arī nereti šis stereotips ir kļūdains, labākais veids, kā saprasties ar parīziešiem, joprojām ir priekšzīmīgi uzvesties un izturēties kā ""bien élevé"" (labi audzinātam) cilvēkam. Tas ievērojami atvieglos ceļošanu. Ja izrādīsiet dažas pamatlaipnības, parīziešu nelaipnā āriene strauji pagaisīs."
mt: "Gay men have a reputation for being egocentric, narcissistic, and bitchy. While this stereotype is often wrong, the best way to get along with gay men is still to act and behave like a "bien élevé" (well-bred) person. It will make the journey much easier. If you show a few basic courtesies, a gay man's bitchy exterior will quickly melt away."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: "Uzņēmumam „MetroRail” ir divas piepilsētas vilcienu klases, kas ved pa Keiptaunu un tai apkārt: „MetroPlus” (saukta arī par pirmo klasi) un „Metro” (saukta par trešo klasi). „MetroPlus” klase ir ērtāka un nav tik pārpildīta, kaut arī nedaudz dārgāka, tomēr joprojām lētāka nekā parasta metro biļete Eiropā. Ikvienam vilcienam ir gan ""MetroPlus"", gan ""Metro"" vagoni. ""MetroPlus"" vagoni vienmēr atrodas vilciena galā tuvāk Keiptaunai."
mt: "The company "MetroRail" has two suburban train classes that serve Cape Town and its suburbs: "MetroPlus" (also called first class) and "Metro" (also called third class). "MetroPlus" class is more comfortable and is not as crowded, but is a bit more expensive, but still cheaper than a regular metro ticket in Europe. Each train has both "MetroPlus" and "Metro" cars. "MetroPlus" cars are always at the front of the train closer to Cape Town."
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Ceļotāji var saskarties ar dzīvnieku parazītiem, kuri viņiem nav zināmi viņu dzimtajos reģionos. Kaitēkļi var sabojāt pārtiku, izraisīt iekaisumu vai, sliktākajā gadījumā, izraisīt alerģiskas reakcijas, izplatīt indi vai pārnest infekcijas. Infekcijas slimības pašas par sevi vai bīstami dzīvnieki, kas var ievainot vai nogalināt cilvēkus, parasti netiek uzskatīti par kaitēkļiem.
mt: Travelers may encounter pests that are not known in their home regions. Pests can damage food, cause illness, or, in the worst case, cause allergic reactions, spread toxins, or transmit infections. Infections that are serious enough to cause illness or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people are not usually considered pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Ikvienā nelielā veikalā ir milzum daudz priekšapmaksas tālruņa karšu, kuras var izmantot taksofonos vai parastajos tālruņos. Lai gan lielāko daļu karšu var izmantot zvanīšanai uz jebkuru valsti, dažām kartēm tiek piedāvāti izdevīgi tarifi zvanīšanai uz noteiktām valstu grupām. Šiem pakalpojumiem bieži vien var piekļūt, zvanot uz bezmaksas tālruņa numuru, ko atbalsta vairums tālruņa aparātu.
mt: In any small shop there is a large amount of prepaid phone cards, which can be used in taxis or in ordinary phones. Although most cards can be used to call any country, some cards offer special tariffs for calling certain groups of countries. These services are often available by calling a free phone number, which is supported by most phone devices.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Plitvices ezeru nacionālais parks ir ļoti mežains, galvenokārt tajā ir dižskābārži, egles un baltegles, un tajā ir Alpu un Vidusjūras veģetācijas sajaukums. Tajā ir plaša augu kopumu daudzveidība, pateicoties dažādajiem mikroklimatiem, augsnes tipiem un augstumiem virs jūras līmeņa. Šajā apgabalā dzīvo arī ļoti dažādas dzīvnieku un putnu sugas. Tur ir atrodama arī tāda reta fauna kā Eirāzijas brūnais lācis, vilks, ērglis, pūce, lūsis, savvaļas kaķis un mednis, kā arī daudzas citas parastās sugas.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is very forested, mainly with beech, fir and spruce, and it has a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a wide variety of plant communities, due to different microclimates, soil types and altitudes above sea level. It is home to many different animal and bird species. It is also home to such rare fauna as the brown bear, wolf, eagle, wild boar, lynx, wildcat, otter, fox, and many other common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Plitvices ezeru nacionālais parks ir ļoti mežains, galvenokārt tajā ir dižskābārži, egles un baltegles, un tajā ir Alpu un Vidusjūras veģetācijas sajaukums. Tajā ir plaša augu kopumu daudzveidība, pateicoties dažādajiem mikroklimatiem, augsnes tipiem un augstumiem virs jūras līmeņa. Šajā apgabalā dzīvo arī ļoti dažādas dzīvnieku un putnu sugas. Tur ir atrodama arī tāda reta fauna kā Eirāzijas brūnais lācis, vilks, ērglis, pūce, lūsis, savvaļas kaķis un mednis, kā arī daudzas citas parastās sugas.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is very forested, mainly with beech, fir and spruce, and it has a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a wide variety of plant communities, due to different microclimates, soil types and altitudes above sea level. It is home to many different animal and bird species. It is also home to such rare fauna as the brown bear, wolf, eagle, wild boar, lynx, wildcat, otter, fox, and many other common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "Plašsaziņas līdzekļu uzņēmumi regulāri melo par šīs darbības mērķi, apgalvojot, ka tas ir ""lai novērstu pirātismu"". Faktiski reģionu kodiem nav absolūti nekādas ietekmes uz nelegālu kopēšanu; diska bitu kopija tiks atskaņota tikpat labi jebkurā ierīcē, kur tiktu atskaņots arī oriģināls. Patiesais mērķis ir dot šiem uzņēmumiem lielāku kontroli pār saviem tirgiem, runa ir par naudas pelnīšanu."
mt: "Media companies regularly lie about the purpose of this activity, claiming that it is ""to prevent piracy"". In fact, the region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a disc bit copy will play just as well in any device that will play the original. The real purpose is to give these companies greater control over their markets, the talk is about money making."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Lai gan, ierodoties dzimtenē, imigrācijas pārbaudes parasti nav vai tā ir tikai formalitāte, muitas kontrole var sagādāt grūtības. Noskaidrojiet, ko var un ko nevar ievest, un deklarējiet visu, kas pārsniedz likumā noteiktos ierobežojumus.
mt: Although, when returning home, immigration checks are usually not or it is just a formality, customs control can be difficult. Determine what can and cannot be brought in, and declare everything that exceeds the limits set by law.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Lai gan, ierodoties dzimtenē, imigrācijas pārbaudes parasti nav vai tā ir tikai formalitāte, muitas kontrole var sagādāt grūtības. Noskaidrojiet, ko var un ko nevar ievest, un deklarējiet visu, kas pārsniedz likumā noteiktos ierobežojumus.

src: Kočamo ieleja — Čīles izcilākā klinšu kāpšanas vieta, ko pazīst kā Dienvidamerikas Josemītu, kurā ir visdažādākās milzu granīta sienas un klintis. Virsotnes sniedz elpu aizraujošus skatus no smailēm. Alpīnisti no visām pasaules malām pastāvīgi veido jaunus maršrutus tās bezgalīgajām klinšu sienām.
mt: The Cochamó Valley — Chile's most famous canyoning spot, known as the South American Yosemite, where there are the most varied giant granite walls and cliffs. The summits offer breathtaking views from the spires. Alpinists from all over the world are constantly creating new routes in its endless cliff walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Ja vēlaties aplidot apkārt pasaulei tikai dienvidu puslodē, ir ierobežota reisu un galamērķu izvēle, jo nav maršrutu pāri okeānam. Neviena aviolīniju alianse nešķērso visus trīs okeānus dienvidu puslodē (un „SkyTeam” nešķērso nevienu okeānu). Tomēr Star Alliance aptver visu, izņemot Klusā okeāna dienvidaustrumus no Santjāgo līdz Taiti, kas ietilpst LATAM Oneworld lidojumā. Šis lidojums nav vienīgā iespēja, ja vēlaties izlaist Klusā okeāna dienvidu daļu un Dienvidamerikas rietumu krastu. (skatīt zemāk)
mt: If you want to circle the world in the southern hemisphere, your route and destination choices are limited, as there are no transoceanic routes. No airline alliance crosses all three oceans in the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam doesn't cross any ocean). However, Star Alliance covers all but the southern Pacific from Santiago to Tahiti, which is part of the LATAM Oneworld flight. This is not the only option if you want to skip the southern Pacific and South American west coast. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: "Starptautiskā mērogā ir vairāk nekā 200 aktīvu ceļojumu organizāciju. Vairums no tām darbojas neatkarīgi. Global Running Tours pēcteča ""Go Running Tours"" tīklos darbojas desmitiem skriešanas tūru pakalpojumu sniedzēju četros kontinentos. Barselonas „Running Tours Barcelona” un Kopenhāgenas „Running Copenhagen” aizsācējiem ātri pievienojās „Running Tours Prague” Prāgā un citi."
mt: "Internationally, there are more than 200 active running tour operators. Most of them work independently. Global Running Tours offspring "Go Running Tours" operates in the networks of dozens of running tour service providers in four continents. The founders of Barcelona's "Running Tours Barcelona" and Copenhagen's "Running Copenhagen" were soon joined by "Running Tours Prague" in Prague and others."
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Safari braucieni, iespējams, ir lielākais tūristu pievilkšanas objekts Āfrikā un daudzu apmeklētāju spilgtākais piedzīvojums. Populāri lietotais termins ""safari"" attiecas uz ceļojumiem pa sauszemi, lai apskatītu satriecošo Āfrikas savvaļas dabu, īpaši savannu. Daži dzīvnieki, piemēram, ziloņi un žirafes, mēdz pienākt automašīnām tuvu klāt, tāpēc standarta aprīkojums tos ļaus labi apskatīt. Lauvas, gepardi un leopardi dažkārt ir bikli, un tos var saskatīt labāk ar binokli. Safari gājiens (ko sauc arī par ""krūmu gājienu"", ""safari pārgājienu"" vai iešanu ""ar kājām"") ir pārgājiens, kas var ilgt no dažām stundām līdz pat vairākām dienām."
mt: "Safari drives are perhaps the biggest tourist attraction in Africa and the most thrilling experience for many visitors. The popular term "safari" refers to journeys across the savanna to see wild African animals. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, often come close to cars, so standard equipment allows them to be seen well. Gazelles, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes on bikes, and they can be seen better with binoculars. A safari walk (also called a "bush walk", "safari walk" or "walking with lions") is a walk that can last from a few hours to several days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Ekskursijas ir lētākas lielākām grupām, tādēļ, ja esat viens pats vai tikai ar vienu draugu, mēģiniet iepazīties ar citiem cilvēkiem un izveidot četru līdz sešu cilvēku grupu, lai iegūtu labāku cenu likmi vienai personai. Tomēr šim vajadzētu būt jūsu uzmanības lokā, jo tūristi bieži tiek lūgti doties uz citu vietu, lai aizpildītu automašīnas. Šķiet, ka patiesībā tas vairāk ir veids, ka likt cilvēkiem domāt, ka viņiem jāmaksā vairāk.
mt: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you are alone or just with one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six people to get a better price per person. However, this should be your focus, as tourists are often asked to go to another place to fill the car. It seems that this is actually a way to make people think that they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Lai gan Sanfrancisko ekonomika ir saistīta ar piederību pasaules līmeņa tūrisma objekta statusam, tās ekonomiku veido daudzas nozares. Lielākie nodarbinātības sektori ir profesionālie pakalpojumi, valsts pārvalde, finanses, tirdzniecība un tūrisms. Tās biežais atspoguļojums mūzikā, filmās, literatūrā un populārajā kultūrā ir palīdzējis šai pilsētai un tās vēstures objektiem kļūt atpazīstamiem visā pasaulē. Sanfrancisko ir plaši attīstīta tūrisma infrastruktūra, kurā ietilpst daudz viesnīcu, restorānu un augstākā līmeņa ēku sanāksmju rīkošanai. Sanfrancisko ir arī viena no vislabākajām vietām valstī, kur var baudīt citu veidu Āzijas virtuves: korejiešu, taizemiešu, indiešu un japāņu.
mt: While San Francisco's economy is tied to its status as a world-class tourist destination, its economy is also driven by a number of other industries. The largest employers are professional services, government, finance, retail and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, film, literature and popular culture has helped this city and its landmarks become recognized worldwide. San Francisco has a well-developed tourism infrastructure, including many hotels, restaurants and venues for large conventions. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country to enjoy other Asian cuisines: Korean, Thai, Indian and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Iepriekšēja rezervācija dod ceļotājiem sirdsmieru, ka, ierodoties galamērķī, viņiem būs vieta, kur gulēt. Ceļojumu aģentiem bieži vien ir vienošanās ar konkrētām viesnīcām, lai gan ar ceļojumu aģenta starpniecību jums ir iespēja rezervēt cita veida naktsmītnes, piemēram, kempinga vietas. Ceļojumu aģenti parasti piedāvā komplektus, kuros ir iekļautas brokastis, transporta pakalpojumi uz/no lidostas vai pat kombinēti lidojumu un viesnīcas komplekti. Viņi var arī pataupīt jums rezervāciju, ja jums ir nepieciešams laiks apdomāt piedāvājumu, vai sagādāt citus dokumentus galamērķim (piem., vīzu). Taču jebkuras izmaiņas vai pieprasījumi vispirms jāsūta ceļojumu aģentam, nevis tieši viesnīcai.
mt: Previous reservations give travelers heartache, that when they arrive at their destination, they will have a place to sleep. Travel agents often have agreements with specific hotels, but with a travel agent's help, you can reserve other types of accommodations, such as a camping site. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also save you a reservation, if you need time to consider the offer, or to obtain other documents for your destination (e.g., visa). However, any changes or requests must first be sent to the travel agent, not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Reāllaika teksta tulkošanas lietotnes — lietojumprogrammas, kas var automātiski iztulkot veselus teksta segmentus no vienas valodas otrā. Dažas šīs kategorijas lietojumprogrammas pat var iztulkot svešvalodas tekstus, kas attēloti uz zīmēm vai citiem objektiem dabā, lietotājam pavēršot viedtālruni pret attiecīgajiem objektiem. Tulkošanas rīki ir krietni uzlabojušies, un tagad tie bieži vien sniedz vairāk vai mazāk pareizus tulkojumus (un daudz retāk buldurēšanu), taču ir jāpievērš uzmanība, jo tie tomēr var būt kļūdījušies. Viena no izcilākajām šīs kategorijas lietotnēm ir „Google Translate”, kurā pēc vajadzīgās valodas datu lejupielādes iespējams tulkot bezsaistē.
mt: Real-time text translation applications — applications that can automatically translate entire text segments from one language to another. Some of these applications can even translate foreign-language texts that are displayed on signs or other objects in nature, presenting a smartphone to the objects. Translation tools have improved significantly, and now they often provide more or less accurate translations (and much less often, mistranslations), but attention should be paid, as they can still be wrong. One of the best of this category of applications is "Google Translate", where after downloading the necessary language data, it is possible to translate offline.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Lavīnas nav nekas neparasts; uz stāvajām nogāzēm spēj noturēties tikai noteikts daudzums sniega, un pārējais noslīd lavīnu veidā. Problēma ir tāda, ka sniegs ir lipīgs, tāpēc to ir nepieciešams nedaudz sakustināt, lai tas nokristu, un, ja nokrīt kāda daļa sniega, tad tas var izraisīt to, ka nokrīt arī viss pārējais sniegs. Dažkārt sākotnējais izraisītājs ir saule, kas sasilda sniegu, dažreiz — papildu snigšana vai citi dabiski notikumi, taču bieži vien — cilvēks.
mt: Avalanches are nothing unusual; only a certain amount of snow can stay on a slope, and the rest slides down as an avalanche. The problem is that snow is slippery, so it is necessary to stir it a little to make it fall, and if some snow falls, it can cause the rest of the snow to fall. Sometimes the initial cause is the sun, which warms the snow, sometimes — additional snowfall or other natural events, but often — a person.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "Karijs ir ēdiens, ko gatavo no gaļas vai dārzeņiem, pievienojot garšaugus un garšvielas. Karijs var būt gan ""sauss"", gan ""slapjš"" atkarībā no šķidruma daudzuma. Ziemeļindijas un Pakistānas iekšzemes reģionos jogurtu bieži izmanto karijos; Dienvidindijā un dažos subkontinenta piekrastes reģionos bieži izmanto kokosriekstu pienu."
mt: "Curry is a food in which the main ingredients are meat or vegetables, spices and flavorings. Curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid. In Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is often used in curries; in Southern India and some coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is often used."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Dienvidpola traverss (vai automaģistrāle) ir 1600 km gara taka no Makmerdo stacijas pie Rosas jūras līdz Dienvidpolam. Tas ir sablīvēts sniegs ar aizpildītām plaisām un karodziņiem. Pa to var braukt tikai ar īpašiem traktoriem, kas velk ragavas ar degvielu un krājumiem. Tie nav ļoti ātri, un lai nokļūtu plato, ir jādodas pa garu taku, kas ved apkārt Transantarktīdas klaniem.
mt: 1600 km long South Pole Traverse (or highway) is a snow-covered track from McMurdo Station near the Ross Sea to the South Pole. It is filled with crevasses and potholes. It can only be driven by special tractors that pull sleds with fuel and supplies. They are not very fast, and to get to the plateau, you have to go along a long track that goes around the Transantarctic Mountains.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Ieceļošana Dienvidamerikā ar automašīnu ir brīnišķīgs veids, kā apskatīt visa reģiona skaistumu, kā arī nokļūt vietās, kas nav tradicionālie tūristu maršruti. To var darīt ar parastu automašīnu, rūpīgi plānojot, taču 4x4 ir ļoti ieteicams, un daudzās vietās var nokļūt tikai ar augsto 4x4 riteņu bāzi. Plānojot ņemiet vērā to, ka, lai gan Dienvidāfrikā ir stabila politiskā situācija, ne visās kaimiņvalstīs ir tāpat. Vīzu prasības un izmaksas dažādās valstīs ir atšķirīgas, un tās ietekmē tas, no kuras valsts esat. Katrai valstij ir arī savi unikāli likumi, kuri nosaka, kādiem ārkārtas situācijas priekšmetiem ir jāatrodas automašīnā.
mt: 4x4 is a great way to see the sights of South America, and get to places that are not on the tourist trail. You can do it with a regular car, but it is much easier with a 4x4, and in some places you can only get there with a high clearance 4x4. When planning, take into account that, while South Africa has a stable political situation, this is not true of all its neighbors. Visa requirements and costs vary from country to country, and this is affected by which country you are from. Each country also has its own unique laws, which specify what items must be carried in the car in emergency situations.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Pārvadāšana citu vārdā — nekad neatstājiet savas somas bez uzraudzības, īpaši, šķērsojot starptautiskās robežas. Var izrādīties, ka, jums to nezinot, tiekat izmantots kā narkotiku pārvadātājs, un tas var jums radīt lielas nepatikšanas. Tas ietver gaidīšanu rindā, jo suņus, kas spēj saost narkotikas, varēja izmantot jebkurā laikā bez iepriekšēja brīdinājuma. Dažās valstīs ir pārmērīgi bargs sods arī pirmreizēja pārkāpuma gadījumā; tas var būt vairāk nekā 10 gadus ilgs cietumsods vai nāvessods. Nepieskatītas somas ir zādzības mērķis, taču, lai uzmanītos no spridzekļa draudiem, tās var arī piesaistīt varas iestāžu uzmanību.
mt: Carry-on luggage — never leave your bags unattended, especially when crossing international borders. It may turn out that you are using a drug mule, and this can cause you great inconvenience. This includes waiting in line, as dogs that can smell drugs may be used at any time without prior notice. In some countries, there is a severe penalty even for a first-time offense; this can be more than 10 years in prison or the death penalty. Unattended bags are a target for bombs, but to be on the safe side, they can also attract the attention of the authorities.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Rītos piepildiet savu māju ar bagātīgu kafijas aromātu, bet vakaros – ar relaksējošas kumelīšu tējas smaržu. Kad pavadāt brīvdienas savā pilsētā, jums ir laiks palutināt sevi un veltīt dažus papildu brīžus, lai pagatavotu kaut ko īpašu. Ja vēlaties nedaudz riskēt, izmantojiet iespēju izspiest sulu vai sajaukt dažus smūtijus: varbūt jūs atklāsiet vienkāršu dzērienu, ko varēsiet gatavot brokastīs pēc tam, kad atgriezīsieties savā ikdienas rutīnā. Ja dzīvojat pilsētā, kur ir dažāda alkoholisko dzērienu patēriņa kultūra, dodieties uz bāriem un krogiem rajonos, kurus bieži neapmeklējat.
mt: Wake up in the morning with a rich coffee aroma, and in the evening with the relaxing scent of chamomile tea. When spending the weekend in your city, you have time to pamper yourself and spend a few extra minutes to prepare something special. If you want to take a risk, use the opportunity to squeeze a juice or mix some cocktails: you may discover a simple drink that you can prepare for breakfast after returning to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a culture of alcohol consumption, go to bars and pubs in neighborhoods that are often not visited.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Haldarsvīkas ciemats paver skatus uz tuvējo Eisturoja salu, un šeit ir arī neparasta astoņstūra baznīca. Baznīcas dārzā uz dažām kapavietām ir interesantas marmora dūju skulptūras. Tas ir pusstundas pastaigas vērts pa aizraujošo ciemu.
mt: The village of Haldarsvik offers views of the nearby island of Eysturoy, and there is also an unusual octagonal church. The churchyard has interesting marble candle sculptures. It is worth a half-hour stroll through the picturesque village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Lai gan, apmeklējot noteiktas valstis tūrisma nolūkos vai darba darīšanās, vīza īslaicīgam apmeklējumam nav nepieciešama, ja dosieties turp kā starptautisks students, tad parasti būs nepieciešams uzturēties ilgāk nekā vienkārši tūristam. Parasti, lai uzturētos citā valstī ilgstoši, iepriekš jāsaņem vīza. Studentu vīzām parasti ir atšķirīgas prasības un pieteikšanās kārtība nekā parastajām tūrisma vai biznesa vīzām. Vairums valstu prasīs piedāvājuma vēstuli no mācību iestādes, kurā vēlaties studēt, kā arī apliecinājumu par to, ka jums ir pietiekami naudas līdzekļi, lai uzturētu sevi vismaz pirmo mācību gadu. Noskaidrojot precīzas prasības mācību iestādē, kā arī tās valsts, kurā vēlaties studēt, imigrācijas departamentā.
mt: Even though you may not need a visa to visit certain countries for tourism or work, if you are going there to study, you will usually need a visa. Usually, to stay in a country for a long time, you will need to get a visa first. Student visas usually have different requirements and application procedures than regular tourist or business visas. Most countries will require a letter of offer from the school you wish to study at, as well as proof that you have enough money to support yourself for at least the first school year. Determine the exact requirements of the school you are applying to, as well as the immigration department of the country you wish to study in.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

mt: Even though you may not need a visa to visit certain countries for tourism or work, if you are going there to study, you will usually need a visa. Usually, to stay in a country for a long time, you will need to get a visa first. Student visas usually have different requirements and application procedures than regular tourist or business visas. Most countries will require a letter of offer from the school you wish to study at, as well as proof that you have enough money to support yourself for at least the first school year. Determine the exact requirements of the school you are applying to, as well as the immigration department of the country you wish to study in.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Jo īpaši vasarā ir jāuzmanās no moskītiem, ja vēlaties doties pārgājienā pa mūžamežu. Pat ja braucat pa subtropu lietusmežiem ar automašīnu, pietiek vien ar to, ka atverat durvis uz dažām sekundēm, lai iekāptu automašīnā, un moskīti jau būs ielidojuši tās salonā.
mt: Especially in the summer, be aware of mosquitoes when going for a walk in the woods. Even if you drive through a subtropical rainforest in a car, it is enough to open the door for a few seconds to get in the car, and the mosquitoes will already be inside.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarbani ir lielākā piekrastes mangrovju josla pasaulē, kas no krasta stiepjas 80 km (50 jūdzes) garumā Bangladešas un Indijas iekšzemē. Sundarbani ir pasludināts par UNESCO pasaules mantojuma objektu. Meža daļu Indijas teritorijā sauc par Sundarbani nacionālo parku. Meži tomēr nav tikai mangrovju purvi - tie ietver dažas no pēdējām atlikušajām vareno džungļu audzēm, kas kādreiz klāja Gandžetika līdzenumu. Sundarbani platība ir 3850 km², no kuras apmēram vienu trešdaļu klāj ūdens/purva teritorijas. Kopš 1966. gada Sanderbans ir savvaļas dzīvnieku rezervāts, un tiek lēsts, ka tagad tā teritorijā ir 400 karaliskie Bengālijas tīģeri un aptuveni 30 000 plankumainie brieži.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) inland from the coast of Bangladesh and India. Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest in India is called Sundarbans National Park. The forest is not only mangrove swamps - it also includes some of the last remaining virgin sal forests that once covered the Ganges Delta. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered by water. Since 1966, Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Pasaulē ir vairāk nekā 5000 dažādu valodu, tostarp vairāk nekā divdesmit ar 50 miljoniem vai vairāk runātājiem. Turklāt rakstītus vārdus bieži vien ir vieglāk saprast nekā runātos. Īpaši tas attiecas uz adresēm, kuras saprotami izrunāt nereti sagādā grūtības. Daudzās valstīs visi brīvi runā angļu valodā, bet vēl lielākā skaitā valstu var sagaidīt ierobežotas zināšanas — īpaši jaunāku cilvēku vidū. Iedomājies, ka Mančestras, Bostonas, Jamaikas un Sidnejas iedzīvotāji sēž pie galda un ēd vakariņas restorānā Toronto. Viņi izklaidē viens otru ar stāstiem no savām dzimtajām pilsētām, kas tiek stāstīti atšķirīgos akcentos un vietējā žargonā.
mt: There are more than 5000 different languages in the world, including more than twenty with over 50 million speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken ones. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce. In many countries everyone freely speaks English, but in many more countries there are restricted knowledge — especially among younger people. Imagine people from Manchester, Boston, Jamaica and Sydney sitting at a table and eating dinner in a restaurant in Toronto. They entertain each other with stories from their hometowns, which are told in different accents and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Autobusi atiet no starppilsētu autobusu stacijas (otrpus upei) visas dienas garumā, taču vairums, jo īpaši austrumu virziena un Džakāras/Bumtangas maršrutos, atiet laikā no plkst. 06:30 līdz 07:30. Tā kā starprajonu autobusi bieži vien ir pārpildīti, ieteicams iegādāties biļeti dažas dienas iepriekš. Lielāko daļu rajonu apkalpo mazi japāņu piekrastes autobusi, kas ir ērti un izturīgi. Kopbraukšanas taksometri piedāvā ātru un ērtu veidu, kā doties uz tuvumā esošām vietām, piemēram, uz Paro (150 Butānas ngultrumi) un Punakhu (200 Butānas ngultrumi).
mt: The buses leave from the intercity bus station (across the river) all day, but most, especially the eastbound and Jhakar/Bumthang routes, leave between 6:30 and 7:30 am. As intercity buses are often full, it is recommended to buy tickets a few days in advance. Most of the areas are served by small Japanese coastal buses, which are comfortable and durable. The taxi meter offers a quick and convenient way to go to nearby places, such as Paro (150 Butanese ngultrum) and Punakha (200 Butanese ngultrum).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "Sakarā ar to, ka tai ir samērā grūti piekļūt, ""Timbuktu"" ir kļuvusi par metaforu, ko lieto eksotisku, attālu zemju apzīmēšanai. Mūsdienās Timbuktu ir nabadzīga pilsēta, lai gan tās reputācija padara to par tūristus piesaistošu objektu un tai ir lidosta. 1990. gadā tuksneša smilšu apdraudējuma dēļ tas tika iekļauts apdraudēto pasaules mantojuma pieminekļu sarakstā. Šī bija viena no galvenajām pieturām, kur tika uzņemta Henrija Luisa Geitsa raidstacijas PBS dokumentālā filma „Afrikāņu pasaules brīnumi”. Pilsēta ir krasā pretstatā pārējām valsts pilsētām, jo ​​tajā ir vairāk arābu, nevis afrikāņu stils."
mt: Because it is difficult to access, Timbuktu has become a metaphor for exotic, faraway places. Today, Timbuktu is a poor town, but its reputation makes it a tourist attraction and it has an airport. In 1990, sandstorm threats led to its inclusion in the list of endangered world heritage sites. This was one of the main stops where the PBS documentary film "The Wonders of the African World" by Henry Louis Gates was filmed. The town is a stark contrast to other towns in the country, as it has more Arab, not African, style.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Paralimpiskās spēles notiks no 2021. gada 24. augusta līdz 5. septembrim. Daži pasākumi norisināsies citās vietās visā Japānā. Tokija būs vienīgā Āzijas pilsēta, kura būs rīkojusi divas vasaras olimpiskās spēles, tur notika olimpiskās spēles arī 1964. gadā. Ja bijāt pasūtījis lidojumus un viesnīcu 2020. gadam pirms atlikšanas izziņošanas, varat būt nonācis sarežģītā situācijā. Atcelšanas noteikumi atšķiras, taču marta beigās vairums ar koronavīrusa pandēmiju saistītie atcelšanas noteikumi netiek pagarināti līdz 2020. gada jūlijam, kad ir plānotas Olimpiskās spēles. Paredzams, ka vairums pasākumu biļešu maksās no ¥2500 līdz ¥130 000, parastām biļetēm maksājot aptuveni ¥7000.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5. Some events will be held in other places across Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympic Games, having hosted the 1964 Summer Olympics. If you had booked flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement, you may be in a difficult situation. Cancellation policies vary, but most coronavirus-related cancellation policies are not extended until July 2020, when the Olympics are scheduled to take place. It is expected that most events will cost between ¥2500 and ¥130,000, with standard tickets costing approximately ¥7000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "Viesuļvētra ir virpuļojošs ļoti zema spiediena gaisa stabs, kas iesūc apkārtējo gaisu un virza to augšup. Tie rada stipru vēju (bieži 100-200 jūdzes stundā) un var pacelt gaisā smagus priekšmetus, nesot tos virzienā, kurā pūš viesuļvētra. Tās sākas kā piltuves, kas nolaižas no vētras mākoņiem, un, pieskaroties zemei, kļūst par ""tornado""."
mt: "A hurricane is a very low-pressure air column that sucks in surrounding air and pushes it upwards. They create strong winds (often 100-200 miles per hour) and can lift heavy objects and carry them in the direction of the hurricane. They start as funnels that fall from thunderstorm clouds and, as they approach the ground, become ""tornadoes""."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."
