src: Ja jūsu apmeklētajai valstij piemēros ieteikumus par ceļošanu, var tikt ietekmēta jūsu ceļojuma veselības apdrošināšana vai ceļojuma atcelšanas apdrošināšana. Iespējams, jūs vēlēsieties ieklausīties citas valsts valdības padomos, taču tie ir paredzēti attiecīgo valstu pilsoņiem. Kā viens no piemēriem, amerikāņi Tuvajos un Vidējos Austrumos var sastapties ar atšķirīgām situācijām nekā eiropieši vai arābi. Ceļveži sniedz tikai īsu apkopojumu par politisko situāciju vienā valstī. Iesniegtie viedokļi bieži ir pavirši, vispārīgi un pārāk vienkāršoti, salīdzinot ar detalizētāku informāciju, kas pieejama citur.
mt: If your travel advice for a country includes a warning against travel, your travel insurance or cancellation insurance may be affected. You may wish to listen to the advice of the government of the country you are visiting, but this is intended for citizens of that country. For example, Americans in the Near and Middle East may encounter different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Travelers provide only a brief overview of the political situation in one country. Submitted views are often superficial, general and too simplistic, compared to more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Ceļojumu aģentūras darbojas kopš 19. gadsimta. Ceļojumu aģents parasti ir laba izvēle ceļojumam, kas paplašina ceļotāja iepriekšējos iespaidus par dabu, kultūru, valodu vai valstīm ar zemiem ienākumiem. Lai arī vairums aģentūru labprāt pieņem izplatītākos pasūtījumus, daudzi aģenti specializējas konkrētos ceļojumu veidos un piedāvā ceļojumus noteiktu budžetu ietvaros vai uz noteiktiem galamērķiem. Varētu būt noderīgāk izmantot aģentu, kas bieži pasūta jūsu braucienam līdzīgus braucienus. Apskatiet, kādus ceļojumus aģents reklamē tīmekļa vietnē vai veikala skatlogā.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good choice for a trip that expands the traveler's previous impressions of nature, culture, language or countries with low incomes. Although most agencies are happy to distribute the most popular requests, many agents specialize in specific travel types and offer trips within a certain budget or to specific destinations. It may be more useful to use an agent who often orders similar trips to yours. Check what trips the agent advertises on the website or in the store window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Ceļojumu aģentūras darbojas kopš 19. gadsimta. Ceļojumu aģents parasti ir laba izvēle ceļojumam, kas paplašina ceļotāja iepriekšējos iespaidus par dabu, kultūru, valodu vai valstīm ar zemiem ienākumiem. Lai arī vairums aģentūru labprāt pieņem izplatītākos pasūtījumus, daudzi aģenti specializējas konkrētos ceļojumu veidos un piedāvā ceļojumus noteiktu budžetu ietvaros vai uz noteiktiem galamērķiem. Varētu būt noderīgāk izmantot aģentu, kas bieži pasūta jūsu braucienam līdzīgus braucienus. Apskatiet, kādus ceļojumus aģents reklamē tīmekļa vietnē vai veikala skatlogā.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. src: "Pirms ceļošanas un tās laikā jums ir jāņem vērā daudzas lietas. Kad ceļojat, esiet gatavi, ka lietas nav tādas, kādas tās ir ""mājās"". Manieres, likumi, pārtika, satiksme, naktsmājas, standarti, valoda un tā tālāk zināmā mērā atšķirsies no jūsu dzīvesvietas. Tas jums vienmēr jāpatur prātā, lai izvairītos no vilšanās vai varbūt pat riebuma pret vietējiem paņēmieniem, kā darīt lietas."
mt: "Before and during your travels, you should be aware of many things. When traveling, be prepared that things are not as they are at home." Manners, laws, food, transportation, hotels, standards, language and so on will be different from your home. Always keep this in mind to avoid being carried away or even offended by local customs, as doing things.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Ja pirmo reizi ceļojat jaunattīstības valstī vai jaunā pasaules daļā, nenovērtējiet par zemu iespējamo kultūršoku. Daudzus stabilus, spējīgus ceļotājus ir ārkārtīgi ietekmējis attīstības valstu ceļojumos pieredzētais neparastums, un šajās valstīs daudzas mazas kultūras nianses var sakrāties ātri vien. Jo īpaši pirmajās dienās, apsveriet iespēju dzīvot rietumnieku stilā un apmesties augstākas klases viesnīcās, ieturēt dārgākas maltītes un izmantot labākus pakalpojumus, lai būtu vieglāk aklimatizēties. Neguliet uz matrača vai paklājiņa, kas uzklāts uz zemes vietās, kurās nepazīstat vietējo dzīvnieku valsti. Ja plānojat gulēt teltī, paņemiet līdzi tūristu guļvietu vai guļamtīklu, lai izvairītos no čūskām, skorpioniem utt.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country or a new part of the world for the first time, don't underestimate the cultural shock. Many stable, capable travelers have been greatly affected by the cultural oddities of developing countries, and in these countries many small cultural nuances can be easily overlooked. Especially in the first few days, consider the possibility of living like a Westerner and staying in a higher class hotel, eating expensive meals and using better services to make it easier to acclimate. Don't sleep on a bed or cot that is placed on the ground in areas where you are not familiar with the local wildlife. If you plan to sleep in a tent, bring a tourist sleeping bag or sleeping mat to avoid snakes, scorpions, etc.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "Izgatavojiet polises un apdrošinātāja kontaktinformācijas kopijas un ņemiet tās līdzi. Viņiem ir jāparāda apdrošinātāja e-pasta adrese un starptautiskie tālruņa numuri, lai saņemtu padomu/atļaujas un iesniegtu prasības. Turiet vienu kopiju savā bagāžā un arī tiešsaistē (nosūtiet sev e-pastu ar pielikumu vai glabājiet ""mākoņpakalpojumā""). Ja ceļojat ar klēpjdatoru vai planšetdatoru, saglabājiet kopiju tā atmiņā vai diskā (pieejams bez interneta). Turklāt iedodiet polises kopijas/kontaktpersonu datus ceļojuma biedriem un mājās palikušajiem radiniekiem vai draugiem, kuri labprāt palīdzēs."
mt: "Make copies of your insurance policy and contact information and take them with you. They should have the insurance company's e-mail address and international phone numbers to get advice/permission and submit requests. Keep one copy in your luggage and also online (send yourself an e-mail with an attachment or store it in the "cloud"). If you travel with a laptop or tablet, keep a copy in its memory or disk (available without Internet). Also give copies of your policy/contact person data to your travel companions and family/friends at home who are willing to help."
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Gadu gaitā ir tikuši izmantoti daudz dažādu filmu formāti. Standarta 35 mm filma (36 x 24 mm negatīvs) ir visizplatītākā. To parasti var diezgan viegli papildināt, ja esošais daudzums ir izlietots, un tas nodrošina izšķirtspēju, kas ir aptuveni salīdzināma ar esošo DSLR. Dažām vidēja formāta filmu kamerām ir 6 x6 cm formāts, precīzāk, 56 x 56 mm negatīvs. Tādējādi izšķirtspēja ir gandrīz četrreiz lielāka par 35 mm negatīvu (3136 mm2 pret 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 x 24 mm negative) is the most common. It can be easily extended if the existing amount is used up, and it provides resolution that is roughly comparable to the existing DSLR. Some mid-format film cameras have a 6x6 cm format, more precisely, a 56x56 mm negative. Thus, the resolution is almost four times greater than a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 vs. 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Vieglākais veids, kā uzsākt ceļojumu stāstu rakstīšanas biznesu, ir pilnveidot savas prasmes vispāratzītā ceļojumu emuāru vietnē. Tiklīdz esat pilnībā apguvis tīmekļa lapu formatēšanas un rediģēšanas prasmes, varat sākt savas tīmekļa vietnes izveidi.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel blog business is to improve your skills on a popular travel blog website. Once you have mastered the art of formatting and editing web pages, you can start building your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Vieglākais veids, kā uzsākt ceļojumu stāstu rakstīšanas biznesu, ir pilnveidot savas prasmes vispāratzītā ceļojumu emuāru vietnē. Tiklīdz esat pilnībā apguvis tīmekļa lapu formatēšanas un rediģēšanas prasmes, varat sākt savas tīmekļa vietnes izveidi.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel blog business is to improve your skills on a popular travel blog website. Once you have mastered the art of formatting and editing web pages, you can start building your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Savā dzīvesvietā jums visticamāk jau ir izstrādājusies imunitāte, jo nepārtraukti notiek saskare ar vietējām baktērijām. Taču citās pasaules vietās, kurās ir atšķirīga bakterioloģiskā vide, jums pastāv lielāka piedzīvot problēmas. Turklāt siltākos laikapstākļos baktērijas ātrāk vairojas un ilgāk dzīvo ārpus ķermeņa. Tāds ir Deli vēdera, faraona lāsta, Montezuma atriebības un daudzo līdzīgo nosaukumu posts. Līdzīgi kā respiratorās saslimšanas aukstāka klimata joslās, arī zarnu trakta slimības ir samērā izplatītas karsta klimata joslās, un vairumā gadījumu tās ir ārkārtīgi kaitinošas, taču nav īpaši bīstamas.
mt: You are likely to have developed immunity to the local bacteria, as you are constantly exposed to them. However, in other parts of the world, where the bacterial environment is different, you are more likely to have problems. Furthermore, in warmer climates, bacteria multiply faster and live longer outside the body. This is the Delhi belly, the faraon's curse, Montezuma's revenge, and many similar names. Similarly, respiratory infections are more common in colder climates, and so are intestinal tract infections, which are often extremely dangerous, but not particularly deadly.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Eiropa ir salīdzinoši mazs kontinents ar daudzām neatkarīgām valstīm. Parastos apstākļos ceļošana, šķērsojot vairākas valstis, nozīmētu neskaitāmus vīzu pieteikumus un pasu kontroles. Tomēr šajā sakarā Šengenas zona darbojas līdzīgi kā viena valsts. Atrodoties šajā teritorijā, parasti var šķērsot robežas bez atkārtotas pasu pārbaudes robežkontroles punktos. Līdzīgi, ja jums ir Šengenas vīza, jums nav jāpiesakās vīzai katrā no Šengenas dalībvalstīm atsevišķi, tādējādi ietaupot laiku, naudu un darbu ar dokumentiem.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent with many independent countries. In normal circumstances, crossing several countries would mean countless visa applications and passport checks. However, in this regard, the Schengen Area works like one country. When you are in this territory, you can usually cross borders without additional passport checks at border control points. Similarly, if you have a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a visa separately in each of the Schengen member states, thus saving time, money and work with documents.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Tutanhamona kapenes (KV62). KV62, iespējams, ir visslavenākās kapenes ielejā, kur 1922. gadā Hovards Kārters atklāja gandrīz neskarto jaunā karaļa karalisko apbedījuma vietu. Taču salīdzinot ar vairums citu karalisko kapeņu, Tutanhamona kapenes tikpat kā nav vērts apmeklēt, jo tās ir daudz mazākas un ar minimāliem rotājumiem. Ikviens, kuru interesē redzēt mūmijai nodarītos kaitējumus, kas radušies laikā, kad to mēģināja izņemt no zārka, būs neapmierināts, jo redzama ir tikai galva un pleci. Kapenes pasakainās bagātības tajā vairs neatrodas, bet tās ir aizvestas uz Ēģiptes muzeju Kairā. Tūristiem, kam ir ierobežots laiks, vislabāk būtu pavadīt laiku citur.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62, perhaps the most famous of all the tombs in the Valley, where Howard Carter discovered the almost intact burial place of a young king in 1922. However, compared to most other royal tombs, Tutankhamun's tomb is not worth visiting, as it is much smaller and with minimal decoration. Anyone who is interested in seeing the mummy's injuries, which occurred when it was removed from the sarcophagus, will be disappointed, as only the head and shoulders are visible. The treasures of the tomb are no longer there, but they have been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Tourists who have limited time, it would be best to spend time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: "Bovena sala ir iecienīta vieta dienas izbraucienam vai ekskursijai nedēļas nogalē, un tā piedāvā kaijaku braucienus, pārgājienus, veikalus, restorānus un daudz ko citu. Šī autentiskā kopiena atrodas Hovesaundā, netālu no Vankūveras, un tai var viegli piekļūt, izmantojot regulārus ūdens taksometrus, kas izbrauc no Granvilas salas Vankūveras centrā. Tiem, kam patīk aktivitātes brīvajā dabā, noteikti jāizmēģina dabas takas kalnu pārejas reģionā ""Sea to Sky"". Vistlera (1,5 h brauciena attālumā no Vankūveras) ir dārga, bet labi zināma pilsēta 2010. gada ziemas olimpisko spēļu dēļ. Ziemā izbaudiet dažas no vislabākajām slēpošanas iespējām Ziemeļamerikā, bet vasarā īstu kalnu riteņbraukšanu."
mt: "Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend getaway, and offers kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants and much more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound, near Vancouver, and is easily accessible by regular water taxis departing from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, the Sea to Sky Highway is a must-do. Whistler (1.5 hours drive from Vancouver) is a pricey but well-known town due to the 2010 Winter Olympics. In winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in summer, real mountain biking."
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: "Bovena sala ir iecienīta vieta dienas izbraucienam vai ekskursijai nedēļas nogalē, un tā piedāvā kaijaku braucienus, pārgājienus, veikalus, restorānus un daudz ko citu. Šī autentiskā kopiena atrodas Hovesaundā, netālu no Vankūveras, un tai var viegli piekļūt, izmantojot regulārus ūdens taksometrus, kas izbrauc no Granvilas salas Vankūveras centrā. Tiem, kam patīk aktivitātes brīvajā dabā, noteikti jāizmēģina dabas takas kalnu pārejas reģionā ""Sea to Sky"". Vistlera (1,5 h brauciena attālumā no Vankūveras) ir dārga, bet labi zināma pilsēta 2010. gada ziemas olimpisko spēļu dēļ. Ziemā izbaudiet dažas no vislabākajām slēpošanas iespējām Ziemeļamerikā, bet vasarā īstu kalnu riteņbraukšanu."
mt: "Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend getaway, and offers kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants and much more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound, near Vancouver, and is easily accessible by regular water taxis departing from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, the Sea to Sky Highway is a must-do. Whistler (1.5 hours drive from Vancouver) is a pricey but well-known town due to the 2010 Winter Olympics. In winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in summer, real mountain biking."
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Viktorijafolsa ir pilsēta Zimbabves rietumu daļā, pie Livingstonas robežas (Zambija) un netālu no Botsvānas. Pilsēta atrodas tieši blakus ūdenskritumam, un tā ir galvenais piesaistes objekts, taču šis populārais tūristu galamērķis gan piedzīvojumu meklētājiem, gan ekskursiju dalībniekiem piedāvā daudz iespēju, lai uzturētos ilgāk. Lietus sezonā (no novembra līdz martam) ūdens daudzums būs lielāks, un ūdenskritums izskatīsies iespaidīgāk. Jūs noteikti samirksiet, ja šķērsosiet tiltu vai pastaigāsieties pa takām, kas atrodas ūdenskrituma tuvumā. No otras puses, tieši tādēļ, ka ūdens tilpums ir tik liels, faktiskais ūdenskritums jūsu skatam būs apslēpts — visa šī ūdens daudzuma dēļ.
mt: Viktor Falls is a town in western Zimbabwe, near the border with Zambia and close to Botswana. The town is right next to a waterfall, and it is the main attraction, but this popular tourist destination for adventure seekers and excursionists offers many opportunities to stay longer. In the rainy season (from November to March) the water level will be higher, and the waterfall will look more impressive. You will definitely be amazed if you cross the bridge or walk along the paths near the waterfall. On the other hand, just because the water level is so high, the actual waterfall will be hidden from your view — all that water.
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Parastās fotografēšanas likumi attiecas arī uz video ierakstīšanu, iespējams, pat vēl vairāk. Ja nav atļauts kaut ko fotografēt, tad nevajadzētu pat domāt par tā ierakstīšanu video. Ja izmantojat dronu, laicīgi pārbaudiet, ko drīkstat filmēt un kādas atļaujas vai papildu licences ir nepieciešamas. Drona lidināšana lidostas tuvumā vai virs pūļa gandrīz vienmēr ir slikta ideja, pat ja tas nav aizliegts jūsu atrašanās vietā.
mt: Standard photography rules also apply to video recording, perhaps even more so. If you are not allowed to photograph something, you should not even think about recording it on video. If you use a drone, make sure to check what you are allowed to film and what permissions or additional licenses are required. Drone flying near an airport or over a runway is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not prohibited in your location.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Vīzas pieteikuma procesa papildprasība ir reģistrēšanās. Dažās valstīs vietējā varas iestādē ir jāreģistrē ierašanās fakts un apmešanās vietas adrese. Tās dēļ varētu būt nepieciešams aizpildīt veidlapu vietējā policijā vai apmeklēt imigrācijas birojus. Daudzās valstīs, kur ir šāds likums, vietējās viesnīcas veic reģistrāciju (bet pajautājiet par to). Citos gadījumos jāreģistrējas tikai tiem, kas neuzturas tūristu mītnēs. Tomēr tas padara tiesību aktus neskaidrākus, tāpēc noskaidrojiet to iepriekš.
mt: The visa application process is in progress. In some countries, the local authorities must be notified of your arrival and the address of your stay. For this reason, it may be necessary to fill out a form at the local police or visit the immigration offices. In many countries where this law exists, local hotels perform registration (but ask about it). In other cases, only those who do not stay in tourist accommodations must register. However, this makes the legal acts unclear, so clarify it beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Brīvprātīgais darbs ceļojuma laikā ir lielisks veids, kā kaut ko mainīt, bet runa nav tikai par došanu. Dzīvošana un brīvprātīgā darba veikšana ārvalstī ir teicams veids, kā iepazīt atšķirīgu kultūru, satikt jaunus cilvēkus, iepazīt sevi, paplašināt skatījumu un pat apgūt jaunas prasmes. Tas var arī būt labs veids, kā ietaupīt naudu un uzturēties kādā vietā ilgāk, jo daudziem brīvprātīgajiem nodrošina istabu un maltītes, bet dažiem maksā arī nelielu algu.
mt: Volunteering during a trip is a great way to make a difference, but it's not just about going. Living and volunteering abroad is a great way to meet different cultures, meet new people, get to know yourself, expand your perspective and even learn new skills. It can also be a great way to save money and stay in a place longer, as many volunteers are provided with a room and meals, and some are even paid a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Ceļošana uz Volta Disneja pasauli ir nozīmīgs svētceļojums daudzām amerikāņu ģimenēm. Tipiskais apmeklējums ietver ielidošanu Orlando Starptautiskajā lidostā, nokļūšanu ar autobusu uz vietas esošajā Disneja viesnīcā, apmēram nedēļas pavadīšanu, neatstājot Disneja īpašumu, un atgriešanos mājās. Ir iespējamas neskaitāmas variācijas, taču tas joprojām ir tas, ko lielākā daļa cilvēku domā, runājot par ""došanos uz Disneja pasauli"". Daudzas biļetes, ko pārdod tiešsaistē izsoļu tīmekļa vietnēs, piemēram, eBay un Craigslist, ir daļēji izmantotas vairāku dienu biļetes, kas paredzētas vairāku parku apmeklēšanai. Lai gan tā ir izplatīta prakse, uzņēmums „Disney” to ir aizliedzis: biļetes nedrīkst nodot tālāk."
mt: "Traveling to Walt Disney World is a major pilgrimage for many American families. A typical visit includes flying into Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to the on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week, not leaving the Disney property, and returning home. There are countless variations, but that is still what most people think of when they talk about "going to Disney World." Many tickets, which are sold online, such as eBay and Craigslist, are partially used multi-day tickets that are intended for visiting multiple parks. Although it is a common practice, the Walt Disney Company has banned this: tickets cannot be resold."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: "Ikvienam, kurš plāno apmeklēt valsti, kura uzskatāma par kara zonu, būtu jāsaņem profesionāla apmācība. Ievadot interneta meklētājā ""naidīgas vides apmācību kurss"", visticamāk tiks atrasta vietējā uzņēmuma adrese. Kursā parasti tiek daudz sīkāk aplūkoti visi šeit apspriestie jautājumi, kā arī jāveic praktiskie uzdevumi. Kurss parasti ilgst 2-5 dienas un tas ietver lomu spēli, dažāda veida apmācību par pirmās palīdzības sniegšanu un dažkārt arī par ieroču lietošanu. Ir daudz un dažādas grāmatas un žurnāli par izdzīvošanu ekstremālos apstākļos, bet ir ļoti maz publikāciju par dzīvošanu kara zonās."
mt: "Everyone who plans to visit a country considered a war zone should take a professional training course. Entering the search engine "hate environment training course" will most likely lead to the address of a local company. The course usually goes into great detail on all the issues discussed here, as well as practical exercises. The course usually lasts 2-5 days and includes role play, first aid training and sometimes even weapon use. There are many and various books and magazines on survival in extreme environments, but there are very few publications on living in war zones."
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Ir dažādi ūdens attīrīšanas veidi, daži ir efektīvāki pret konkrētiem draudiem. Dažās vietās pietiek ar ūdens vārīšanu vienu minūti, bet citās ir vajadzīgas vairākas minūtes. Filtri atšķiras ar savu efektivitāti, tādēļ, ja šaubāties, apsveriet iespēju iegādāties ūdeni slēgtā pudelē no uzticama uzņēmuma.
mt: There are different water purification methods, some are more effective against specific threats. In some places, boiling water for one minute is enough, but in others, it is necessary for several minutes. Filters differ in their effectiveness, so if you are unsure, consider buying water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Ievelkošās straumes ir atpakaļejoša plūsma, viļņiem plūstot prom no pludmales, bieži vien pie rifa vai kā līdzīga. Pateicoties zemūdens topoloģijai, atgriezeniskā plūsma ir koncentrējusies dažos dziļākajos segmentos, kur var izveidoties ātra straume uz dziļumu. Vairākumā gadījumu nāvi izraisa nogurums, kas rodas, mēģinot peldēt atpakaļ pret straumi, jo tas var būt neiespējami. Tiklīdz izkļūst no straumes, peldēšana atpakaļ nav grūtāka kā parasti. Mēģiniet doties uz turieni, kur vairs netiksiet ierauts, vai atkarībā no savām prasmēm un no tā, vai esat pamanīts, varat gaidīt, kad ieradīsies glābēji.
mt: A rip current is a strong, localized current of water that flows away from the beach, parallel to the shore. Because of the topography of the sea floor, rip currents are often concentrated in a few deep channels. Rip currents can be dangerous to unwary swimmers. Most drownings in rip currents are caused by exhaustion from swimming against the current. Once out of the rip current, swimming back to shore is usually not difficult. Try to swim parallel to the shore until you are out of the rip current, or wait for lifeguards to arrive.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

Mēģiniet doties uz turieni, kur vairs netiksiet ierauts, vai atkarībā no savām prasmēm un no tā, vai esat pamanīts, varat gaidīt, kad ieradīsies glābēji.
mt: A rip current is a strong, localized current of water that flows away from the beach, parallel to the shore. Because of the topography of the sea floor, rip currents are often concentrated in a few deep channels. Rip currents can be dangerous to unwary swimmers. Most drownings in rip currents are caused by exhaustion from swimming against the current. Once out of the rip current, swimming back to shore is usually not difficult. Try to swim parallel to the shore until you are out of the rip current, or wait for lifeguards to arrive.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Iekšzemes ūdensceļi var būt laba atvaļinājuma tēma. Piemēram, apmeklēt pilis Luāras ielejā, Reinas ielejā vai doties kruīza izbraucienā uz interesantām vietām pa Donavu vai braukt ar kuģīti pa Erijas kanālu. Viņi arī nosaka maršrutus populārām pārgājienu un riteņbraukšanas takām.
mt: Inland waterways can be a good vacation theme. For example, visit the castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley or go on a cruise to interesting places along the Danube or ride a boat along the Erie Canal. They also set up routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Ziemeļos šis reģions robežojas ar Sāhelas reģionu, bet dienvidos un rietumos ar Atlantijas okeānu. Sievietes: visām ceļojošām sievietēm ir iesakāms teikt, ka viņas ir precējušās, neatkarīgi no faktiskā ģimenes stāvokļa. Ir arī noderīgi izvilkt gredzenu (bet ne tādu, kas izskatās pārāk dārgs. Sievietēm ir jāsaprot, ka kultūras atšķirību dēļ var rasties situācijas, ko viņas var uzskatīt par uzmākšanos, un nav nekas neparasts, ja sievietei seko, satver aiz rokas utt. Nebaidieties atteikt vīriešiem un noraidīt viņu uzmanību (nav svarīgi, vai tās ir kultūratšķirības vai nē, tas tik un tā nav pieņemami).
mt: This region borders the Sahel region to the north, the Atlantic Ocean to the south and west, and the Sahara to the east. Women: All traveling women are advised to say they are married, regardless of their actual marital status. It is also advisable to wear a ring (but not one that looks too expensive. Women should understand that cultural differences may lead to situations that they may consider as being rude, and it is not unusual if a woman is followed, grabbed by the hand, etc. Do not be afraid to refuse men and reject their attention (it is not important whether this is due to cultural differences or not, it is simply not acceptable).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Savvaļas dzīvnieki fotogrāfam ir viens no izaicinošākajiem motīviem, un to fotografēšanai ir vajadzīga gan veiksme un pacietība, gan pieredze un labs aprīkojums. Savvaļas dzīvnieku fotografēšana nereti tiek uztverta kā pašsaprotama, taču, tāpat kā fotogrāfija kopumā, viens attēls ir tūkstoš vārdu vērts. Savvaļas dzīvnieku fotografēšanai bieži vien ir nepieciešams garš telefoto objektīvs, bet, piemēram, putnu bara vai sīku radību fotografēšanai ir vajadzīgi citi objektīvi. Daudzi eksotiski dzīvnieki ir grūti atrodami, un parkos dažkārt ir noteikumi par fotogrāfiju uzņemšanu komerciāliem nolūkiem. Savvaļas dzīvnieki var būt vai nu piesardzīgi, vai agresīvi. Vide var būt auksta, karsta vai citādi nelabvēlīga.
mt: Wildlife photography is one of the most challenging and rewarding forms of photography, requiring both skill and patience, as well as experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often misunderstood, but, like photography in general, one picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, but, for example, bird flocks or small creatures require other lenses. Many exotic animals are difficult to find, and in parks there are often rules about commercial photography. Wildlife can be either shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot, or otherwise unfavorable.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Ikvienam, kurš grasās vadīt transportlīdzekli polārajos rajonos vai pār kalnu pārejām, jāņem vērā sniega, ledus vai stindzinošu temperatūru iespējamība. Uz apledojušām un apsnigušām brauktuvēm ir maza berze, tāpēc jūs nevarat braukt tāpat kā pa tīru asfaltu. Sniegavētrās pavisam īsā laika var uzsnigt tik daudz sniega, kas var radīt sastrēgumu. Redzamību var ierobežot arī krītošs sniegs, putenis, kondensāts vai ledus uz transportlīdzekļa logiem. No otras puses, ledaini un sniegoti apstākļi daudzās valstīs ir normāli, tāpēc satiksme visu gadu norit lielākoties bez pārtraukuma.
mt: For anyone who plans to drive in polar regions or over mountain passes, snow, ice or freezing temperatures are a possibility. There is little traction on snow-covered and icy roads, so you cannot drive as you would on asphalt. In snowstorms, a short period of time can accumulate so much snow that it can cause a skid. Visibility can also be reduced by falling snow, fog, condensation or ice on the vehicle's windows. On the other hand, cold and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, so traffic usually continues throughout the year without interruption.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Ja vien neesat diplomāts, darbs ārzemēs parasti nozīmē, ka jums būs jāmaksā ienākuma nodoklis valstī, kurā atrodaties. Dažādās valstīs ienākuma nodoklim ir dažāda struktūra, un nodokļu likmes un diapazoni dažādās valstīs ievērojami atšķiras. Dažās federālajās valstīs, piemēram, Amerikas Savienotajās Valstīs un Kanādā, ienākumu nodoklis ir jāmaksā gan federālajā, gan vietējā līmenī, tāpēc likmes un diapazons dažādos reģionos var atšķirties.
mt: If you are not a diplomat, working abroad usually means that you will have to pay income tax in the country where you are. Income tax structures and ranges vary widely from country to country. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is paid both at the federal and local level, so the rates and ranges can vary in different regions.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: "Pasaules izstāde (ko parasti sauc par ""World Exposition"" vai vienkārši ""Expo"") ir liela starptautiska mākslas un zinātņu izstāde. Dalībvalstis savu valstu paviljonos prezentē mākslinieciskas un izglītojošas ekspozīcijas, lai parādītu pasaulē aktuālus tematus vai pašu valstu kultūru un vēsturi. Starptautiskās dārzkopības izstādes ir specializēti pasākumi, kuru laikā tiek izstādīti ziedi, rādīti botāniskie dārzi un jebkas cits, kas saistīts ar augiem. Lai arī teorētiski tie var notikt katru gadu (ja vien tos organizē dažādās valstīs), reāli tā nenotiek. Šie pasākumi parasti ilgst no trim līdz sešiem mēnešiem, un tie notiek vietās, kas nav mazākas par 50 hektāriem."
mt: "The World Exposition (commonly known as "World Exposition" or simply "Expo") is a large international exhibition. Participating countries present their artistic and educational exhibitions in their national pavilions to show current topics or their own culture and history. International horticultural exhibitions are specialized events where flowers, botanical gardens and anything else related to plants are exhibited. Although theoretically they can be held every year (if they are organized in different countries), in reality they do not. These events usually last from three to six months, and they are held in places larger than 50 hectares."
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Lai gan daudzi parka dzīvnieki ir pieraduši redzēt cilvēkus, savvaļas dzīvnieki tomēr ir savvaļas, un tos nedrīkst barot vai traucēt. Saskaņā ar parka uzraudzības iestāžu norādījumiem jāievēro vismaz 100 jardu/metru attālums no lāčiem un vilkiem, kā arī 25 jardu/metru attālums no visiem pārējiem savvaļas dzīvniekiem! Lai arī cik pakļāvīgi tie izskatītos, bizoni, aļņi, Ziemeļamerikas aļņi, lāči un tikpat kā visi lielie dzīvnieki var uzbrukt. Katru gadu tiek ievainoti desmitiem apmeklētāju, jo viņi neievēro pienācīgu distanci. Šie dzīvnieki ir lieli, mežonīgi un var būt arī bīstami, tādēļ labāk turēties no tiem pa gabalu. Turklāt atcerieties, ka smaržas piesaista lāčus un citus savvaļas dzīvniekus, tāpēc izvairieties no aromātisku ēdienu pārnēsāšanas vai gatavošanas un uzturiet nometni tīru.
mt: While many park animals are used to seeing people, wild animals are still wild, and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park ranger instructions, keep at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves, and 25 yards/meters away from all other wild animals! Although they may look docile, bison, elk, North American elk, bears, and pretty much all large animals can attack. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured because they don't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, forest-dwelling, and can be dangerous, so keep your distance. Also remember that scents attract bears and other wild animals, so avoid carrying or preparing aromatic foods, and keep your campsite clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
